The Dundabunga's internal structure is constructed of a premium heavy gauge and double locked annealed copper, which makes it virtually indestructible.
Features
Deep space grey anodized aerospace aluminum head 
High grade silicone covered permanent neodymium magnets (final Ungabunga will have a silicone cover) 
Ungabunga magnetic piece unscrews to reveal a camera mount
Super soft and flexible nitrile rubber covering
Wearable and adaptable to all surfaces





Ungabunga includes 3M VHB tape and silicone magnet cover






Magnetic Shielding
All of the Bungajungle Mounts are magnetically shielded. This includes the Dundabunga, Ungabunga, Neutron S and Neutron A. This means that practically no magnetic field will enter into you device. It's a technology that was developed during our previous Kickstarter projects. The magnetic field is restricted to the mounting disc. So, those worried about magnets affecting their device have nothing to worry about. These mounts will never lose their hold, and are not affected by dirt or temperature changes.
Mounting Disc
The disc measures a super slim depth of just .9 mm. Because it is so thin, it can be installed in-between your case and phone. The disc can also be adhered to your Apple, Android, Windows phone or cover with 3M VHB tape. The tape and disc can be easily taken off without damaging your device.
Features a square design with rounded corners and bead blasted texture for a premium finish to match your devices.  Put it on everything to make it mountable!








You can add additional items from our previous campaigns to your pledge level by simply choosing the item(s) you would like and then following the instructions below to add to your pledge! Minimum $15 reward selection.


























Our Story  
The Bungajungle products are inspired by travel, open roads, cities, towns, mountains, oceans, and all of nature. The ideas came while living in vans around the continental United States and Hawaii. These designs are inspirations from  that simple life of freedom.
Test

story:
Eye Smartcase is a case for your iPhone that adds a lot of cool features to it.

     

   

The Eye Smartcase is for:

iPhone Xs Max
iPhone X (ten), Xs
iPhones 8, 7, 6s & 6
iPhones 8 Plus, 7 Plus, 6s Plus & 6 Plus

  

 

   

Final design:

  

  

Smartcase for iPhone Plus models 

   
   
 

Smartcase for iPhone Plus models 

 

 

 

 

   

     

    

 

 

 

 

  

     

 

  

    

      

  

 

 

    

   

    

As featured in Unbox Therapy

       

     

 

As Featured In EverythingApplePro 

 

 

    

14,000,000(!!) views and 175,000 shares on a video post covering Eye that went viral:

 
 

       

     

   

  

 

   

5.7" HD+ display

 

Beautiful, modern and huge display. 18:9 aspect ratio.
5.7" will be for all iPhone models: Plus, X and the base size.

 

       

 

       

Back us to take your screen to the next level with Eye by ESTI!

 

     

    

Expand your storage up to 256GB with the SD card slot

With Eye, you finally get expandable storage on your device! 

Just pop a microSD card and back up your iPhone pictures and videos to it with our app.

Access the file with any Android file explorer. 

Eye connects to the iPhone via Lightning so file transfer speed is phenomenal—up to 130MB (yes, bytes!) per second.

 

Back us to take your storage to the next level with Eye by ESTI!

    

    

2800mAh extra battery   

Eye improves your battery life in two ways.

1) Inside the Eye and next to the motherboard is a 2800mAh battery. This battery will serve the Eye while charging the iPhone. 

2) When you're using Eye, the iPhone is not really used, leaving it in standby mode much more than usual (than without having Eye).

The iPhone’s battery will never lose power to Eye.

Back us to take the battery life of your phone to the next level with Eye by ESTI!

   

    

Wireless charging   

Under the Eye screen is a very slim tag supporting Qi wireless charging.

You'll be able to wirelessly charge your iPhone with home chargers that support Qi wireless charging and commercial ones including those in Starbucks, McDonalds, IKEA wireless charge furniture, GMC, Toyota, Lexus, Jeep, Audi, BMW, Chrysler, Cadillac, Kia, and Chevy select automobiles.

    

 

 

       

Back us to take your charging convenience to the next level with Eye by ESTI!

    

   

2 extra SIM card slots

Eye includes 2 extra SIM card slots supporting LTE cellular speeds up to 300 Mbps.

That means you can have up to 3 numbers—one inside your iPhone and two inside Eye.

Since Eye doesn't have a mic or speaker, it'll use the iPhone's own mic and ear speaker.

*Please check the specs below for full details on supported cellular bands.

Back us to take your cellular capabilities to the next level with Eye by ESTI!

   

     

Android 8.1 Oreo OS 

Eye runs Android on its own powerful chipset. 

It runs fast and smooth because it relies on a clean and pure Android with Google Play, without the unnecessary bloatware.

Don't compromise anymore! With Eye, enjoy using both iOS and Android!

Now enjoy Android exclusive features such as:

  • ❤️ Native call recording.
  • ❤️ Real file explorer.
  • ❤️ Recognition of unknown numbers (with apps like Truecaller). 
  • ❤️ Moving files freely between your computer and handset (just drag and drop).
  • ❤️ Full customization of OS colors, icons, home and lock screen and much more.
  • ❤️ Enjoy real multitasking—back up all kind of files to the cloud on the background with 3rd party apps (e.g., Google Photos). Send large files to friends trough IM apps without the need to stay in the application for the transfer.
  • ❤️ Android exclusive apps including:
  • - Casper (save snaps on Snapchat, among other Snapchat hacks).
    - OGInsta+ (Instagram hacks and tweaks like download and save a photo or a video directly to your photo library).
    - Popcorn Time, Kodi, Showbox, SopCast and TV Portal.
    - Tasker.
    - Screen recording.
    - TubeMate, FireTube and Floating Tube.
    - Amazon Underground.
    - NFC Tools.
    - You can even install and play the original Flappy Bird!
  • ❤️ Root the Eye for even more possibilities.

The list is endless...

Back us to take your software possibilities to the next level with Eye by ESTI!

 

   

        

High-quality selfies and vlogging 

We all know that the rear camera is much better than the front one. 

Unfortunately, we can't take selfies or vlogs of ourselves with it—it's hard to focus on yourself when you don't see yourself. 

Eye will mirror the display of your camera app to its screen. You will then be able to take a photo or video of yourself correctly in focus.

  

 

   

       

Back us to take your photography to the next level with Eye by ESTI!

    

    

     

3.5 mm headphone jack

For those of us who would like to use wired headphones, Eye has your back!

Eye connects to the iPhone through its Lightning port and takes the sound signal through it, just like any other Lightning headphones. 

When music plays or a call starts on the iPhone, you'll enjoy these features with your wired headphones connected to Eye. :)
In case there is no sound on the iPhone, the headphone jack will play sounds from the Eye's Android OS.

Music playback will be in high quality because Eye has a cutting-edge DAC (digital to analog converter).

       

Back us to take your music to the next level with Eye by ESTI!

    

 

 

 

Always on display 

See notifications, time & date or add a pic of your loved ones!

This eliminates the need to turn the iPhone on all the time and drain its battery!

*Eye battery consumption will increase hourly by 2% with no impact on the iPhone battery whatsoever.

*Optional and can be turned off.

 

    

Back us and replace your static design case for a dynamic one with Eye by ESTI!

   

  

       

Infrared blaster & receiver

 Control IR devices like:  

  • TVs. 
  • Set-top boxes. 
  • Apple TV. 
  • Streamers. 
  • Stereo systems. 
  • Blu-rays/DVDs. 
  • Xbox (for media, not games). 
  • Air conditioners. 
  • Digital cameras. 
  • Car radios.

       

 

Back us and rule your electronics easily with Eye by ESTI!    

 

 

      

Metal tag for car mounting

We all know that magnetic car mounts are one of the easiest, safest ways to mount smartphones in a vehicle.

Located under the screen of the Eye is a thin metal tag that will stick to a magnetic car mount and tightly hold your iPhone.

  
Back us and drive safely and conveniently with Eye by ESTI!                                                                                                    

  

   

 

  

 

No protection is needed for Eye's screen!

Just like the famous Casio G-Shock watch, Eye's bezels are above the screen, keeps the screen safe from drops and scratches.

  

 

 

  

  

      

     

     

  

  

    

      

    

 

    

 

How to back us

1. Choose a reward level.

Choose one (and only one) reward level to back this project. You cannot choose 2 reward levels. You will get all the items at that level—you cannot swap things that you don't want for things that you do want (see the FAQ for why we can't do this).

2. If you want to add something, check out the add-on / options section.

If you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the add-on / options section below. You can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified. Take note: you can only add things to your reward that are on the menu.

3. Relax. You've done your part. All details like shipping information, color preference, and add-ons will be collected via survey in 24 hours from your contribution.

       

   

     

 

      

   

        

    

 

 Accessories, Add-ons and options

    

Dedicated wireless charger with green LED to show a full charge:   

 

 

    

          

     

         

           

Optional upgrade from 16GB to 64GB of on board storage ($59)

Quadruple (X4!!) the on board storage!
If this is unlocked, and you want a bigger storage just add $59 to your current, pledge for getting the 64GB on board storage.
      
   
   
   

       

Add 7200mAh (on top of 2800mAh) for a total of 10000mAh, enabling Eye to act as a portable power bank ($24).

Please note! The power bank is instead of the iPhone when you are not using Eye for covering the iPhone. A battery bank in the shape of the iPhone and little bit thicker will be mounted inside the case.
  
               

     

       

     

Optional boot into Ubuntu OS

   

   

 

You'll be able to choose a Smartcase also in real leather

 

 

 

            

 

 

      

    

                

               

    

  • Display 

5.7" HD+ 

   

  • ​Memory  
     
    3GB LPDDR3 
     
     
  • Storage  
     
    32GB onboard
    Expandable by up to 256GB with a microSD card
    Data transfer speeds of up to 130 MB/ps between the phone and Eye. 
     
     
  • Battery 
     
    2800mAh
    Qi wireless charging
     
     
  • Operating System 
     
    Android Nougat 8.1 with Google Play services

 

  • Wireless 
     
    GSM: 850(B5)/900(B8)/1800(B3)/1900(B2)
    WCDMA: 850(B5)/900(B8)/1900(B2)/2100(B1)
    LTE FDD: 2100(B1)/1800(B3)/2600(B7)/800(B20)
    Up to 300 Mbps
    Dual SIM standby or 1 Micro SIM Card and 1 microSD Card
    Both SIM slots are compatible with 4G
    When working simultaneously, only one slot can receive LTE service and the other GSM

    IR blaster and receiver
    NFC
    a/b/g/n/ac WiFi
    Bluetooth 4.2
    FM radio
    GPS 
     
     
  • Sensors
     
    Gyro
    Accelerometer
    Proximity sensor
    Ambient light sensor
     
     
  • Speaker and Microphones

​

  • Chipset 
     
    MediaTek Helio P20 (MT6757)

    CPU
    2.3 GHz quad-core ARM Cortex-A53
    1.6 GHz quad-core ARM Cortex-A53

    GPU
    Mali-T880 MP2 900MHz
     
      
  • Physical Connectors  
     
    Lightning socket and plug
    3.5 mm headphone jack
      
      
  • Languages:  

    English, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Cestina, Dansk, Deutsch, Espanol, Filipino, French, Hrvatski, latviesu,Italiano, Magyar, Nederlands, Norsk, Polish, Portuguese, Romana, Slovencina, Suomi, Svenska, Tieng viet, Turkish, Greek, Bulgarian, Russian, Ukrainian, Hebrew, Arabic, Thai, Khmer, Korean, Simplified/Traditional Chinese, Japanese.

    For iPhone 6, 6s, and 7
    3.5 ounces (90 grams)

    6.4 x 3.17 x 0.52 in (162.5 x 80.5 x 13.3 mm) 
     

  

 

   
 

 

       

Joseph is an entrepreneur. 

He made Eye because he is an "iPhone person" that also likes the freedom of Android. He also missed some features that are available on other smartphones but not on the iPhone.

He is the former CEO and founder of a successful Israeli website called Tan-Doo that he later sold to a bigger website.   

A geek who doesn't forget to have a good time ;-)

 

  

Tzif is an electronics and communications engineer. 

He is an expert in both prototyping and production: Circuits and electricity, communication engineering, R&D, wireless and cellular technologies, projects management and IoT.

As well, he has experience working on very big projects in the mobile industry.

story:
Using the latest 3D technology Smart 3D Ltd has created Pixelio. Pixelio is an innovative, modern and easy to use 3D scanner that can be used by everyone!

Until now, the market has lacked a good and low-cost device for 3D printer users that allows copying objects, make spare parts, or archive collections in the form of 3D files.

Smart 3D Ltd team created a device that fills this gap. The company also added some simple and clever features to their small devices. That is why Pixelio – the first baby of Smart 3D - became also a device that helps to improve your photos and even movies.



Pixelio will introduce you to a new dimension in 3D photography.

With Pixelio scanner you can enjoy high-tech features for a reasonable price. All you need is a smartphone or GoPro camera.




Everyone will find Pixelio useful!

Affordable and user-friendly it should satisfy the most demanding photographers and 3D printer users. Pixelio does not have its own optics as for that purpose, it uses your smartphone camera and a free app (eg. 123D Catch). That makes Pixelio even more accessible.

Featuring a wide range of functionality Pixelio will be perfect for:

• sellers on eBay and other auction sites

• bloggers and vloggers

• graphics

• real estate developers

• architects, engineers etc. 

• or even tourists who want to take the best panoramic pictures.


With Pixelio you can scan any object you like in an easy and intuitive way. 3D model can be printed directly using your 3D printer. The scan is of high quality and it captures fine detail (which is not possible with hand-held scanners). Thanks to a universal holder Pixelio can be connected to any smartphone.
... simply scanned & printed:


See more on our sketchfab profile:

https://sketchfab.com/models?q=pixelio&sort...


Pixelio is a simple and fast way to create amazing 360-degree photos! This option will particularly appeal to you if you sell on the Internet, write a blog or deal with professional product photography. The process of creating pictures is automatic. 360-degree photos can be saved to MP4 or GIF format.







Fantastic panoramas taken with Pixelio scanner are characterized with precise, steady image (no movements) and high resolution (depending on what smartphone you are using the photo quality can be excellent). To meet the needs of the most demanding photographers Pixelio allows you to set intervals, speed of the arm movement and many other parameters. The device timer can be programmed for any time you like. This function will help you to create incredible time-lapse shots.

Pixelio also has a tripod mount so it can be easily attached to any tripod. Pixelio can be connected not only to a smartphone but also to a full HD GoPro-type camera so your photos and videos can become even better.

We did it in a flat - click on the link below and check this out! Go around! Isn’t that fantastic!?

Better if you watch it on your smartphone. It takes only 2 minutes to create it and the cost is pretty low



Time-lapse movies are made by taking hundreds of photos of one scene (for example the sunset or sunrise). It looks quite effective but Pixelio gives you even more! Pixelio has a built-in feature that allows to move a camera/mobile phone (placed in the holder) centimeters by centimeters and triggering the shutter every few seconds, minutes or hours – as you set it. It gives you a possibility to create incredible panoramic time-lapse video. Pixelio allows for panning with excellent precision at the speed you set. Pixelio costs much less than other devices for panning and time-lapse movies and for its price offers so much more.





      




   




Smart 3D has created a imitation of a human finger, or more specifically, its resistive capacity, so Pixelio works easy. For that purpose we had used patented Virtual Finger technology with unique material with 0.3% of graphene. Virtual Finger is used to activate the shutter release button in applications that do not have Bluetooth support or in mobile phones that do not support Bluetooth 4.0. With Virtual Finger you can release the shutter at the moment set on Pixelio in a completely automatic way. Thanks to that function you do not need to manually start the filming process.






Smart 3D Ltd is a company focused on new technology. We create innovative products that fill the market gaps and help people to live smart.

Smart 3D is a whole family of devices that can work together and perfectly complement one another. Pixelio scanner is the first child of the company. Intensive work is underway and the family will be soon joined by another innovative devices. Smart 3D products are characterized by simplicity, high-value functionality and minimalist design.
story_txt:
Using the latest 3D technology Smart 3D Ltd has created Pixelio. Pixelio is an innovative, modern and easy to use 3D scanner that can be used by everyone!Until now, the market has lacked a good and low-cost device for 3D printer users that allows copying objects, make spare parts, or archive collections in the form of 3D files.Smart 3D Ltd team created a device that fills this gap. The company also added some simple and clever features to their small devices. That is why Pixelio – the first baby of Smart 3D - became also a device that helps to improve your photos and even movies.Pixelio will introduce you to a new dimension in 3D photography.With Pixelio scanner you can enjoy high-tech features for a reasonable price. All you need is a smartphone or GoPro camera.Everyone will find Pixelio useful!Affordable and user-friendly it should satisfy the most demanding photographers and 3D printer users. Pixelio does not have its own optics as for that purpose, it uses your smartphone camera and a free app (eg. 123D Catch). That makes Pixelio even more accessible.Featuring a wide range of functionality Pixelio will be perfect for:• sellers on eBay and other auction sites• bloggers and vloggers• graphics• real estate developers• architects, engineers etc. • or even tourists who want to take the best panoramic pictures.With Pixelio you can scan any object you like in an easy and intuitive way. 3D model can be printed directly using your 3D printer. The scan is of high quality and it captures fine detail (which is not possible with hand-held scanners). Thanks to a universal holder Pixelio can be connected to any smartphone.... simply scanned & printed:


See more on our sketchfab profile:
https://sketchfab.com/models?q=pixelio&sort...





Pixelio is a simple and fast way to create amazing 360-degree photos! This option will particularly appeal to you if you sell on the Internet, write a blog or deal with professional product photography. The process of creating pictures is automatic. 360-degree photos can be saved to MP4 or GIF format.












Fantastic panoramas taken with Pixelio scanner are characterized with precise, steady image (no movements) and high resolution (depending on what smartphone you are using the photo quality can be excellent). To meet the needs of the most demanding photographers Pixelio allows you to set intervals, speed of the arm movement and many other parameters. The device timer can be programmed for any time you like. This function will help you to create incredible time-lapse shots.
Pixelio also has a tripod mount so it can be easily attached to any tripod. Pixelio can be connected not only to a smartphone but also to a full HD GoPro-type camera so your photos and videos can become even better.
We did it in a flat - click on the link below and check this out! Go around! Isn’t that fantastic!?
Better if you watch it on your smartphone. It takes only 2 minutes to create it and the cost is pretty low 






Time-lapse movies are made by taking hundreds of photos of one scene (for example the sunset or sunrise). It looks quite effective but Pixelio gives you even more! Pixelio has a built-in feature that allows to move a camera/mobile phone (placed in the holder) centimeters by centimeters and triggering the shutter every few seconds, minutes or hours – as you set it. It gives you a possibility to create incredible panoramic time-lapse video. Pixelio allows for panning with excellent precision at the speed you set. Pixelio costs much less than other devices for panning and time-lapse movies and for its price offers so much more.










      











   







Smart 3D has created a imitation of a human finger, or more specifically, its resistive capacity, so Pixelio works easy. For that purpose we had used patented Virtual Finger technology with unique material with 0.3% of graphene. Virtual Finger is used to activate the shutter release button in applications that do not have Bluetooth support or in mobile phones that do not support Bluetooth 4.0. With Virtual Finger you can release the shutter at the moment set on Pixelio in a completely automatic way. Thanks to that function you do not need to manually start the filming process.












Smart 3D Ltd is a company focused on new technology. We create innovative products that fill the market gaps and help people to live smart.
Smart 3D is a whole family of devices that can work together and perfectly complement one another. Pixelio scanner is the first child of the company. Intensive work is underway and the family will be soon joined by another innovative devices. Smart 3D products are characterized by simplicity, high-value functionality and minimalist design.

story:
Totm+Travel (by Padawanlab) is the meet up of an elegant Apple Watch Dock (Totm) made of Oak from French forests AND a Really Smart Power Bank (Travl) able to perform home automation tasks.

 

Totm+Travl provides your Apple Watch a full week of freedom. With its built-in battery and its Dynamic Range feature, you don't need to get close to a power socket to enjoy your Watch.

 

Take it with you anywhere... even on road trips...

 

With Totm+Travl, don't lose your time seeking for power plugs and don't bother taking multi-charger / cable / dongle for your Watch.

+No plug... No problem 

Charge it on the go with your Macbook Pro USB-C cable or with any USB adapter.

 

 

+Scandinavian Design: We wanted Totm+Travl to be simple, functional and minimalist.

 

+Totm is as simple as possible yet very functional: Nightstand Mode compatible and cable integration.

+Travl is sleek and ultra-easy to use. There is no power button (auto on/off) and no led light to check the battery level. Every interaction with Travl is made via the iPhone App.

 

Not only the Bluetooth connection makes Totm+Travl really smart but it makes its design really simple.

 

+Made for you: Because it is a naturally grown material, each product is unique and has its own beautiful characteristics and tones.

Totm+Travl is worked out of a unique block of wood in our partner wood workshop in the French Jura Forest. Each Totm+Travl is then carefully sanded by hand and treated with a natural oil and wax to bring out the beautiful grain and to achieve a smooth and pleasant touch.

 

+Quality and commitment: Designed and Manufactured in France.

With the production in France we support small and medium-sized local businesses. The proximity to our manufacturers allows us to know all manufacturing steps, working conditions and involved individuals.

To produce of Totm+Travl we only use PEFC-certified wood types, that are not in danger of extinction and that are grown in Europe.

 

The electronic part of Travl is also manufactured in France so we are 100% sure of its quality (If you already backed a Kickstarter product made in China...then you probably know why this is good news)

+Perfect size & shape for Nightstand

We designed Totm to hold your Watch during the night (charging time) so it allows the use of Apple Watch Nightstand mode.

 

+Innovative design fits all strap

Totm mimics the shape of your wrist and because you put your Watch on it from the top, Totm fits all kind of band.

 

+Put your Apple Watch on Totm the way you want.

You don't want to "close" the band before putting your Apple Watch on Totm every night??? No Problem... you don't have to.

 

+No Cord Mess:

Hide unnecessary cable inside Totm to clean up your night table. Even better, if you add Travl, there won't be any cable left.

 

Totm+Travl is the very First Dock for Apple Watch that is MORE than a simple stand... It's a true companion.

Totm+Travl features a built-in Bluetooth 4.0 chip so it's always connected to your iPhone. It becomes a true extension providing "Super Powers" to your Apple Watch. 

Because Totm+Travl is connected to your iPhone, you always have a clear & precise view of its battery status in the iOS widget.

Totm+Travl will log every Apple Watch charge

 

Totm+Travl uses your charging habits to automatically adapt its "remaining gauge" every morning.

With Proactive Notification, no need to check the battery level (but you can with battery widget). You’ll be notified by Totm+Travl : 

   + Every morning. Yoiu get the Daily Status of Totm+Travl remaining battery
   + Whenever you need to charge Totm+Travl:
      + Less than 1 Full Watch charge left.
      + Less than 2 Average Watch charge left.

Totm+Travl adds an event to your iPhone Calendar according to its next charging needs. This event is automatically adjusted every day.

Even better, if the charging due date happens to be in the middle of your next trip (ex: going to Apple WWDC conference between June 5 and June 9), Totm+Travl will remind you to charge it before you leave.

Look at your Apple Watch and you'll see a "Magic switch"!

 

Totm+Travl will detect whenever your Apple Watch is connected to it and triggers actions according to your wishes (scenario).

To give you full control, Totm+Travl "scenario" adds conditions to the good old duo "If / Then"

Let's take a look in detail at those 3 steps

+3 triggers (when) :

  • Plug: When you put your Apple Watch on Totm+Travl, and the charge begins, the magic happens.
  • 100%: When your Apple Watch reach 100%, Totm+Travl will trigger the scenario of your choice.
  • Unplug: This one is the perfect "morning trigger". As you can imagine, it'll trigger a scenario when you remove Apple Watch from Totm+Travl.

+3 conditions (if) :

 
  • Days of the week: chose if you want to trigger a scenario on specific days, only week days, only weekends, etc.
  • Timeframe: You may limit trigger on a particular timeframe (i.e: Trigger my "good morning" scenario only if I unplug my Apple Watch between 6am and 9am)
  • Location: chose to enable or disable a trigger if you're at home (or elsewhere). You may not want your "good night" scenario to be triggered when your camping in the forest.

+Endless actions (then):

  • Connect Totm+Travl to your IFTTT account and it'll rule your house for you. With IFTTT you can connect Totm+Travl to hundreds of services/channels to control almost every IOT in the market and much much more

 

Turn Totm+Travl into HomeKit Sensors which are able to trigger any scene or control any of your HomeKit accessory (Hue Light, Blinds, Heater, Security System, etc.)

 

 

 

 

Travl is exclusively managed using iPhone (and Apple Watch) with the companion app.
Like we did with Totm+Travl itself, we want to provide the best possible experience by designing a fully functional but minimalist application.

 Totm+Travl companion App will be available for iPhone & Apple Watch.

* As long as the Apple Watch is worn on a wrist (we can assume it's going to be forever), it'll fit Totm because Totm is shaped like a wrist (it's a cylinder, no?!)

 

Padawanlab is the meet up of Friendship, Partnership and Family.

The 3 co-founders of Padawanlab are all related and enjoy working together on their passion: Technology and Apple Products.

+Aymeric: Serial Entrepreneur, he likes innovation, technology and is (of course) a geek. He's what one could call a Jack-of-all-trades: Entrepreneur, Manager, Lean/Agile evangelist, Designer, Developer (a little bit), and he's got a lot of ideas...  

+Jey: Master Jedi of Development, he's the brain (and fingers) who's making the magic happen with Totm+Travl and iOS. He works on iOS and Web Development since he's able to type on a keyboard.

+Louis: Neo-Globetrotter and SAP Master (It'll be very useful when Padawanlab becomes a "Unicorn" :D ) Louis is our PR, store manager and webmaster (Jedi). He's also very talented to make us laugh (with very very bad jokes)

Congratulations, you read the full campaign and we're grateful.

It probably means you're really interested in Totm+Travl and think it worth the try. Please help us a little bit more by sharing this campaign with the world.

 

Follow our progress on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Pinterest! You can also subscribe to our newsletter on our website.

For any inquiries please Email us directly at hello@totmtravl.co

Download our press kit here

story:
Add Nurugo!


We are all young explorers constantly striving to live in a new world full of pleasant surprises and opportunities that we would like to share with our family and friends.

Nurugo Micro is not only for the benefit of researchers, scientists or medical professionals. Inquisitive children and young students can now also be part of discovering the microscopic world.  

Unleash the Scientist in you wherever you are while instantly sharing what you have discovered with the smallest microscope in the world via our Nurugo Box app.



Why Nurugo Micro?     

                     

Discovery begins with Nurugo Micro

Expand your horizon, Change your world. The only choice for expanding your world, Nurugo Micro. Use your smartphone as a mobile 400× microscope! Nurugo Micro makes you take amazing enlarged photos and videos with a high resolution. Simply attach Nurugo Micro to your smartphone and enjoy the world that cannot be observed with our naked eyes.  

     



Who is talking about us?

Potential use

It can be used in many profession where accurate changes and immediate research in actual field. With Nurugo. You don’t need complicated settings, immediately you can record images, use it for reporting. Even you can transfer recorded file to your colleague. It will help you save so much time and also change and improve your research quality. 

Plus, you can use it with any smartphone. You can check fabric,counterfeit, research natural resource so much more!. For example you can check how your carpet or even water from the tap is polluted. You can use it in commercial research and your everyday life the same time.

Researchers in laboratory/ Teachers who need it for science class/ Students who need it for assignments and reports / Parents who want an affordable microscope for their child
     


Nurugo Micro App - Nurugo Box

This awesome powerful feature allows you to use Nurugo Micro when you are working on a video and trying to get better video footage or to adjust the size of the subject with more ease and convenience or to send and share pictures or videos faster with friends and colleages. You will really love this app and use it widely in all your classes and teaching activities.

Step 2 : Turn on Nurugo Box Application


Test Clip

     


Structure & Technology


1) Dimension               


2) Structure & Technology

    


3) Fixing-ring

The Fixing-ring is designed to uniformly illuminate the object and is applicable to any type of smartphone. The Focus-guide is used to manually adjust the focus.



4) Lightguite

The Lightguide is designed to utilize the LED from the smartphone as a light source. It is designed to prevent the loss of light, producing high resolution images


Demonstration


1.Original Demonstration from iOS 

2.Original Demonstration from Android 

   

3.Who needs Nurugo Micro


 
      
        
       


How can I upload?

If you need additional mounting clips, pledge an accessory package or any package that includes accessories.

[Nurugo Package Comparison]

In order to upgrade premium package, please process $1 Premium Package Upgrade with Nurugo Micro purchase. 

We have added the Premium Package Perk to the Indiegogo project. Please note, this stand is not needed for Nurugo to work, it was designed as an useful accessory.

[Introductory movie about Premium Package]

     



How We Got Here!


1. Initial Sketch


2. Design in progress


3. Original Product Image


4. Product Color 

First product will be delivered either a Silver or Gold Color Nurugo Micro same to above. 

5. Factory 


People Behind

Q : Could you tell me about the product ? 

A : This is the world's smallest and lightest, high-resolution microscope with lighting control technology. Only 4 grams but can magnify up to 400 times! Real cutting edge technology. 

Q : What do you mean by lighting control? 

A : It means that this microscope actually transmits light evenly. With more light spread evenly, it enables you to see high resolution magnified images anywhere anytime. 

Q : How do you use it? 

A : By adding (or attaching) this microscope to your smartphone, you are ready to travel 400 times in the micro world.  You don’t need any extra power, and it doesn't take any cable setting time, you basically plug and play with it! Many problems like losing cable, battery shortage, difficulty to use products can happen with other products in the market. But not with our Nurugo Micro.

Q : Where do I use this product?

 A : It can be used in many profession where accurate changes and immediate research in actual field. With Nurugo. You don’t need complicated settings, immediately you can record images, use it for reporting. Even you can transfer recorded file to your colleague. It will help you save so much time and also change and improve your research quality. Plus, you can use it with any smartphone. You can check fabric,counterfeit, research natural resource so much more!. For example you can check how your carpet or even water from the tap is polluted. You can use it in commercial research and your everyday life the same time. Anyone can be a professional, this will show you micro world. One more thing. you can use Nurugo micro with check fake luxury goods. It has higher resolution than what professional taster. Can you believe it???

Q : Can you also record movies? 

A : Of course! You can snap shot, multi shot, movie during snapshot. You can just do anything. If you are into sharing your research with your colleagues(Friends), simply upload to SNS and share. You can check other research and share your work any time. Very efficient in saving time and work!. You can just share this micro world in real time!


Risk & Challenges

The Nurugo Micro team has 15+ years of product engineering experience in Optics. With our high passion for the project, Nurugo Micro has been running smoothly towards the end. We are currently preparing the production of Nurugo Micro at our factory and ready to meet the estimated delivery times. 

However, there are still aspects of this process that may fall outside of our control, Such as:

-Unexpected long component leading times

-Unexpected shortages

-Any shipping delays outside of our control 

Nevertheless, we have strong partnerships with every level of our supply chain and every member of the team is dedicated to delivering the best product on time.

The Nurugo Micro team has 15+ years of product engineering experience in Optics. With our high passion for the project, Nurugo Micro has been running smoothly towards the end. We are currently preparing the production of Nurugo Micro at our factory and ready to meet the estimated delivery times. 

However, there are still aspects of this process that may fall outside of our control, Such as:

-Unexpected long component leading times

-Unexpected shortages

-Any shipping delays outside of our control 

Nevertheless, we have strong partnerships with every level of our supply chain and every member of the team is dedicated to delivering the best product on time.

You don’t need complicated settings, immediately you can record images, use it for reporting. Even you can transfer recorded file to your colleague. It will help you save so much time and also change and improve your research quality. Plus, you can use it with any smartphone. You can check fabric,counterfeit, research natural resource so much more!. For example you can check how your carpet or even water from the tap is polluted. You can use it in commercial research and your everyday life the same time. Anyone can be a professional, this will show you micro world. One more thing. you can use Nurugo micro with check fake luxury goods. It has higher resolution than what professional taster. Can you believe it???
Q : Can you also record movies? 
A : Of course! You can snap shot, multi shot, movie during snapshot. You can just do anything. If you are into sharing your research with your colleagues(Friends), simply upload to SNS and share. You can check other research and share your work any time. Very efficient in saving time and work!. You can just share this micro world in real time!

Risk & Challenges





The Nurugo Micro team has 15+ years of product engineering experience in Optics. With our high passion for the project, Nurugo Micro has been running smoothly towards the end. We are currently preparing the production of Nurugo Micro at our factory and ready to meet the estimated delivery times. 
However, there are still aspects of this process that may fall outside of our control, Such as:
-Unexpected long component leading times
-Unexpected shortages
-Any shipping delays outside of our control 
Nevertheless, we have strong partnerships with every level of our supply chain and every member of the team is dedicated to delivering the best product on time.

However, there are still aspects of this process that may fall outside of our control, Such as:

-Unexpected shortages
-Any shipping delays outside of our control 
Nevertheless, we have strong partnerships with every level of our supply chain and every member of the team is dedicated to delivering the best product on time.

story:
About CLIKI Play

We accepted the Moto Mod challenge to bring you CLIKI Play, the Ultimate Moto Mod gamepad controller.  With the rapid growth in availability and complexity of gaming apps, touch screen controls just don't cut it anymore.  To get the precise control for fast action gaming, you need analog controls with hard-wired connection to your phone (faster and more reliable than Bluetooth).  Period.

CLIKI PLAY in the Press

CLIKI PLAY was voted #1 Moto Mod of the top 5 New Cool Moto Z Mods Gadgets in 2017.

It also made the list of Awesome Inventions of 2017 (only Moto Mod to make it!). 

 

Intelligent Design

The CLIKI Play Moto Mod is a sleek, streamlined design (thinner than a Nintendo 3DS) that will fit easily into your pocket, but built rugged enough to hold up to your most demanding lifestyle.  Some Moto Mods may restrict your access to the main camera lens.  Not so with the CLIKI Play.  The controller slides out of the way of the camera providing full view of the lens for that perfect shot.  Genius!   

 

Dual Flexibility

You chose the mode, either D pad or circle pad, to give you ultimate control.  We are also working on a new enhanced dual pad concept that we believe will offer additional flexibility.  Once we have vetted the design we will post an update to get your feedback and input. 

Maximize Your View

Using touch screen controls take up valuable display real estate on your Moto Z.  Yes...we know it sucks so support our CLIKI Play campaign to get your screen back!  

 

Extended Play

Battery life is the Achilles heel of mobile gaming, especially when you need your phone for other things, like social media and YouTube videos ...oh and calling your boss (yeah..we all have one of those!).  That's why we decided to add a built in LiION battery with power boost that will extend your gameplay by up to 75%.   Just snap on the CLIKI Play Moto Mod and power up..

 

 

Smart Features

The built in audio accessory port makes connecting a headphone for private gaming simple and convenient.  We even added audio controls so you can skip to your favorite battle song during your epic duel.

 

What We Need

We are very early in the development process and our funding request is just for what it takes to accomplish the following goals:

1) Complete functional prototypes to test the integration with the Moto Z platform,  

2) Get feedback and support from you to know if we have a winner and...

3) Impress the Moto Mod's team and earn a coveted spot as one of the finalist of Lenovo's "Transform The Smartphone Challenge" to help fund the development.  

Once we run a successful campaign and the prototypes are finished, we will update the campaign perks to include actual CLIKI Play products, whether or not we get funded by Lenovo.  

 

$50,000 Stretch Goal (New!)

As we move on to the next round as a GRAND PRIZE winner of Motorola's  "Transform the Smartphone" challenge we are closer to realizing our goal to complete development of the CLIKI PLAY gaming mod.  As such, we are adding new PERKS for production CLIKI PLAY units that will be available if we meet our stretch goal OR receive funding from Lenovo to complete development of CLIKI PLAY.   In the event that we cannot deliver your PERK as promised, we will return your PLEDGE amount (minus any fees from Indiegogo) upon request of a refund.

 

How You Can Help

We are in it to win it, but we cannot do it without you.  So here are a few ways how you can help us win the Moto Mod Challenge and bring CLIKI Play to you!

 

About Us

We believe in a simple philosophy, do what you love and love what you do.  We love creating amazing stuff!  Our team consists of seasoned engineers and industry leaders that left the corporate world to run a tech startup.  Combined we have developed and launched over 100 consumer and enterprise technology products to market (many of which most of you have probably owned or used at one time).   

Our founder and CEO, Wayne Phang, an immigrant from Jamaica, military veteran, engineer and entrepreneur,  founded Cane Wireless in 2014 and developed the CHAT-PAK wireless chat accessory for Nintendo 3DS.  CHAT-PAK was retailed at Amazon, Walmart, Newegg and other online retailers.

 

 

We also developed the CLIKI Smart Button (http://clikibutton.com) that recently launched and is available on Amazon Launchpad and was featured in top media outlets like CNET, YAHOO, PCWORLD and WIRED to name a few.  

 

How We Got Here

We went through many design concepts, many of which were just not feasible to manufacture, or would not be durable enough, or sleek looking enough, compromised your gaming experience or limit phone functionality.

After trying many different  design iterations, we finally settled on the design you see here.  We think it is functional, feasible and not fugly at all :)  We hope you like it as much as we do!  

*Pictures shown are non-functional prototypes

 

Delivery Plan

We are still in the early phases of the development process and have already  ironed out the look, features, fit, and functionality.  The hardware and software design is in progress and we will have fully functional prototypes soon.  Simply tell us you want it and we will build it!  Our expected delivery schedule is as follows:

 

Risks & Challenges

To say we know what it takes to bring a product from concept to market is an understatement. As many startups will attest, having a great idea and building a prototype is just the tip of the iceberg.  Even with our wealth of experience, each new project comes with its own set of challenges.  

From the design, to manufacturing , to sourcing and distribution logistics.  It can all be quite overwhelming.  But it's nothing we have not experienced before, so we set realistic goals, identify potential risks and plan ahead.  

We avoid major pitfalls by looking at the end-to-end process in our designs and what it takes to bring the product to market.  How will the features work, how will all the pieces connect together, will it be easy to manufacture, will we be able to source the parts in time, what regulatory requirements are needed etc.  

Of course, we cannot foresee every issue that could potentially cause a delay, but we are well prepared to handle just about any situation that comes our way.  We will provide frequent updates on our progress and will let you know immediately if something does go wrong.   In this business experience does matter...

Make a pledge now and help us get the CLIKI Play gaming Moto Mod into your hands!

story:
Introduction

WangGuard has been providing anti-splog (spam users) service for the last six years. During all this time, I've been taking care of the costs of the servers. Although there is a link for donations in the WordPress.org plugin’s page, only six people have made a donation over the last six years.

For the simple reason that I could not continue to pay for the servers, I was forced to close WangGuard a few days ago. But thanks to the support of a known hosting service, WangGuard can now continue with this vital community service.

Precedents

Since late 2004, I have been involved with WordPress. I originally specialized in WordPress Multisite and BuddyPress later on. Having many clients using both types of sites, I was forced to find an effective method to stop the sploggers. I began to develop an algorithm and a simple plugin which connected all websites of my clients. Later on, realizing the effectiveness and the necessity of reaching a critical mass of users, I started to invite acquaintances who used the same types of website settings and centralizing it on a server connected by an API. At the same time, I modified the plugin to work with normal WordPress installations. Effectiveness was started shooting up, it reached 80%, but it needed more, so I decided to change the API server and added a website with a registration process and then uploaded the plugin to WordPress.org, at that moment, WangGuard was born.

The first year WangGuard blocked 710,000 sploggers, the second year it reached 2,000,000 sploggers, the third year, it reached 15 million sploggers. Today, it has blocked more than 220 million sploggers and the effectiveness reached the 99%.

Purpose of WangGuard

The purpose of WangGuard is simple, remove Sploggers from anything which finish with ‘Press’. It is a service that has been protecting the WordPress websites from sploggers (spam users) for the last six years, and I hope it will keep doing it for a long time. But I'd like to improve things and add many new features. The TO-DO list of WangGuard is very long, and much remains to be done.

My dream has always been to try to keep the community protected and live only by donations (like Wikipedia), but until today, it has been impossible. In fact, those active users who have been using WangGuard for years, know that I’ve asked them a few times during the last years for how much they would pay for the service that WangGuard provides them. But I never took the decision of putting WangGuard as a premium plugin.

Purpose of this campaign

I’d like that WangGuard would be able to survive thanks to donations (like the Wikipedia and other open source projects models), so I’m opening this campaign now and one every year for the years to come. The amount needed corresponds to a year of work, spending some hours a day on plugin development, development of the servers API and user support.

In the last months, I’ve not been able to develop all I wanted for WangGuard, since I had to work hard in other projects to be able to pay for servers, mortgage, schools, etc. Because of this, there are two things I could not accomplish: Developing those new features I’d want for WangGuard and providing proper support to the users.

This fundraising campaign has been set up to improve WangGuard and to provide good quality support for all users.

Many people constantly ask me why I haven’t released yet any way so users can pay me for using WangGuard, and the honest truth is: I have always believed that WangGuard is a truly need and everyone deserve to use it for free. But, on the other hand, I can’t afford to keep paying all expenses for the maintenance of the best (in my opinion) anti-splog service. I need help, so there are four different ways: Donations from the WP community and active users, charging for the service, not advance anything in development or support, and finally close WangGuard.

From all of the above, the only one I'd really like is the first option, that users get involved. That implication can be by donating through this campaign or if you're a developer, you can also help me developing new features for the plugin on Github.

The goal of this campaign is to cover the expenses of a full year of my work to improve WangGuard and to keep providing support for free to all users. I’m not aiming to become a millionaire, just to be able to work and improve a service which has more than 20,000 active users per day with benefits for sites all around the world.

I’m asking for $35,000 of which I’ll have to pay the Indigogo commission, the Gateway commision and taxes.

story:
Who am I?

I am a talented young web developer & Wordpess expert from Norfolk, Virginia.  I've been developing websites since 1999 and using Wordpress since 2006.  

What is it?

Pressinar gives Wordpress bloggers the capability to implement and automate their webinars onto their Wordpress blogs without 3rd party scripts or services and NO MONTHLY FEES!

Why am I building it?


Recently, I was asked to host a webinar event; training other Wordpress bloggers on the ease and efficiency of using Wordpress plugins to enhance their blog's functionality, only to find that the task was not so easy to do. After extensive research I found there were no plugins that gave bloggers the capability to host webinars on their Wordpress blogs.  If I wanted to do the webinar event on my Wordpress blog I would have to use a 3rd party service or script like Go To Meeting/Webinar that charges up to $500 per month and uses their own website for hosting the webinar event which completely defeats the purpose of having your own website since you couldn't relay your message on it.   

Why do I need money? 


I have a precise plan and time line to build Pressinar. This campaign is all about pre-sales for funders. I want to bring this wordpress plugin to the public and I need your help to make this a reality. All donations will go towards launching this product. All contributors will get a copy of Pressinar. 

Want more info?


Check out the Pressinar website for feature list, project updates, blog posts, screenshots, etc. Also, sign up for updates via email at the website too! More information is being added everyday!

www.pressinar.com


(NOTE: We have fielded inquiries regarding our decision NOT to accept Paypal contributions and hopefully this explains it.  There were TWO factors used in our decision:

  1. Paypal policies are not the greatest when it comes to digital transactions
  2. More of your contributions actually go to funding the project and not to Paypal fees ($0.91 to $0.96 of every dollar goes to the project without Paypal compared to $0.57 to $0.62 of every dollar goes to the project with Paypal)

We apologize for the inconvenience.  We aware you may have concerns using Indiegogo's debit/credit card processing which we want to assure everyone that it is very secure.  As long as the address bar on the browser shows "https:" before the indiegogo url, the page is secure for providing your personal & debit/credit card information. Please keep in mind that if you DO NOT use this campaign to get the early bird pricing you will pay retail prices (up to $497US) for Pressinar when it is released on the website.  So take advantage NOW before this campaign ends.  Hopefully this answers everyone's concerns.)

story:
"The charging cable wasn’t really designed to be an accessory you carry around with you" - Yanko Design

 

BUT WITH NILS, YES YOU CAN! 

 

Made to be a fashion accessory with a strong functional purpose, the NILS is a bracelet when you want, and a charging cable when you need.  

 

Just Plug & Go!

 

Today, technology has already exceeded our most advanced expectations, and even still, someone finds a way to push it further. With the NILS, this is another example of technology being pushed further and further – it’s just what happens when real innovation meets modern technology.    

Familiar to you?!

 

The NILS 2.0 is the second generation of the popular NILS Wearable Charging Cable Bracelet. Completely redesigned, enhanced, and with added features, the NILS 2.0 is the charging cable of tomorrow, available for mobile users around the world today.   

Everyone knows the feeling when you’ve got a dead device and a broken charger cable – it’s either split open at the seams, has a broken USB head, is constantly tangled together, or it was dropped in a puddle and won’t charge your device – it’s dreadful! 

Today, NILS 2.0 is ready to once again turn the mobile industry on its head.  

 

NILS 2.0 features a better performance with 3.0A fast charging support – something that competing charging cable bracelets on the market simply aren’t capable of offering.     

Support Charging Up To 3A

 

Support Fast Charging

Built with 22/24 AWG wires (The smaller number indicates the bigger the wire = carry more current)

 

A more rounded edge and skin-friendly designed case offers users a more comfortable charging cable that can be worn as a bracelet around your wrist.   

 

The snap-proof tongue holds against the case so that the cable can’t snap accidentally.  

 

Case Comparison Between NILS 2.0 & NILS 1.0

 

We have not only kept the most popular colors from NILS 1.0 collection but also introduced the Two-Toned Braided Leather collection to our NILS 2.0 

*Not limited to the above colors

We will continue to use the Cruelty-Free Vegan Leather and we've handpicked the even more premium leather for the braiding.  

 

We will upgrade the surface finish to PVD coating for the casing - the same coating you found on the thousand dollars worth for watches.     

 

Our N52 Rare Earth Magnets have undergone a modification that secures them inside of the case now.  It will not get LOST again!  

 

What if your NILS expose to water when you wash hands or caught by rain? Simply dry it out thoroughly with soft cloth or tissue before using it. DO NOT bring in shower or pool.   

 

We understand that SIZE MATTERS. Half inch already matters a lot. Thus we offer 4 sizes for each model, Solo & Duo, from XS to XL, from wrist size of 5 7/8" to 8 3/4".


NILS is not only a charging cable that you can wear but also an EDC, an accessory to you.
NILS is probably the most personalized wearable charging cable in the market!   

 

Step Design - Built with Strengthened Material to lengthen the connector to fit most cases

 

NILSYGRIP™ - An ergonomic design for a better experience in using NILS

 

Available in Lightning, Type C(USB C) with 56k Ohm Resistor, Micro USB

 

Support different devices

 

NILS allows you to charge & sync your devices

 

Carry NILS with you for your adventure!      

 

 


 ... and more for you to unlock

*Difference between Solo & Duo is the length
 Solo can wrap around the wrist once 
 Duo can wrap around the wrist twice or even act as a necklace!

 

Say no to PLASTIC!

No more useless plastic box for the packaging. Every NILS will come with a dust bag to store your precious NILS ! And you could reuse it for other purposes too!     

 

PLA 3D Printing for NILS 2.0

 

Metal 3D Printing Prototype

 

 

Product Sketching

 

3D drawing

 

GUARANTEED SHIPPING 

 

SHIPPING NOW
story_txt: "The charging cable wasn’t really designed to be an accessory you carry around with you" - Yanko Design BUT WITH NILS, YES YOU CAN!  Made to be a fashion accessory with a strong functional purpose, the NILS is a bracelet when you want, and a charging cable when you need.   Just Plug & Go! Today, technology has already exceeded our most advanced expectations, and even still, someone finds a way to push it further. With the NILS, this is another example of technology being pushed further and further – it’s just what happens when real innovation meets modern technology.    Familiar to you?! The NILS 2.0 is the second generation of the popular NILS Wearable Charging Cable Bracelet. Completely redesigned, enhanced, and with added features, the NILS 2.0 is the charging cable of tomorrow, available for mobile users around the world today.   Everyone knows the feeling when you’ve got a dead device and a broken charger cable – it’s either split open at the seams, has a broken USB head, is constantly tangled together, or it was dropped in a puddle and won’t charge your device – it’s dreadful! Today, NILS 2.0 is ready to once again turn the mobile industry on its head.   NILS 2.0 features a better performance with 3.0A fast charging support – something that competing charging cable bracelets on the market simply aren’t capable of offering.     Support Charging Up To 3A Support Fast ChargingBuilt with 22/24 AWG wires (The smaller number indicates the bigger the wire = carry more current) A more rounded edge and skin-friendly designed case offers users a more comfortable charging cable that can be worn as a bracelet around your wrist.    The snap-proof tongue holds against the case so that the cable can’t snap accidentally.   Case Comparison Between NILS 2.0 & NILS 1.0 We have not only kept the most popular colors from NILS 1.0 collection but also introduced the Two-Toned Braided Leather collection to our NILS 2.0 *Not limited to the above colorsWe will continue to use the Cruelty-Free Vegan Leather and we've handpicked the even more premium leather for the braiding.   We will upgrade the surface finish to PVD coating for the casing - the same coating you found on the thousand dollars worth for watches.      Our N52 Rare Earth Magnets have undergone a modification that secures them inside of the case now.  It will not get LOST again!   What if your NILS expose to water when you wash hands or caught by rain? Simply dry it out thoroughly with soft cloth or tissue before using it. DO NOT bring in shower or pool.    We understand that SIZE MATTERS. Half inch already matters a lot. Thus we offer 4 sizes for each model, Solo & Duo, from XS to XL, from wrist size of 5 7/8" to 8 3/4".NILS is not only a charging cable that you can wear but also an EDC, an accessory to you.NILS is probably the most personalized wearable charging cable in the market!    Step Design - Built with Strengthened Material to lengthen the connector to fit most cases NILSYGRIP™ - An ergonomic design for a better experience in using NILS Available in Lightning, Type C(USB C) with 56k Ohm Resistor, Micro USB Support different devices NILS allows you to charge & sync your devices Carry NILS with you for your adventure!         ... and more for you to unlock*Difference between Solo & Duo is the length Solo can wrap around the wrist once  Duo can wrap around the wrist twice or even act as a necklace! Say no to PLASTIC!No more useless plastic box for the packaging. Every NILS will come with a dust bag to store your precious NILS ! And you could reuse it for other purposes too!      PLA 3D Printing for NILS 2.0 Metal 3D Printing Prototype  Product Sketching 3D drawing GUARANTEED SHIPPING  SHIPPING NOW

story:
Short Summary

We are a small group of book loving programmers who wanted a way to catalog our personal physical libraries online. While there are a few options out there, nothing met our requirements. We wanted to be able to make our library publically viewable, we wanted to share books we liked via social network, we wanted to be able to add books to a wish list via mobile phone. There were a whole slew of options that we wanted that didn't exist. So we thought, let's make it ourselves. After some careful planning we got started, and are moving forward quite rapidly!

What We Need & What You Get

  • To properly host this site we need a lot of space, a lot of memory, and a dedicated server. These aren't cheap, and without any revenue coming in, it's impossible to get started.
  • The maintenance costs with merchant accounts, and hosting are beyond our immediate reach.

Really we just need the "space" to get up and running. Depending on your contribution level, we give you a greatly reduced rate to our service!

story:
Hello friends and family!


As many of you know, I have been in great need of my own keyboard for quite some time. If you have seen me lead worship anywhere, the equipment I have used was always borrowed (of which I am extremely grateful to all those who have helped me in the past!) But I need my own gear so that I can take more steps in the direction I feel I should go!

Also, as a musician and songwriter, it is important to have access to your instrument for when inspiration hits or a song is being birthed in your heart. As of right now, I have no instrument of my own to fully work on all the songs and ideas I have had. It can be quite frustrating to have a spark of inspiration and then no outlet for the spark to breathe. Therefore, the spark is snuffed out!


So I am asking for help in the funding of my instrument. I have researched and played many keyboards, and this is the one to which I feel the greatest connection and desire for!

Here is a link to the info about it:


http://www.kraftmusic.com/catalog/keyboards/88keykeyboards/index.asp?product=6388

I thought it more wise to go with a bundle package, seeing that I would be getting more for the money than just a keyboard.


(i.e. if I bought the keyboard, I would need to buy separately an amp, and the appropriate chords, etc)

Remember, even the smallest amount helps! 


Actually lets put this into perspective:
I have 739 friends on Facebook. If they all gave just $6, it would completely meet and exceed the goal amount for this fundraising project! JUST $6!! A little goes a long way!

Now you may be wondering, "If the bundle price for the keyboard (before taxes) is $2,619.95, why is the goal amount $4,000?"


Well, because I want to bless an extraordinary cause

The remaining goal amount will be given to The Transformation Initiative. This is a cause and an organization very near and dear to my heart. The two women who run this organization (Joy Collins and Clara Wiggins) are amazing and are truly walking out the message and heart of Christ! Here is a little about them: 

TTI is a non-profit (501C3) organization which partners with local organizations in Kenya that work mostly with people affected by AIDS. They help support a feeding program that provides a meal a day for over 40 kids. A typical meal at the center would include beans and rice, ugali and vegetables or Silverfish and Cabbage. For many of the kids, it's the only meal they get each day.
They provide uniforms, shoes and school supplies for children so that they can go to school. In Kenya, primary education is free. However, children cannot attend unless they have a uniform, shoes and school supplies.
They also give away free solar flashlights. Most of the people they work with are living without electricity. The lights they distribute often serve as the only light source for the home.

http://www.transformationinitiative.org/default.asp

So please GIVE!! 
Thank You and Much Love to you all!!

Josif Walters

story:
We've all been there. You're late for a meeting or the kids are late for school and you wish to call for a polite gesture at some junction, a car behind you is tailgating or blinding with high-beam lights or you need to stop suddenly. The road so many times calls for some sort of communication between adjacent drivers and simply can't be done... because:

You can't shout while driving because... well you're in a car... and so are the other drivers.
You can't call other drivers because you don't know who they are or their contact details 
Honking only produces one sound and usually has a negative association.
 
So you usually end up looking like this...

Or like this....
 

 
 

Well.. Meet Ototok!

 

Introducing Ototok Color

As gratitude for your amazing support we now offer a limited edition colored version of OTOTOK. The case for this version will be custom colored and will otherwise be identical to the OTOTOK value.
 
 
 

 

Ototok is a device powered by a few LEDs, a micro-processor, some font files and a smartphone app. Ototok was designed for those craving for some human interaction while being stuck inside a tin box. Wouldn't it make your day if you could just for a second feel like you're making a difference? That you're not just another object in someone else's landscape?

If you want to get yourself out there and help making the road a bit safer and calmer you're in for in a treat. It is simple to install, easy to use and can make your day in 5 short steps!

  1. Install the sign on your back windshield and plug it into the power supply.
  2. Download the Ototok app from the Play Store or Apple Store.
  3. Pair your phone to the Ototok via bluetooth.
  4. Write something.
  5. (Optional) Use dedicated RF remote (TokMote) or activate voice control.
  6. Share it with the world!

 

Ototok enables automobiles to talk..  auto talk   ------->   OTOTOK!

Main features:

  • Connects via Bluetooth
  • Can be operated with your voice
  • Can be controlled with dedicated RF remote (TokMote)
  • Connects to car power socket
  • Vacuum suction connectors
  • Supports multiple languages
  • Can be read in direct sunlight up to 30 ft (10 meters)

 

Since the campaign, a lot has changed and progresssed. We finished the OTOTOK prototype eand started testing various designs and material types for the casing. We're working hard to push forward so that OTOTOK can start shipping as soon as possible. Any additional purchases will go towards improving the prouct and speeding up delivery by allowing us to hire more helping hands and improve our infastructure.
 
Things that can be sped up with the help of extra funds:
  1. Development of the IOS app
  2. Installing fonts for more languages
  3. Introducing a battery powered version
  4. and more...
 
 
 

 

This is a simplified version of our business plan. We want you to feel comfortable contributing to our cause. For this reason we planned this campaign carefully in order to make sure every cent is invested toward making this thing become real.

 

 

 

The story of OTOTOK is the story of the Paran family. Erez, my father, started working on the first prototype after being misunderstood by fellow drivers. This feeling of incapability to convey our own identity when covered by a tin mask haunts us all at different times on the great big road.

But my dad took matters into his own hands, After failing to find online a sign which is both easily programmable from your smartphone and cheap he decided to build one himself.

My family was charmed by the idea and we immediately chipped in whatever skills we had in order to get this product out into the world.

And that's how OTOTOK was born.

 

 

How is Ototok different from other products in the market?

Ototok is the first LED sign that connects with your phone vie bluetooth. Other similar products on the market require heavy tech skills and are much less user friendly.

Is Ototok safe?

Ototok is designed to minimize distractions. The TokMote allows sending a message without handling the phone while driving.

How can I use Ototok without my phone?

You can use the TokMote to send messages without a smartphone, but you will be limited to 4 default messages. You can edited these messages by connecting to your Ototok with your smartphone.

Why are you crowdfunding?

We think Ototok, at its core, is about people and we believe the best way to grow with it is by allowing you and everyone else be a part of our journey.

Who is behind Ototok?

The Ototok Team is based in Israel. You can read about us on the campaign page.

I want to develop my own app for Ototok. Where can I start?

Awsome! Developing for Ototok is straightforward, please contact us at info@ototok.com with "app development" in the subject and we'll give you all the details!

I'm interested in becoming a distributor, how can I contact you?

Please contact us at info@ototok.com with "Distributor – (Location)" in the subject.

 

 

The truth is, this thing is a lot more than a cool gadget. We honestly believe that an ototok sign that delivers a tiny message to the driver behind you, or a brief, polite gesture from the driver in front of you can indeed make our roads calmer and safer. Help us by sharing the campaign and spreading the word of OTOTOK.

story:
Why Ebb?

Every month, I undergo pre-menstrual symptoms bad enough to make me contemplate having my uterus removed, and I am not alone in this. How interesting that a phenomenon experienced by half the population is one so few talk about. In the US alone an estimated 70 million people menstruate every month. Large numbers of people still have misconceptions and misinformation about how their bodies, and more specifically how their cycles work. There is clearly a need for business models and powerful tools that can unite, educate, and honor those who menstruate.

Ebb is an app that rewards people for menstruating by giving them points for engagement with their cycles throughout each month. Points can be redeemed for products, services, and special offers. Subscribers have access to monthly perks, resources, and a larger community of menstruators. By rewarding each user’s awareness of their own body, transforming a topic that is normally taboo, and facilitating connections among users united by physiology, Ebb is not just a smart tool to improve every day life, but also a method of empowerment.

What We Need & What You Get

Umbra needs you to get our app off the ground:

  • $5,000 will allow us to put together market research and initial development of the application.
  • The campaign with the most support will have a better chance of winning the Duke Start-Up Challenge, which comes with a large prize and a lot of visibility.*
  • With your donation at any level, you will be eligible for one of our individualized gifts to give you a hint of what is in store when our app launches.

How Ebb Will Work:

Every time a user opens the app they receive information about where they are in their cycle and how that might affect their day and week. From there users can:

  • Log their personal symptoms using a multiple-choice menu.
  • View a projected summary of the next several months including menstruation and ovulation dates, and how they will correlate with the moon cycle.
  • View their symptom history and find patterns.
  • Link to articles and videos related to their symptoms.
  • Learn how the four hormones affecting menstruation typically ebb and flow over the course of the month.
  • Track their closest friends’ cycles, with permission, and provide mutual support and encouragement. 
  • See stats on other users: how many are synchronized and any information those users have chosen to share publicly. 
  • Share how they are feeling publicly, or just with close friends, with a status update or request for additional support (ie. chocolate or childcare).
  • Edit or add new items to their optional, monthly gift box** subscription.

As a user engages with the app they will receive points that can be put toward future purchases. These points can be redeemed for special offers, purchases from an in-app store, or subscriptions to gift boxes. Users can also transfer points to friends, or purchase gifts for friends in conjunction with their cycles or shared status information.

*While this project has been entered into the Duke Startup Challenge, and we are Duke students, it is not for a class. We fully intend to create this app, and build a strong company from the ground up.
**App users will all have the option to subscribe to gift boxes at several price points. As subscribers they will fill out a comprehensive intake form stating various personal and product preferences. They will then receive a box of goodies delivered directly to them on their projected menstruation date. A box might include chocolate, fruit, flowers, a new book, a pair of slippers, eco-friendly menstrual products etc. Like the “first period kits” that are gaining visibility with catchy commercials, these gift boxes would acknowledge that menstruation should be honored regularly and if nobody else is going to do it, we will.
