story:
Other iPhone Charging Solution

The Problem

 

Introducing

 

POP case is a revolutionary iPhone case for protection when you want it and power when you need it. With a super slim case to protect your phone and a detachable battery for on the go charging, POP case is the ideal solution to protect and charge your phone.

 

In the Press

 

Not Your Ordinary Case

 

Super Slim and Lightweight 

Unlike other power banks, POP case attaches perfectly on the back of your case so it won't hang or swing loosely. You won't even know it's there!

 

 

Designed for iPhone 6/6s/7/6s+/7+

 

Double Your Battery Life

With POP case, you can quick charge your iPhone to quickly double your battery on the go through a built-in 2000mAh for iPhone 6/6s/7 and 3000mAh for iPhone 6s+/7+. You’ll never have to worry about running out of power again!

 

Convertible 2-in-1 Design

Elegant 2-in-1 design transforms your POP case to what you need. It comes with a detachable battery pack that you can easily snap on the back of the case when you need an extra charge but can be removed if you wanted to travel more lightweight.

 

 

Compare to Other iPhone Battery Cases

POP case is about 4mm thinner than the other leading battery phone cases in the market (with the battery case on). With just the protective case, it adds only 1mm to your phone thickness!

 

 

 

Colors to Match your Style

Mix and match up to 8 color combinations to match your style. Select from our perk list and you will have an option to choose from 4 Protective Case color options (red, black, pink, and blue) and 2 Battery Module color options (black and white). 

 

Simplify your Every Day Carry

You can easily charge the battery module and your iPhone using just 1 lightning cable. No more carrying multiple charging cables.

 

Easy Access to All the Ports

Keep your lightning port free. Unique connector is removable and keeps your ports free for headphones.

 

 

Technical Specs

 

 

What's in the Box

 

 

 

*Battery Pack comes in Black and White

Slim. Powerful. Stylish. POP case.

 

 

 

 

 

Perks 

*Make sure you select the right iPhone version when choosing a perk! You will select the colors of the battery and the case at check out.

 

 

Help us Spread the Word

#POPcase

 

 

 

 

Timeline

 

 

R&D

 

 

Production

 

 

Meet the Team 

 

Colorii is a reliable company based in Shenzhen, China. With more than 10 years experience at products design and producion, we are aiming to provide high quality products with creative ideas in affordable price. 

All of Colorii products will comes with:

  • 1st class electronics components produce under the solid manufacture system
  • 1-year warranty for repair or replacement service
  • 3 times 100% quality checking during the full production process

Please check the details of  Colorii warranty terms here: http://colorii.cc/warranty/

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

1.Why did you choose flexible funding goal?

Colorii is a professional manufacturer for PC and Smart phone accessories. We already start the mold of POP case at May 2017. It is under firmware debug and trial production now, No matter the fund raising amount, we will complete POP case and ship to all of our backers!

2. When will POP case start shipping?

The mass production of POP case will start on June 2017 (the same time as Indiegogo campaign begins.) so we will start shipping from middle of July 2017 (about a week after we received the funds from Indiegogo).

3. What shipping service will you use?

For USA backers, we will use FedEx which will take approximately 4-10 days delivery time. 

For other countries, we will use Netherland Post which will take approximately 7-20 days of delivery time.

Notice that your country may charge you an import duty fee. This should be taken care of automatically by FedEx or Netherland Post when they deliver you the package. 

4. It's my first time on Indiegogo! How do I order?

It's super easy! Pick from the Perks list and click "Get This Perk". Select the color for your battery and case. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment. For more information on how to claim a perk, click here. 

For any questions not listed here, send us a message:

Distributors Inquiry: sales@colorii.cc

Customer Support: support@colorii.cc

Media Inquiries: media@colorii.cc
story_txt:
Other iPhone Charging SolutionThe Problem Introducing POP case is a revolutionary iPhone case for protection when you want it and power when you need it. With a super slim case to protect your phone and a detachable battery for on the go charging, POP case is the ideal solution to protect and charge your phone. In the Press Not Your Ordinary Case
 Super Slim and Lightweight Unlike other power banks, POP case attaches perfectly on the back of your case so it won't hang or swing loosely. You won't even know it's there!  Designed for iPhone 6/6s/7/6s+/7+ Double Your Battery LifeWith POP case, you can quick charge your iPhone to quickly double your battery on the go through a built-in 2000mAh for iPhone 6/6s/7 and 3000mAh for iPhone 6s+/7+. You’ll never have to worry about running out of power again! Convertible 2-in-1 DesignElegant 2-in-1 design transforms your POP case to what you need. It comes with a detachable battery pack that you can easily snap on the back of the case when you need an extra charge but can be removed if you wanted to travel more lightweight.  Compare to Other iPhone Battery CasesPOP case is about 4mm thinner than the other leading battery phone cases in the market (with the battery case on). With just the protective case, it adds only 1mm to your phone thickness!   Colors to Match your StyleMix and match up to 8 color combinations to match your style. Select from our perk list and you will have an option to choose from 4 Protective Case color options (red, black, pink, and blue) and 2 Battery Module color options (black and white).  Simplify your Every Day CarryYou can easily charge the battery module and your iPhone using just 1 lightning cable. No more carrying multiple charging cables. Easy Access to All the PortsKeep your lightning port free. Unique connector is removable and keeps your ports free for headphones.  Technical Specs
  What's in the Box   *Battery Pack comes in Black and WhiteSlim. Powerful. Stylish. POP case.     Perks *Make sure you select the right iPhone version when choosing a perk! You will select the colors of the battery and the case at check out.  Help us Spread the Word#POPcase    Timeline  R&D  Production

story:
Taking the Utica Comets fan experience to the next level!

As a Utica Comets fan I found out that just a Facebook page couldn't do all that should be done for the fans.  So with a website this is whats on the slate for now, and I can promise you we will continue to make it bigger and better as time goes on.

  • Articles about players, news, former players, staff and anything else under the sun.
  • Stats
  • A forum for anything and everything Utica Comets.
  • And much much more!

Explaining the costs.

Heres why its 880 dollars:

  • To build the website, we are hiring a professional programmer and web developer.  I don't want this site to look like some random hill jack made it. His rate for what we have planned is between 450-600.
  • The template that we will be using is roughly 50 dollars.
  • Hosting and domain costs for a year will be about 150 dollars a year.
  • 80 dollars is for fees indiegogo takes out.
  • If each fan of our page just donates 80 cents we will reach our goal

Over Funds

If we OVER shoot our goal we will keep this money an a account and use it for giveaways and/or other ways to give back to you fans.

  • If there is ever a trust issue, I will happy screenshot my Paypal account at any given time and show you that we didn't use the money for our own personal use.

Under Funds

We will use the funds we raise for giveaways next year.

#5thLine

story:
Tired of carrying multiple chargers, cables and plug adapters for all the devices you own? They make travelling so much of a hassle, unnecessarily taking space in your luggage. Wouldn't you want one charger for everything?

Meet Mr. Charger - The all-in-one portable power charger with cords and travel adaptors for your global travel.


 

  • $29 Average price for a 10,000 mAh portable battery
  • $19 Average price for a wall charger
  • $29 Average price for 3 plug adapters
  • $19 Average price for an MFI certified lightning cable

 

       

 

4-In-1 Charger

Mr. Charger combines a wall charger with a portable battery, a built-in MFI Lightning cable, USB-C and USB-A ports,  and includes 3 plug adapters. This makes Mr. Charger the perfect companion for travelling and business trips.

 



Phone | Tablet | Laptop | AirPods | Smart Watch | Nintendo Switch

With a built-in Lightning cable, USB-C and USB-A ports, Mr. Charger can charge up to 3 devices simultaneously.
 

Travel Friendly 

Get everything you need in one package. Have all the features and items integrated perfectly in an awesome product.
 

Charge Your Phone 2.4 times Faster

Stock Charger（5W）15% charged in 30 minutes
Mr. Charger（12W）40% charged in 30 minutes
 

Mr. Charger charges 2.4 times faster than a stock iPhone charger. With a 12W output, it charges up 40% in just half an hour.
 

Robust Built-in Apple MFI Lightning Cable 


 

Seamlessly wraps around the battery when not in use, the built-in MFI cable doubles as a handle for greater portability.

Apple MFI certification ensures the built-in cable to work flawlessly with iPhones, iPads and iPods.
 

International Travel Adapters Included

3 included plug adapters, that are easily swappable and slide perfectly on the foldable US plug. UK, EU and AU standard plugs. 

British Standard Plug: UK, Singapore, Maldives, Pakistan, United Arab Emirates

European Standard Plug: Germany, Denmark, Finland, France, Netherlands, South Korea, Portugal, Norway

Australian Standard Plug: New Zealand, Australia
 

Flow-Through Charging

Priority charging for your plugged in devices until full, then recharging Mr. Charger itself.

Globally Compatible: With 100-240V power output range, Mr. Charger delivers the fastest and safest charging speed for all charging standards.
 

Safety First

Mr. Charger uses a 9 protocol safety system, to deliver the fastest charging speeds in a safe and risk-free way. Protecting you and your devices.
 

 

Power Status LED Indicator

Check power levels with a simple touch.
 

Fire-Proof Casing

Unprecedented durability with V0 flammability standard materials.
 

What you get with Mr. Charger 

 

Color Options


 

Stretch Goal

AC Output                          100-240V～50、60Hz Max 0.45A

Lightning Output            5V/2.4A Max

Type-C Output                 5V/3A Max

USB-A Output                 5V/3A Max

Size                                      88x29x89mm

Capacity                           10,000 mAh / 37 Wh

Super Fast Delivery
We Just Finished Pilot Batch Production!

 

We Need Your Help For Mass Production! 

Our goal is set. Let’s reach it together.

 

We’re done with prototyping and are currently optimizing parts, configurations, and logistics. To start up mass production, we have set a goal of $10,000 for this campaign. We want to take this product to the next level and get even more people out on the saddle.

With this said, everyone who helps us in the making of the Mr. Charger will get it at less than 1/2 the retail price – and will be the first to be offered exclusive, premium perks as well as VIP access to the upcoming website.

When we launch a new product with crowdfunding, every step of our progress is inseparable from your support - this motivates us to do right by all of our backers and provide you with the best possible product we can. Wherever we go, our plan is clear: think outside the box to create innovations that benefit the world.

Let more people know how cool the project you are backing now! We really appreciate your love and support. Go share and win the 8% cash back!

All you need to do is:

  1. Click the button and register as a Booster.
  2. Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!
  3. Refer to your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your commissions roll in!

Click the button and register as a Booster.
Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!
Refer to your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your commissions roll in!

story:
Are you tired of having to pay top dollar for a new smartphone every year? Wish you could get high-end specs for the price of a budget daily driver smartphone?

The Elephone PX offers all the advanced specs and functionality of a high-end phone but for a fraction of the cost of flagship phones. It is the ultimate smartphone, providing the newest Android OS, next-gen tech with its pop-up camera, a true full-screen with no bezels, a massive battery and so much more. It’s time you started enjoying a powerful smartphone without paying top dollar. The PX is here to make your daily smartphone usage smart again at a smart price.

 


PX’s massive 6.34” LCD HD+ FULL screen is one of the largest ever made. Enjoy your videos, photos, and daily browsing on a large, visually stunning screen offering a 720 x 1480 resolution!


Most current smartphones are trying to maximize their screens and screen-to-body ratios, but they are not truly full screen due to large notches and bezels housing their front-facing cameras.  However,  Elephone has built the PX without any bezels to be a true screen experience at an affordable price - making it unique among current smartphones.

You’ve never seen a front-camera like this. Sliding into the top of the phone, the PX camera doesn’t take any screen space and pops in and out of the phone. The mechanical motor powering the camera is highly durable, and is tested and rated for 300,000 uses or 5 years of daily use!

 

Using 16-megapixel dual rear cameras the PX simulates human binocular vision, giving you the ability to capture three-dimensional images and videos in stunning clarity. And the advanced brightness and noise controls ensure beautiful images are always taken.

Further, it allows for additional aperture as it provides an extra opening for light to enter and hit sensor making your PX perform better in low light while ensuring images will be sharp and loss in details will be minimum.

 

Here is our Elephone PX review. 

The Elephone team is dedicated to providing support and accessibility for the PX across the globe. The PX will be fully unlocked and will have support across more than 100 countries across Europe, Asia and North America and over 1000 carriers.


Before the campaign is concluded and shipping begins, we will reach out to each backer with a survey to ensure that the PX will work in your home country and for your carrier. If your local carrier does not support the PX then we will refund your money.

The Elephone PX will ship as separate versions supporting different bands - 1 for the EU/Asia and the other for Americas.

Countries Carriers
USA AT&T, Verizon, T-Mobile, Sprint, ...
Canada Bell, Rogers, Fido, ...
UK O2, Vodafone, EE, 3(Three), ...
German Telekom, Vodafone, O2, E-Plus, ...
France ORANGE, SFR, BOUYGUES, Telecom, ...
Additional Euro Countries TIM, Swisscom, KPN, Comviq, E-plus, T Mobile , ...
SIG Singtel, Starhub, Mobile One, ...
HK PCCW, 3HK, Smartone, CMHK, UnicomHK, ...
South America Entel, Claro, Movistar, ...
... ...


If you can’t find your carrier in the chart above please check the Band Details section below in our Tech Specs Portion of the campaign to see if your carrier's band is compatible.

OR

Visit https://www.frequencycheck.com/countries and manually cross-reference the available bands in your home country to see if they are compatible with the Elephone PX.

Make the holidays even more special AND stay ahead of the times with the Elephone’s Watch 3 - an IP67 waterproof smartwatch to pair with your new Elephone PX! Get your very own advanced smartwatch for a discounted price when you purchase an Elephone PX.

If any of our current backers are interested in getting the Watch 3 please email us at elephonepx@gmail.com to receive a special discount on your Elephone Waterproof smartwatch!The Elephone Watch 3 is an IP67 waterproof smartwatch providing you with everything from heart-rate monitoring to weather updates to keep you ahead of the times.

Check out for yourself just what it can do:

Smooth Performance with Mediatek

PX uses an 8core, 64bit industry-leading Mediatek™ processor chip to power through demanding apps and games to provide you with a smooth experience.


4GB RAM & 128GB ROM

PX ensures smooth performance, whether you’re gaming, taking photos, or watching videos thanks to its 4GB of RAM, 128GB ROM of storage.

PX is also built with a TF/Micro-SIM slot allowing you to expand the internal memory by up to 400GB.


3500mAh Battery

Enjoy a long battery life with PX’s massive 3500 mAh Battery.

 

Using the newest Android OS, the PX offers the latest in user utility. Pie allows for adaptive battery and app usage brings stronger security measures to users, and allows for higher customization on your phone. And the best part is Elephone is dedicated to delivering quick updates to keep your PX running optimally.

The PX arrives with an advanced fingerprint sensor, allowing you to unlock your phone in under half a second. It further provides additional security by removing the need for a password or pin to give you more convenience.

 

Along with the fingerprint scanner, the PX has a built-in heart rate sensor. The heart rate sensor measures your heart rate in Beats per Minute using an optical LED light source and an LED light sensor. The light shines through your skin allowing the sensor to measure the amount of light reflecting back. The light reflections vary as blood pulses under your skin past the light, and these variations are translated into Beats per Minute.

When the PX is synced with a compatible app, it can provide you with accurate information regarding heart rate and calories burned.

 

The more you use the PX, the more you'll notice the delicate thought and effort put into the design to set it apart from other smartphones. Each detail, from its silky frosted surface, to its rounded corners, to its bezel-less full screen, works to create an unrivalled user experience.

 

Decide between Midnight Black or Deep Green for your PX’s finish!

 





Dimensions:  157.9 x 78.9 x 9.6mm
Weight: 208g

Processor
CPU Processor MTK 6762 (P22)
CPU Core + Speed 8 core (Cortex-A53*4 2.0GHz /A53*4 1.5GHz)
Display
Screen Size (inches) 6.34” 19：9 HD+
Screen Resolution 720*1480
Memory
RAM 4GB
ROM Size 128GB
Expanded Memory Yes (TF/MicroSD up to 400 GB)
Camera
Rear Camera Resolution 16MP + 2MP on secondary camera
Rear Camera Auto Focus Yes
Rear Camera Flash Yes
Front Camera Resolution 16MP + 2MP on secondary camera
Front Camera Auto Focus Fixed Focus
Network
SIM Card Type Nano SIM + Nano SIM / TF
SIM Card Quantity 2
WLAN 2.4G，5G
GPS Yes
AGPS Yes
Bluetooth 4.0
Unlocked on Arrival Yes
Network Bearer
Cellular GSM/WCDMA/TD-SCDMA/TDD/FDD/CDMA
Band Details (Europe & Asia) GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8
WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8
TDD-LTE: B40/B41
FDD-LTE:B1/B3/B5/B7/B8/B20
Band Details (America) GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8
WCDMA: B2/B4/B5/B8
FDD-LTE:B2/B4/B5/B7/B12/B17/B28b
Connectivity
Receiver Yes
Mic Yes
Headphone Jack TYPE-C
Bluetooth Yes
USB Version USB-C
Battery
Battery Capacity 3500mAh 4.4V
Quick-Charge 5V/2A
Other
Sensors G-Sensor, P-Sensor, L-Sensor, Gyroscope, Compass, Heart-Rate Sensor
OTG Yes
USB Type C
FM Yes
Fingerprint Fingerprint Scanner
Flash Light Yes
Material Aluminum Strip + Plastic
Color Black and Green
Power Adapter AC Power Charger Adapter (100~240V)
OS Android 9.0



Win Free Accessories Whenever you someone backs Elephone PX With Your Link!


The Referral program runs until February 1st (right before we begin shipping) so you can still acquire free accessories (or a refund on the ones you’ve already purchased) even after we’ve finished crowdfunding.

 

REWARDS

Thank you for helping us spread the word!

NOTE: The appearance of the earbuds is subject to change depending on changes in design and development

 

HOW DO I START?



Sign up or log into your Indiegogo account.

ack Back the Elephone PX through any of our perks.


Once you back the PX you can find your unique link on the button beside the “Back It” Button
Share your link and start collecting accessories!
 

HOW DO I TRACK MY REFERRAL?

  1. Log into Indiegogo.
  2. Click on your username at the top right of the page.
  3. In the dropdown list, select the ‘My Contributions’.
  4. Select ‘Referrals’ in menu tab.


You will see how many people you referred, the number who have purchased and the total amount of their contributions.  
 

HOW DO I GET REWARDED?

Once you’ve referred someone, send us a screenshot of the referral to elephonepx@gmail.com​

We will then make sure your accessories are shipped with your Elephone PX in February or provide refunds to those accessories you have purchased.

Don’t miss your chance to make the holidays special by saving big AND getting a new smartwatch that will make your Elephone PC experience even better.



Established in 2006 and headquartered in Shenzhen, Guangdong, China, ELEPHONE Communication Technology Co., Ltd. is one of the largest Chinese smartphone producers. ELEPHONE is committed to developing high-end smartphones and making it affordable to global customers.

Since our inception we have created a large variety of smartphones and smart devices  to meet our users needs. Some of our most successful products have been:

The Elephone Vowney 
The Elephone A Series (A1, A2, A3)
The Elephone P Series (P60, P8 3D, PX)
The Elephone W Smartwatch series (W1,Band 5, W5)

Our main focus is on producing innovative and user-friendly smartphones with elegant design, premium build quality, and superior performance. After years of development, ELEPHONE is characterized with strong brand awareness throughout the world and we’ve formed our own style of management and production. We are the very first manufacturer that has set up maintenance service centres in Russia, Spain, United Kingdom, and Germany, to better provide reliable guarantees and service to our customers.

You can find out more information regarding Elephone and our previous products on our homepage:  https://www.elephone.hk

We are offering FREE  worldwide shipping, however VAT and GST will not be included in the price and backers will have to pay the associated fees for their own country of residence, but we will cover all other shipping and handling fees!

We plan to ship the Elephone to all of our backers in February 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary but we will keep you notified as to the status of your order.

Elephone is an established company with over 10 years in producing and bringing devices to market, and we have an established production and shipping system. We are confident in our capability to deliver the PX to backers. Keep in mind that Elephone will never be offered at these discounts again. By backing now you'll also be one over the very first to get and use the Elephone PX Smartphone.

If you can’t find your carrier in the chart above please check the Band Details section below in our Tech Specs Portion of the campaign to see if your carrier's band is compatible. ORVisit https://www.frequencycheck.com/countries and manually cross-reference the available bands in your home country to see if they are compatible with the Elephone PX.Make the holidays even more special AND stay ahead of the times with the Elephone’s Watch 3 - an IP67 waterproof smartwatch to pair with your new Elephone PX! Get your very own advanced smartwatch for a discounted price when you purchase an Elephone PX.If any of our current backers are interested in getting the Watch 3 please email us at elephonepx@gmail.com to receive a special discount on your Elephone Waterproof smartwatch!The Elephone Watch 3 is an IP67 waterproof smartwatch providing you with everything from heart-rate monitoring to weather updates to keep you ahead of the times.Check out for yourself just what it can do:Smooth Performance with MediatekPX uses an 8core, 64bit industry-leading Mediatek™ processor chip to power through demanding apps and games to provide you with a smooth experience.4GB RAM & 128GB ROMPX ensures smooth performance, whether you’re gaming, taking photos, or watching videos thanks to its 4GB of RAM, 128GB ROM of storage.PX is also built with a TF/Micro-SIM slot allowing you to expand the internal memory by up to 400GB.3500mAh BatteryEnjoy a long battery life with PX’s massive 3500 mAh Battery.  Using the newest Android OS, the PX offers the latest in user utility. Pie allows for adaptive battery and app usage brings stronger security measures to users, and allows for higher customization on your phone. And the best part is Elephone is dedicated to delivering quick updates to keep your PX running optimally.The PX arrives with an advanced fingerprint sensor, allowing you to unlock your phone in under half a second. It further provides additional security by removing the need for a password or pin to give you more convenience. Along with the fingerprint scanner, the PX has a built-in heart rate sensor. The heart rate sensor measures your heart rate in Beats per Minute using an optical LED light source and an LED light sensor. The light shines through your skin allowing the sensor to measure the amount of light reflecting back. The light reflections vary as blood pulses under your skin past the light, and these variations are translated into Beats per Minute.When the PX is synced with a compatible app, it can provide you with accurate information regarding heart rate and calories burned. The more you use the PX, the more you'll notice the delicate thought and effort put into the design to set it apart from other smartphones. Each detail, from its silky frosted surface, to its rounded corners, to its bezel-less full screen, works to create an unrivalled user experience. Decide between Midnight Black or Deep Green for your PX’s finish! Dimensions:  157.9 x 78.9 x 9.6mmWeight: 208g

Win Free Accessories Whenever you someone backs Elephone PX With Your Link!
The Referral program runs until February 1st (right before we begin shipping) so you can still acquire free accessories (or a refund on the ones you’ve already purchased) even after we’ve finished crowdfunding. REWARDSThank you for helping us spread the word!NOTE: The appearance of the earbuds is subject to change depending on changes in design and development HOW DO I START?Sign up or log into your Indiegogo account.ack Back the Elephone PX through any of our perks.Once you back the PX you can find your unique link on the button beside the “Back It” ButtonShare your link and start collecting accessories! HOW DO I TRACK MY REFERRAL?
Log into Indiegogo.
Click on your username at the top right of the page.
In the dropdown list, select the ‘My Contributions’.

Select ‘Referrals’ in menu tab.

You will see how many people you referred, the number who have purchased and the total amount of their contributions.   HOW DO I GET REWARDED?Once you’ve referred someone, send us a screenshot of the referral to elephonepx@gmail.com​We will then make sure your accessories are shipped with your Elephone PX in February or provide refunds to those accessories you have purchased.Don’t miss your chance to make the holidays special by saving big AND getting a new smartwatch that will make your Elephone PC experience even better.Established in 2006 and headquartered in Shenzhen, Guangdong, China, ELEPHONE Communication Technology Co., Ltd. is one of the largest Chinese smartphone producers. ELEPHONE is committed to developing high-end smartphones and making it affordable to global customers.Since our inception we have created a large variety of smartphones and smart devices  to meet our users needs. Some of our most successful products have been:The Elephone Vowney The Elephone A Series (A1, A2, A3)The Elephone P Series (P60, P8 3D, PX)The Elephone W Smartwatch series (W1,Band 5, W5)Our main focus is on producing innovative and user-friendly smartphones with elegant design, premium build quality, and superior performance. After years of development, ELEPHONE is characterized with strong brand awareness throughout the world and we’ve formed our own style of management and production. We are the very first manufacturer that has set up maintenance service centres in Russia, Spain, United Kingdom, and Germany, to better provide reliable guarantees and service to our customers.You can find out more information regarding Elephone and our previous products on our homepage:  https://www.elephone.hkWe are offering FREE  worldwide shipping, however VAT and GST will not be included in the price and backers will have to pay the associated fees for their own country of residence, but we will cover all other shipping and handling fees!We plan to ship the Elephone to all of our backers in February 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary but we will keep you notified as to the status of your order.Elephone is an established company with over 10 years in producing and bringing devices to market, and we have an established production and shipping system. We are confident in our capability to deliver the PX to backers. Keep in mind that Elephone will never be offered at these discounts again. By backing now you'll also be one over the very first to get and use the Elephone PX Smartphone.

story:
Not sure if people you care about use their phones while driving?  They do.  A recent study reported by Wired Magazine revealed that virtually everyone uses their phone behind the wheel.  Is it any surprise that 60% of teen accidents are due to using a phone while driving?  It shouldn’t be.

If the people you care about are going to use a phone while driving, then let’s at least make it safe to do so.  Our product, SafeConnect is the safest possible product for controlling your phone while driving since it has no view screen.  A recent study by AAA revealed that using a view screen in the car is even more dangerous than using your phone.  SafeConnect provides a way for drivers to use apps & features of their phones while keeping their eyes totally focused on the road, hands on the wheel, and phones in their pockets.  Our Deluxe model does the same thing, but also provides auditory & tactile stimulation to keep drivers from zoning out at the wheel (a.k.a. falling prey to “highway hypnosis”).  This is especially important during a solo drive or a long drive.

Since any driver can cause you to be in a wreck, both of our products are offered at an affordable price: the roads really aren’t safe unless everyone can afford a safe connectivity option in their car.  Nothing is more important than saving lives.

 

Imagine

 

Freedom to Connect while Driving (FB, texts, phone calls)

Dictate Facebook messages for friends and post on their walls.  Hear FB messages, how many likes you’re getting, or posts from your Facebook feed dictated to you.

Yes, even without a screen, SafeConnect works with Facebook.  SafeConnect also lets you make & receive phone calls, hear your text messages, and dictate and send your own text messages.  With so many ways to stay connected, you can feel like you’re with your friends even when you’re driving alone.

 

Never feel lost again

Find the best restaurant according to Yelp or the cheapest gas station nearby and then hear turn-by-turn directions that avoid traffic.  Get sports scores, weather, and use other Google Now features.  Any app on the user’s phone is potentially compatible (and we are constantly working to make more apps compatible).

 

Putting It All Together: Affordable Safety

Most of the drivers who cause phone-related accidents couldn't afford to pay $400 to have safer connectivity in their car (going rate for connectivity options).  Our solution ($169, but as little as $69 on Indiegogo) is much less expensive than the competitors, safer than the competitors (since we keep total visual focus on the road & hands on the wheel), and more versatile than the competitors (since we seek to work with every app already on your Android phone).

Here's how it works:

  • Both SafeConnect and the Deluxe model clamp onto any steering wheel in seconds
  • The connection happens automatically when SafeConnect is turned on, the app is running on your phone, & your phone is within range of SafeConnect
  • Over Bluetooth, the driver can control apps & features on his Android phone by pushing buttons on SafeConnect & dictating requests

 

What we have so far

We have working prototypes and four apps are working with the product.  Note that photographs are pictures of the prototypes, and the final design will be more streamlined.

Apps working so far:

Apps in development (in priority order):

Let us know which apps are important to you. We listen to our customers!

 

Deluxe Drums

The Deluxe model puts 8 drum kit sounds on your steering wheel.  Benefits:

  • Stay alert on long solo drives; Fights Zoning Out at the wheel (Highway Hypnosis) by providing auditory & tactile stimulation
  • Deluxe has all SafeConnect Features
  • Deluxe has 8 additional sensors for playing drum sounds from a standard drum kit
  • Makes your car music interactive
  • Hear your drum rendition with your music on your car speakers
  • Allows for jamming with your favorite musicians
  • Unlocks additional functionality for apps such as "Smack Trivia" and "Smack Languages"

 

The team

We have a great team working to make this happen.

Gregor Hanuschak has an MBA from the MIT Sloan School of Management, and degrees in engineering from both Stanford and Harvard Universities. He was a founder or original employee for 3 other startups before this one and used to work as the Lead for Commercial Space Partnerships at NASA Headquarters. On the technical side, Gregor has successfully built electronic musical instruments & equipment, robots, and parts of satellites that were launched into space.  He was formerly an engineer at Lockheed Martin (flight software for satellites / satellite simulators) and he built the initial hardware and software for SafeConnect and the Deluxe model.

Other team members include an industrial designer, 10 student developers, 4 marketing students, technical experts from NextFab Studio in Philadelphia, advisers with experience manufacturing electronic consumer products, and a reputable manufacturer ready to do our mass production (Cir-Q-Tek, www.cir-q-tek.com/) who has done manufacturing orders for large well-known car companies.  Since one of our teammates is a patent attorney, we even have an issued patent and one patent pending on our technology. 

 

What we need

We’re looking to raise money so that we can pay our manufacturing partner to create the molds for our plastic injection molding of our plastic parts & set up an assembly line for us.  We have a great product here with a price point far below anything else that's similar on the market.  The price point is significant because the roads really aren't safe until every driver who uses his phone while driving can afford a safe connectivity option.  Please support us so we can make our roads safer. Let's make it happen!

story:
FAQs

 

How long does it take to charge positive power bank?

6 hours with a 2.1A charger

When will I get my positive power bank?

Once the campaign is over in early November, we will start to ship to America, Europe, Asia and rest of the world. 

How do i customize my positive power bank?

You will receive an email invitation by October for customization instructions.

 If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us at support@yipandbeep.com

Is shipping included? 

Shipping is free for orders over USD$100.

(Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries)

Is there a warranty for positive power bank?  

Yes, positive power bank comes with a one-year replacement warranty

Can I buy positive power bank parts separately?

You will be able to buy Stow&Go Cable, Apple Lightning switch tip, USB-C switch tip, Tap&Go Mat, Vinyl Stickers separately at www.yipandbeep.com （available after the Indiegogo campaign).

story:
Radio communication in your Smartphone!

When I was a child, I dreamt about a little box that would allow me to interact with any electronic device wirelessly. It was only a dream, the advance in technology didn’t exist until recently to do all signal decoding in software. Until now! As soon as I discovered Moto Mod concept and Transform the Smartphone Challenge, I knew immediately, that it's finally the right time to make my child dream real: To create the SDR Moto Mod that can receive and analyze unknown radio communication and interact with various radio communication systems.

Other Smartphones

The intended SDR Moto Mod is developed especially for Motorola Z phones, however a version for other smartphones is planned as well. If you like the idea, please continue reading and support this campaign!

How it works

Different applications of the Software Definer Radio (SDR) Moto Mod are possible:

Interact with Radio Systems

SDR Mod includes universal narrow-band transceiver for digital communication. You can select frequency, modulation and other parameters in order interact with radio systems (both send and receive!). It is planned to support and certify the device for different protocols and bands, such you can use the SDR Mod as a remote controller, IoT gateway, or without any limitation in the “open HAM mode”.

Global Digital Communication without Internet

You can text or exchange data with an another smartphone that is equipped with a SDR Moto Mod. You can even use the SDR Mod for satellite reception! We are currently researching the possibility to support some global networks like Outernet.

As an Universal remote Controller

You can use the SDR Moto Mod to control your home appliance!

For this specific use-case, a separate campaign has been lunched (as the target audience differs significantly ;-)

IoT without Internet

You can use the SDR Moto Mod to connect directly with your local "Internet of Things" network and analyze data within.  Without internet access, without WLAN gateways!

Analyze Unknown Signals

Using the embedded wide-band SDR receiver, you can monitor the whole radio spectrum, analyze unknown signals and listen to various services. The system is compatible with the RTL SDR based receivers, so 3rd party software can be used:

Just have fun

SDR Mod can also receive FM, AM, DVB-T or other public services!

Currently, not every service is supported by an App on the Android system. But if you want to receive a new type of radio communication, you need just new software, not hardware!

Features and Benefits

The SDR Moto Mod consists of an wide-band SDR receiver, that is compatible with RTL SDR dongles for great compatibility with 3rd party apps, and an universal narrow-band digital communication transceiver that acts as a standard serial interface to the android system.

Further features:

  • Wide-band RX Range (SDR): Approx. 50-1500 GHz (to be clarified)
  • Narrow-band TX/RX Range: 27-1050 MHz
  • Integrated battery
  • Internal & External antenna
  • Firmware control of the accessible radio frequency bands in order to fulfill regulatory and legal requirements
  • Existing Android Apps and SDR community

What We Need & What You Get

Do you want to own such a device as well? Off-the-shelf? Then, carry on reading!

Now, one should promise a final product in a year, right? I could do that, and show some fancy diagrams and pictures of the prototype and ask for money. But let's slow down.

My professional experience includes development of products – from concept, over development, to product launch and marketing. And also, I am aware how important it is to understand the voice of customers and iterate design specifications early. It would be great to really understand your needs:

  • Do you indeed require the TX functionality?
  • Do you need an internal battery for longer operational time?
  • Do you want a pre-amplifier? Or an input filter bank?
  • What is your intended application? HAM? Fun? Research?
  • Do you prefer a finalized Moto Mod or would be a MDK module satisfactory?
  • …

Everything is possible, but it will also influence the final price. Furthermore, a possible cooperation with Motorola could lower the price even more (i.e. re-use of the existing casing). Sounds good, doesn't it?

Hence, within this campaign, I am asking for donations for further development of the prototype. The funds will be used solely to cover some costs of the development. But what is even more important: your contribution will prove me and Motorola that there is a real demand for this product!

The prototype design will be released as open-source (with some limitation due to eventual NDAs).

If global demand for this product will be shown, the end-price will be announced. At that point, a new campaign extension will be launched, with final products as its perks. Hopefully we get also Motorola as a partner, as this campaign participates in the Transform the Smartphone Challenge.

Prototype

Currently, the concept of the wide-band receiver was tested (using R820T2 + RTL2832U over internal USB) with the SDRTouch Android App, as shown in the video below.

 

The narrow-band transceiver concept is currently under development. The ONSemi AX5043 chip seems to be very promising for the desired application.

The design of the printed circuit board (PCB) of the narrow-band transceiver board is attached:


The design is freely accessible on GitHub!
https://github.com/vbouse/SDR_Radio

Timeline

11/2016: Applied for the Motorola Transform the Smartphone Challenge
12/2016: Selected as a "finalist" in the competition
01/2017: Received the Moto MDK and started working on a prototype
02/2017: First designs released on the GitHub
03/2017: The project is now sponsored by Arrow Electronics!

All the Transform the Smartphone Challenge campaigns will be reviewed by Motorola on March 6, 2017.

The prototype is continuously developed further, you may expect the release of the final version by September.

Meanwhile, please consider the small donation to indicate your interest!

Risks & Challenge

The goal of this campaign is to finalize the development and prepare the product for the serial production. Some parts of the system are still covered by NDAs and only partially known.

Some modification in order to fulfill user needs may be necessary.

Please note that your local law might apply and limit usage of this product. You might be not allowed to use some radio services, or you you might be required to own a specific license.

In order to produce a Moto Mod end-customer product instead of the module for the Proto Mod, support of Motorola will be required (certification, sourcing of the special connectors, tooling, cooperation). There is a great chance to get this within the Transform the Smartphone Challenge campaigns.

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing is caring! Feel free to comment the campaign, put it on your blog, website, or social media. Everything helps.

But most important, let us know your wishes, so we could make them real!

Disclaimer

SDR Moto Mod is a Moto ModsTM concept for Moto Z smartphones. Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC. Moto Mods™ snap onto any Moto Z to give it a whole new superpower. They transform your phone allowing it to do things other phones can’t. To learn more visit www.motomods.com.

The goal of the campaign is rising donation to support further development, not selling goods or services. The owner of this campaign is not responsible for any misuse of the device or the provided information. Under no circumstances, especially in the case of failure to release a final product, will the owner of this campaign be liable for losses or damages of any kind whatsoever.

Do you indeed require the TX functionality?
Do you need an internal battery for longer operational time?
Do you want a pre-amplifier? Or an input filter bank?
What is your intended application? HAM? Fun? Research?
Do you prefer a finalized Moto Mod or would be a MDK module satisfactory?
…
Everything is possible, but it will also influence the final price. Furthermore, a possible cooperation with Motorola could lower the price even more (i.e. re-use of the existing casing). Sounds good, doesn't it?Hence, within this campaign, I am asking for donations for further development of the prototype. The funds will be used solely to cover some costs of the development. But what is even more important: your contribution will prove me and Motorola that there is a real demand for this product!The prototype design will be released as open-source (with some limitation due to eventual NDAs).If global demand for this product will be shown, the end-price will be announced. At that point, a new campaign extension will be launched, with final products as its perks. Hopefully we get also Motorola as a partner, as this campaign participates in the Transform the Smartphone Challenge.PrototypeCurrently, the concept of the wide-band receiver was tested (using R820T2 + RTL2832U over internal USB) with the SDRTouch Android App, as shown in the video below. The narrow-band transceiver concept is currently under development. The ONSemi AX5043 chip seems to be very promising for the desired application.The design of the printed circuit board (PCB) of the narrow-band transceiver board is attached:The design is freely accessible on GitHub! https://github.com/vbouse/SDR_RadioTimeline11/2016: Applied for the Motorola Transform the Smartphone Challenge12/2016: Selected as a "finalist" in the competition01/2017: Received the Moto MDK and started working on a prototype02/2017: First designs released on the GitHub03/2017: The project is now sponsored by Arrow Electronics!All the Transform the Smartphone Challenge campaigns will be reviewed by Motorola on March 6, 2017.The prototype is continuously developed further, you may expect the release of the final version by September.Meanwhile, please consider the small donation to indicate your interest!Risks & ChallengeThe goal of this campaign is to finalize the development and prepare the product for the serial production. Some parts of the system are still covered by NDAs and only partially known.Some modification in order to fulfill user needs may be necessary.Please note that your local law might apply and limit usage of this product. You might be not allowed to use some radio services, or you you might be required to own a specific license.In order to produce a Moto Mod end-customer product instead of the module for the Proto Mod, support of Motorola will be required (certification, sourcing of the special connectors, tooling, cooperation). There is a great chance to get this within the Transform the Smartphone Challenge campaigns.Other Ways You Can HelpSharing is caring! Feel free to comment the campaign, put it on your blog, website, or social media. Everything helps.But most important, let us know your wishes, so we could make them real!DisclaimerSDR Moto Mod is a Moto ModsTM concept for Moto Z smartphones. Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC. Moto Mods™ snap onto any Moto Z to give it a whole new superpower. They transform your phone allowing it to do things other phones can’t. To learn more visit www.motomods.com.The goal of the campaign is rising donation to support further development, not selling goods or services. The owner of this campaign is not responsible for any misuse of the device or the provided information. Under no circumstances, especially in the case of failure to release a final product, will the owner of this campaign be liable for losses or damages of any kind whatsoever.

story:
Enjoy multiple features in a single case for your iPhone. This is the thinnest and most advanced case that not only protects the iPhone but lets you enjoy some amazing features.

 

 

 

 

Top Questions

How do I choose my color?
At the end of the campaign we will send you a link to a page where you can choose your color.

Do you ship internationally? If so, what is the cost?
Yes! International shipping is FREE.

 

 

HQ Audio Jack

 

 

The Sweet Case brings back the traditional HQ audio jack, because in this case "Old Is Gold". It helps produce high quality sound with 24bit sampling (a CD quality). The HQ audio jack delivers better performance than any other lightening port.

Many products like card readers, weather, microphones and more are still dependent on this technology, so we decided to bring it back.

 

 

Battery Charger

Smartphones can run out of battery quite quickly. In order to keep getting the best out of your iPhone, you need to keep it sufficiently charged. The case has an internal battery in the same power specs of your iPhone's internal battery.

The Sweet Case has a pass through technology that first charges your phone and the case right after.  It also allows you to transfers data between your phone and computer while charging.

The battery status can be checked by the rear 5 LEDs lights and button or by the Sweet Case App (in development).

 

​

 

 

 

Micro SD Card Slot

The Sweet Case comes with an external SD card slot for memory expansion. It allows you to have more storage memory within your phone. Therefore, you can enjoy a storage that can handle larger amount of movies, songs and pictures, apps and more, within your iPhone.

You can benefit from an additional capacity of up to 256GB with the Sweet Case integrated card slot. So if you already have iPhone with 256GB internal memory you can get it to have up to 512GB, it's amazing.

The storage can be managed on the Sweet Case app that is going to be ready soon. This is our final stage on the way to complete the Sweet Case development before production.

 

 

 

Slim & Elegant Design

Slim Design

While designing and developing the Sweet Case, we were extremely careful about the thickness and weight of the case. The iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 plus are 7.1mm thick. We ensure that the addition of the case to the phone will not add much to the thickness. The Sweet Case features a slim and elegant design. The back piece of the case is 4mm thick and has 1mm screen protection at the front. When you use it, you won’t be able to feel it.

But how is it possible to have it all inside a 4mm case? the answer is very simple. The only part that we had issue with, because of its size, was the audio jack. The audio jack hole is 3.5mm and it has a frame. The frame of the audio jack comes in various of sizes. When we worked on our design optimization we knew that we need 3.7mm ~ 3.8mm max total height of a stereo audio jack, and we did find a 3.8mm audio jack just to fit into a 4mm case.

 

Multi Color

Like the iPhone, the Sweet Case will arrive in 2 different back case colors - Black & White, to match the inner screen frame of the iPhone, and 4 different case frames to match the iPhone colors - Black, Silver, Gold & Rose Gold.

Shockproof Construct

We have ensured that all the features the Sweet Case has are protected in its solid build. The material that has been used to build the case allows protecting it against sudden falls. We used the expertise of a leading product engineer to design the toughest possible case for your iPhone.

 

 

 

Kick Stand

This is the ultimate convenience a customer wants from their iPhone. Watching long videos and using Face Time has never been this easy. With the kick stand feature of the Sweet Case, you can now rest your hands and conveniently enjoy your iPhone output.

 

 

Stretch Goals

 

 

 

Perks

 

 

Timeline

 

 

Progress

We've made nice progress, and we are standing at the point where everything is working. We are now preparing for the final design of the 4mm case back. Also, the case will have App to control the battery operation (like in the Apple battery case) and also control the memory operation.

 

              

 

About Us

Our Team

Finding the right people is a challenge for any endeavor. Success requires a team of talented, passionate, and motivated designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs. We have already formed a truly amazing (and awesome!) team.

 

Why Are We Crowdfunding?

We chose crowd funding because we wanted to share this project with people who value and appreciate innovative ideas that challenges the status quo. There are too many products out there from existing companies that fail to deliver the functionality and quality that we believe mobile professionals deserve. We believe that building the Sweet Case into a successful brand starts with each and every backer’s support. There is a tangible need for the Sweet Case and we are excited to gather backers support in giving us the opportunity to build the best Phone Case on the market. Help us launch Sweet Case so that we can continue to build quality products that not only exceed consumers’ requirements, but one that you are also proud to make a part of your mobile lifestyle.

We are now relaunching our campaign because at first time we haven't succeeded raising our goal.

 

Risks & Challenges

Sweet Case is nearly complete. Our team of engineers has been working together with our manufacturing partner for couple of months and we have already started tooling as this campaign is being launched. We are currently in the process of conducting product certification and testing memory management processing.

As soon as the campaign is successfully funded, we will begin the process of ordering all of the components and materials to begin production. We already have commitments from all of our major component suppliers (TI, Panasonic, ST Chips, etc.) and we have a very capable team of supply chain experts to ensure our timelines are met. However, should component delays and shortages occur in production, we will make sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problems.

We believe that we have developed a well-engineered and well-designed product, so we are offering a 1 year limited warranty for all of our backers. We stand behind our product and the trust you have placed in us.

 

FAQ

What phones are the Sweet Case made for?
iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus.

How much extra battery life does the Sweet Case provide?
The Sweet Case provides an additional 1,960mAh battery for iPhone 7 and additional 2,900mAh for iPhone 7 Plus, which is equivalent to more than 14-21 hours extra talk time, 13-14 hours extra video play, 10-12 hours extra game time and 12-15 hours extra internet time.

Check out our table of battery life in the Battery Charger section.

Is it really the thinnest most advanced iPhone case?
Yes, Sweet Case is only 4mm thick. This is the world’s most advanced thinnest battery iPhone case. When it is on your iPhone, it feels like it’s just a part of it.

Read more in our Slim Design section.

How do you charge the iPhone and the Sweet Case?
There is a single lightning port for charging your Sweet Case and your iPhone. The case works on pass-through charging technology, and will charge your iPhone first and then your case.

How long does it take to charge the Sweet Case and the iPhone?
It takes about 1:15h to fully charge the Sweet Case, and 2:30h to fully charge the Sweet Case and the iPhone together.

Can Sweet Case protect my phone?
Yes, although Sweet Case is thin and elegant, it is very robust. The outer shell bumper and the case will protect your phone from all around, making it shock-proof.

What color options are available?
The Sweet Case is available in the following colors: Black case with black frame or white case with silver, gold, or rose gold frame.

Is the Sweet Case MFI certified?
We are applying for MFI certification, and it is one of our steps before production. We hope it will be obtained when Sweet Case is ready to ship.

What are the shipping and handling costs?
Shipping and handling are FREE worldwide.

story:
It'd be pretty awesome if you'd "share" above with a comment about iCool.
We've worked pretty hard to get this far...
love to hear your thoughts...

Step 1:Plug it into your iPhone.
Step 2:Put on the iCool in your ear,Or  aim the iCool at the forehead.
Step 3:Toggle the "START" button in the "iCool" app.
then you will get the temperature along with the ambient temperature where you are in  around  1 second ，the measurement will be automatically recorded onto your iPhone for easy reference and tracking.


The dedicated iCool app provide the histories tracking and lets you add your family profiles,which can be safely shared with your doctor and family.

iCool is not only an ear thermometer,but also an Exergen thermometer,It's a two-in-one product.Simply aim the iCool at the forehead for a quick, touch-free measurement with fever alert function.

we can take body temperature without  waking sleeping children.

iCool is more than just a body thermometer, iCool is a precision multi-purpose thermometer,

iCool can detect the temperature of milk in the bottle, thereby preventing babies from being hurt due to extremely cold or hot fed milk.

Of course,you can take the coffee temperature,we all know that the hotter the coffee, the better the taste.

Multiple vibrant colors:

We've got real working prototypes,(everything you've seen in the video was real, no CGI), and have spent many months in research and design of thermometer,Try to find the best iCool design,one that simple ,small and practical with safety of using, high accuracy and convenient operation ,We were very excited that we were making it .we're ready to take the next step.

Rewards:


We Need Your Support!

iCool is more than just a thermometer product: iCool help you keep your family healthier.
We've been working on our hardware and software applications for half a year. We're very proud of the work we've done so far ,and have spent all of our salaries on making the prototypes and hardware design, but we need one more push to get it in production. we really need your help. With the funds collected from pre-orders we will be able to acquire a large volume of top quality components, launch production and supply iCool at the lowest possible price.

Production Plan :

About us:

Thinking,make difference!

Frequently Asked Questions:

Does the App give us a Celsius and Fahrenheit temperature read out?

Yes, our app gives you a Celsius and Fahrenheit temperature read out, and you will have the option to choose between the two.

Which smartphone platforms do you support?

The iCool app is available for iPhone,iPad,or iTouch.

Can iCool be used as earphone to listen music?

Sorry,Not supported in now stage.

Can we create multiple user profiles?

You will have the ability to create multiple user profiles, so you can keep track of not only your health, but your family's health as well.

When are you going to be shipping my iCool?

Indiegogo isn't like Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute to iCool you are funding all of our engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to make a real product.

Estimated national and international shipping date is October 2014.

What is the cost of shipping?
Zero, shipping is FREE worldwide with every reward.

story:
THIS CAMPAIGN IS A RELAUNCH OF THE CAMPAIGN FOUND ON THIS LINK:

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/computer-literacy-campaign

With the continued electricity interruptions in the district of Kabale in Uganda, the ongoing project of training people in acquiring computer basic skills has been frustrated heavily.

As a result a need for laptop computers that can save and store electricity and enable facilitation to the training to continue on daily basis.

The project is the brain work of members of the working class here in Kabale Uganda who are human rights activists as well as Industrial Workers of the World members and is targeted at enabling the same who are not yet computer literate so that they are able to at least use computers in typing and printing data,using internet to send and receive data and related skills.The laptop computers will also be used and enable the activists’ group to carry out mobile training workshops.

We need at least one laptop computer valued at an equivalent of USD 400, plus the indiegogo fees and bank charges, all totaling to around $500.

The computer will remain property of the whole group when the training is over.

Maximum transparency and accountability to be adhered to in the project. Copies of receipts, photos and other documents of the project to be sent to the project supporters and any person wishing so.

Cordinating the project; Derick Kwesiga is my name.

Contribute using the contribution button below.

story:
MagMount is a Magnetic Mounting Solution for all your Smart Devices. It's versatile, simple, and amazingly functional.  

MagMount was designed to be as versatile as possible.  With a 6 inch neck and ball joint head, you will always have the perfect viewing angle.

MagMount is super simple to use and enjoy.  Our patent-pending micro suction base is ridiculously strong and washable.  


Quality rubber gripping head maximizes friction to reduce slippage and smooth gesturing or tapping your device.

Pair MagMount with our magnetized backed leather MagCases for iPhone 5/s, 6/s, & 6/s Plus for a seamless experience. (MagCases sold separately) 


Every MagMount comes with two metal MagPlates that will give your device the magnet power it needs.  Simply attach the 3M sticky backed metal plates to the back of your device.

  • Like us and share this with friends on Facebook
  • and/or mention and follow us on twitter 
  • and/or pin us on Pinterest
As soon as you do any of the above, simply post a comment that you shared and we will take care of the rest.


Designing MagMount

We have been working on this project for 9 months and have come along way.  Our goal was to design a better docking solution to what was currently in the marketplace.  Our design intentions were to make MagMount simple, sturdy, and fun to use.   Of course quality materials and production processes are a given for all of Doc Artisan products. 

Our first initiative was to design the magnetic head.  It had to be able to hold an iPad and so we incorporated 6 super strong magnets mounted on a thick metal plate. This would provide the stability and magnetic power we needed.

Next we focused on the neck and ball joint.  We opted to go with a 6 inch neck and fully rotatable head joint.  The long neck provides enough height/reach to suspend an iPad off any surface.  The ball joint allows you to adjust the head in any position and then tighten it to lock into your desired position.



Lastly we focused on the base of MagMount.  Our goal here was to design the strongest possible suction and nano suction power available.  We are confident that you will be amazed at how strong the base will stay attached to most any flat surface.  

Check out Techie Grad's MagMount Stress Test to see how strong our base is!


About Us 

Doc Artisan was founded in 2011 by the husband and wife team of Joel & Iris Young:

  • 2011 we launched Doc Artisan & Wood Charging Dock (featured etsy shop)
  • 2013 we launched the Artisan Wallet Case  (crowd-funded success)
  • 2014 we Launched the Sport Wallet Case    (crowd-funded success) 

Now we introduce MagMount:  A universal magnetic mount that gives users seamless functional management of their phone or tablet for everyday use.

You can learn more about Doc Artisan by visiting our About page on our website


Thoroughly Tested

We have been developing MagMount for Nine Months. Manufacturing plans are finalized and with your help MagMount will ship in October 2015.

Risks & Challenges

This project has already come a long way and we believe we are past the most challenging parts. After several iterations we've finalized our designs and identified vendors. We have made prototype molds and received samples. Once funded, we will move from prototype to production molds.

We are currently working on packaging design, confirming production schedule, and lining up all our vendors to converge at our target shipping date.

What We Need to raise in this campaign:

  • We need 15k for molds, raw materials, & production costs.
  • As soon as we hit our goal we will start manufacturing immediately.
  • If we don't reach our goal we will still invest in bringing MagMount to life.

Full Reviews & Online Features

                                                                 






                                                 
              Doc Artisan MagMount - Hands On                   MagMount, the Best Car Mount?! (Video)


                                                   Outstanding Magnetic Mount  (Video)





Joel’s journey from reclaimed wood docking stations in his garage to the modern magnet holder (MagMount) "Live Interview Listen Now"

Doc Artisan MagMount Review (pics)




Magnetic Car Mount by Doc Artisan Review (pics)




MagMount Interview with Joel Young of Doc Artisan 



Sharing is Caring

After you support our campaign help us spread the word to receive: One FREE extra 3M backed MagPlate by:



Like us and share this with friends on Facebook

and/or mention and follow us on twitter 

and/or pin us on Pinterest


As soon as you do any of the above, simply post a comment that you shared and we will take care of the rest.

Designing MagMount
We have been working on this project for 9 months and have come along way.  Our goal was to design a better docking solution to what was currently in the marketplace.  Our design intentions were to make MagMount simple, sturdy, and fun to use.   Of course quality materials and production processes are a given for all of Doc Artisan products. 

Our first initiative was to design the magnetic head.  It had to be able to hold an iPad and so we incorporated 6 super strong magnets mounted on a thick metal plate. This would provide the stability and magnetic power we needed.

Next we focused on the neck and ball joint.  We opted to go with a 6 inch neck and fully rotatable head joint.  The long neck provides enough height/reach to suspend an iPad off any surface.  The ball joint allows you to adjust the head in any position and then tighten it to lock into your desired position.





Lastly we focused on the base of MagMount.  Our goal here was to design the strongest possible suction and nano suction power available.  We are confident that you will be amazed at how strong the base will stay attached to most any flat surface.  
Check out Techie Grad's MagMount Stress Test to see how strong our base is!

About Us 
 Doc Artisan was founded in 2011 by the husband and wife team of Joel & Iris Young:  2011 we launched Doc Artisan & Wood Charging Dock (featured etsy shop)
 2013 we launched the Artisan Wallet Case  (crowd-funded success)
 2014 we Launched the Sport Wallet Case    (crowd-funded success)   Now we introduce MagMount:  A universal magnetic mount that gives users seamless functional management of their phone or tablet for everyday use.
You can learn more about Doc Artisan by visiting our About page on our website

Thoroughly Tested

We have been developing MagMount for Nine Months. Manufacturing plans are finalized and with your help MagMount will ship in October 2015.


MagMount has been tested extensively to make sure the iPhone, iPad and other devices and all of their functions work flawlessly.  






    Risks & Challenges  
This project has already come a long way and we believe we are past the most challenging parts. After several iterations we've finalized our designs and identified vendors. We have made prototype molds and received samples. Once funded, we will move from prototype to production molds.
We are currently working on packaging design, confirming production schedule, and lining up all our vendors to converge at our target shipping date.
What We Need to raise in this campaign:

We need 15k for molds, raw materials, & production costs.
As soon as we hit our goal we will start manufacturing immediately.
If we don't reach our goal we will still invest in bringing MagMount to life.

story:
What is Boxxo TV?

DESCRIPTION:

Boxxo TV is a customizable entertainment system that turns any regular flat screen HDTV into a smart connected device.

Visit us at Boxxo.TV

The Boxxo TV entertainment device is an easy way to watch TV, Movies, Sports, Music and other content directly to your TV. It is customizable to fit your interests. Open source and privacy enabled. (We never see what you watch).

Boxxo TV features over 1000 available free apps that fetch video in up to 1080p High Definition. You can also play video from your smartphone. Remote control included OR use the free phone app. Connect your Flat Panel (HDMI cable included) and your network (WIFI or Cabled) and you are ready to rock!


Categories include: TV, movies, sports, music videos, concerts, gaming, anime, humor, family, news, radio, science, technology, DIY, home, garden, travel, education,  podcasts, audiobooks, cartoons, weather, stocks, Reddit, Vine, Vevo, Vimeo, Youtube & much too much to list here with new content avaialable every day. Whatever you're into, there's something for everyone. From NASA to NASCAR, beer to yoga, football to futbol. It's for foodies, techies, or even trekkies.

You can add or remove apps, here are just some examples.

Including but not limited to:

Apple ITunes, CBS news, Classic Cinema, CNET, Cooking Channel, DIY Network, Engadget, ESPN, Esquire TV, Food Network, Fox News, Funny Or Die, Giant Bomb Gaming, GQ, Hallmark Channel, HGTV, Infowars, Khan Academy, NASA, NBC Sports Live, New York Times Video, NFL Gamepass, NHL Gamecenter, NPR Music Videos, Pandora, PBS ThinkTV, Red Bull TV, Reddit, Rooster Teeth, Smithsonian Channel, Sports Illustrated, Sprout Preschool, Shoutcast,  Sundance TV, TED Talks, Wall Street Journal Live, The Hollywood Reporter, The Onion, TIME, TMZ, Travel Channel, Tune In Radio, TwitchTV, Vevo, Vimeo, Vine, World Star Hip Hop, YogaGlo, Youtube And Much More...


ABOUT US:

We are an average family who began to look for savings and decided to cut the cable cord. We were able to cut our budget but we began to miss live TV, movies and sports. Family movie night just wasn't the same with DVDs and subscription services. My husband, an IT guy, made Boxxo TV to reconnect us to the world. Now we enjoy TV, Movies, Sports, Music, etc. without the hefty corporate price tag. It has changed the way we view entertainment. Thank you for your interest.


What We Need & What You Get

Here's the clear details :

  • We are looking to raise enough money to build our first 5 to 10 units and get them out in the wild for people to use and enjoy. Each unit costs about $99 to build.
  • As for our goal, $500 goes into the parts and production and each unit will be  sent to our early supporters. The remainder goes towards operating costs and future marketing and outreach.
  • Be one of the first to own this unique device. Watch more & pay less.
  • If we fall short we would simply make fewer units, we don't mind starting small.

Tech Specs: Arm Processor, Customized Linux OS, WIFI, Ethernet, HDMI port, 2 USB ports. Product Dimensions: 3.5 x 2.8 x 1 inches

How we're different


  • OPEN SOURCE - Open Source communities collaborate & share to make better innovations, faster.
  • PRIVACY - You watch Boxxo it doesn't watch you. Other similar devices are designed to sell you subscriptions and harvest your data to sell to advertisers. We collect no information after the point of the sale.
  • CUSTOMIZABLE - The Boxxo lets you pick and choose without being forced into a "bundle"
  • More and Better stuff to watch.
  • 30 Day MBG - no questions asked.
  • I've been using mine 24/7 for months, The hardest part of making it was to stop using it for very long.

Challenges

The components are common and readily available at this point. However, availability issues and shipping delays may arise.

  • We have already sourced multiple suppliers.
  • There are alternative parts that can be substituted.

Tell a friend

  • Please help us spread the word by telling your friends and family.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and if we see that you are becoming a brand ambassador you could get a Free Boxxo!

Please visit our website Boxxo.TV for more details, including screenshots.

THANK YOU!

story:
Please note: international shipping is now available.  Please contact me for exact quote.

If you missed our campaign it will be available on our website: RD1studio.com

Allows you to be hands free while cooking your favorite recipe. How about charging and docking multi-devices while you cook? Our large classic pin striped bamboo multi-device charging station is specially designed for your kitchen with hands free functionality. It minimizes the amount of space needed to dock and charge BOTH a tablet/iPad and a smartphone/iPhone either in landscape or portrait mode. Or, simply rest your cookbook on the specially designed spherical pegs to keep your cookbook safe from spills and splatter. Its sleek design fits on any counter top. It also allows you to position your tablet and smartphone either on the left or right side of the workstation.

Instead of a lip, the workstation uses a series of spherical pegs that cradle your devices.

It’s smart for the gadget-carrying cook, since these pegs make it easy to keep devices plugged in to charge.The wire management system, with nylon cable clips, keeps your factory cables handy, out of sight and enables you charge BOTH your tablet and smartphone so as not to lose any battery power while you cook.

Why you need this in your kitchen:

  • Exclusive cable management system - no more messy cables
  • Works with or without a case
  • Two gadget hangers (eyeglasses, scissors, vegetable peeler etc.)
  • Works with any device, Apple, Android or Windows
  • Multilevel viewing angles
  • Made from sustainable, environmentally friendly bamboo
  • Use with two devices, with one device and a cookbook or just a cookbook.  Endless possibilities.
  • Slim design fits on any counter-top

Adjust the viewing angle 25, 35 or 45 degrees.

A three-position height adjustment system for changing the viewing angle of the workstation is integrated on the back of the workstation. This eco-savvy bamboo workstation is designed to be a beautiful addition to your kitchen.

All are handcrafted from renewable bamboo that offers a stylish alternative to generic iPhone/iPad docks.  Easily use your device in landscape or portrait position for trouble-free viewing.

Deluxe Version:

Deluxe version includes night lighting on the back of the stand, two gadget hangers, cable management system and knife storage area.

Add a matching bamboo cutting board:






Specs:

  • Large classic pin striped bamboo Tablet & Smartphone Holder/Charger:10-¼ in x 14-⅛ in x ⅝
  • Matching large classic pin striped bamboo companion cutting board: 10-¼ in x 14-⅛ in x ⅝ in

Risks & Challenges:


We are prepared to complete virtually any level of fulfillment needed and have secured a reliable source for bamboo suppliers.

If you're not sure about us we  had a couple of successful projects already funded on Kickstarter Project Lumia - an eighth art and the VERSI Docker/Stand shows that we have delivered early than our projection or on time.

International Shipping:

Varies according to country. Please contact us for a quote.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask friends to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

FAQ:

1.  Do we ship internationally? Yes, it varies by country, so please ask us for a quote on the perk that you want.
