story:
HOW MANY TIMES A DAY DO YOU CHARGE YOUR CELL PHONE??

    What is the Maxergy Solar Adapter?

A revolutionary device that converts light into a usable energy source using a sophisticated, proprietary charging algorithm that is going to eliminate the dendrites in the battery that limit both battery capacity and battery life. For those unfamiliar with dendrites turn your hand upside down and put all 4 fingers really tight together and imagine a tightly woven spider web you can't penetrate. That is the basic concept of a dendrite. When conventional wall chargers are used the heat generated by them causes dendrites that are so dense the energy coming from the wall charger can not penetrate. That's what causes your battery to go from charging in 3-4 hours to eventually taking only minutes and lasting just as long. We eliminate that problem. No dendrites, no memory loss, no energy disruptions!

     


The process will be automated using a microprocessor to supply both the energy to power the phone and using our sophisticated charging algorithm to charge the battery. The battery will never be overcharged nor undercharged.  The solar adapter will keep the battery in its correct ambient temperature. The process should eliminates thermal runaway. We will offer a limited lifetime warranty on our adapter. Isn't that awesome?!?!?


After decades of slow innovation in the battery charging industry we've re-imagined the battery charger the way Nikola Tesla did back in the late 1800's to solve the problems of a modern battery enabled user. No more worrying about when you're going to need to desperately look for a USB or wall outlet. With Maxergy you will work and live more efficiently and smarter with less worries and be the coolest kid on the block.

Now a few technical points:

1. Light is the energy source replacing the wall outlet and USB.

2. The process is:

a) Computer automated to supplement and aid the battery

b) Eliminates user intervention

c) Eliminates Dendrites that eat through separators

d) Should eliminate thermal runaway

e) Eliminates overcharging or undercharging

3. Should eliminate the need to buy batteries in your devices future.

4. Will be offered with an option to upgrade to new designs.


THE TEAM:
 Atlanta based 27th Century Technologies was founded in 1995 and incorporated in Georgia.

Neil Chernoff- Chairman/CEO

With over 44 years in the IBM world, over 40 years in sales/sales management and 25 years in the battery and battery charging field, Neil offers a unique and wonderful background to being the Chairman/CEO of 27th Century Technologies. During his 40+ year sales career he has set many yearly selling records and has sold products to clients like Delco-Remy, IBM, NEC, Texas Instruments, Delta Airlines, Lockheed Martin, Siemens, Transamerica, Independent Life, Celanese, Honeywell, Walmart, Toys R Us, U of Miami and Walt Disney. Neil founded 27th Century Technolgies in 1995.

Sabin Lupan

Brings 42 years of experience in the research,development and integration of electromechanical systems. He has a MSEE in electrical apparata from the Polytechnic Institute of Bucharest and an Executive MBA with 4.0 GPA from Colorado Technical University in 1995.

After 8 years of leading the electrostatics laboratory of the Research Institute for Electro-technique Industry in Bucharest, Romania, and 2 years France, in 1980 he immigrated to USA. He joined General Atomics (GA), Sorrento Electronics Nuclear Radiation Monitoring division, as a staff engineer, in 1981, where he developed and integrated digital radiation monitoring system for nuclear power plants. From 1987-95 he joined GA’s Electromagnetic Systems (EMS) division, where he participated in SDI’s Ground Based Free Electron Laser proposal (part of the Lawrence Livermore National Lab team), followed by the Prime Power (battery banks) Validation Experiment, for the same proposal, and numerous DOD and DOE projects (electric rail guns, avionics load simulators for Northup-Grumman, Light Intensified Detection and Ranging (LIDAR) for LLNL and two LIDAR proposals for fishing industry and the port of Hamburg(Germany), an ultrasonic analyzer for water contamination, and a high speed train (MAGLEV) proposal for Orlando Airport-Disneyland. In 1995 he joined the Aeronautical division of GA to develop a battery pack, charger and integrate the LIDAR in the unmanned air vehicle (UAV) payload. In 1997 he joined Power Integrations (PI), as a field applications engineer (FAE) to promote and design in a power IC for cell phone chargers visiting hundreds of businesses including Motorola, Black & Decker, APC , Exide, Galaxy, Benchmark. In 2002 he joined Power-One promoting company’s AC-DC and DC-DC converters to Silicon Valley data/telecom and computer companies like Alcatel, Apple, Brocade, CISCO, Google, HP, Juniper, Nortel, Sun/Oracle. In 2006 he joined Primarion, digital power fabless IC startup, as a corporate FAE in the Silicon Valley, to introduce digital power conversion controllers and integrated power stages to key customers; Google, Apple, Sun, nVidia, Cisco, HP, IBM, Intel, Dell, Brocade, Juniper. In 2008 he joined International Rectifier as a senior staff FAE in Silicon Valley, promoting a broad range of power ICs for telecom, datacom and computing applications and IGBTs for electric vehicles and solar and wind power inverters. In 2012 he joined 27th Century Technologies.



Alan Ratskoff Senior Vice President of Retail Sales.

 Alan has over 30 years of experience in the toy, game, electronics and leisure industries, working for both public and private companies in senior executive positions. VP of Kransco national accounts( Power Wheels), Sr VP Sales University Games, VP National Accounts for Wild Planet Toys to name a few. Throughout this time, Mr Ratskoff has been in charge of sales and marketing to major retailers throughout the world. He has a deep knowledge and has worked on continual basis with such major retailers as Walmart, Target, Toys R Us, Argos, Carefour, Bestbuy as well as distributors worldwide. He has also spent a significant part of his career working with Chinese factories in the design,manufacture and marketing of a variety of toy and electronic products.

Mr. Ratskoff's expertise are:

Managing sales efforts to mass retailers like Walmart, Target, TRU, Argos, Costco, Carrefour, etc.

Managing sales efforts to specialty retailers

Managing sales efforts to various online retailers like Amazon, Walmart.com Kohls.com, TRU.com, etc.

Managing the various distributors and others that service the online businesses.

Developing marketing and proportional programs for the retailers.

Developing pricing strategies.


PETER MASTROMATTEI 

Twenty Years experience in program management technical sales, marketing and development of consumer products. In depth knowledge of the requirements necessary to bring product from engineering development to factory launch. Able to identify and close new business opportunities while strengthening relationships with key accounts. Excellent team leader skills and problem solving abilities. Strong mediation, negotiation and delegation skills. 


Specialties: 

· Custom product development and manufacturing process schedules,

· Business Development,

· Program Management

· Logistics Management

· Marketing New Product Introduction

· Contract and Partnership Negotiation 

· OEM Account Management/Staff Management 

· International Travel


LARRY KASTNER 

Larry Kastner has more than 25 years of executive leadership experience in the marketing arena. An accomplished corporate strategist, consultant, mentor and marketer, his vision and expertise in business performance and core marketing issues have driven notable growth in consulting and client care programs.     Offering a rare blend of creative and operational strengths, Larry has achieved exciting company and product turnarounds and is recognized for his success in brand recognition and growing sales and profits. His strategic approach to business is reflected in his work with the Federal Government and Fortune 500 companies, where his concept and focus on Marketing streamlining quickly delivered impressive bottom-line results. His turnaround capability is highlighted by his accomplishments as President of the Belair Bayou Associations, where he led a distressed non-profit organization to record profitability and revitalization that included major shifts in strategy, operations, and communications.                    Larry’s exceptional track record of business marketing improvement is based on his philosophy of total engagement in change. He is known for his ability to quickly identify and analyze issues that go far beyond marketing, working at a personal level with consultants and clients to refine their organizational structure Larry believes in kindheartedness, hard work, sincerity, helping others in need and displaying integrity in and out of the marketplace and he does so with courage.



TIM ZOLLER

Tim Zoller is a Sr. Industrial Designer/Mechanical Designer with over 28 years of experience and a diverse product development background, ranging from consumer products to commercial food service equipment (Alto-Shaam). His designs include security camera enclosures, computer peripherals (Sonnet Technologies), aftermarket motorcycle components and handheld medical devices (Facet Technologies). Throughout his career, Tim has delivered innovative designs for several design consultancies and has made significant design and engineering contributions to in-house corporate engineering teams- all leaders in their respective industries. His expertise includes conceptualization, prototyping and manufacturing technologies appropriate to product, quantity and industry. Tim’s unique creative flair and engineering sense has helped him receive several design and utility patents, singularly and collaboratively. Tim received a Bachelor of Fine Arts degree in Industrial Design from the University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign in 1984.



Michael Redd 

Michael Redd has a diverse background including working for several large corporations (BellSouth.net, MindSpring, United States Gypsum) and starting up several small businesses. He has an excellent understanding of the management, accounting, technical and day to day skills required for success. He has worked in multiple industries from Telecom to Construction to Office/Property Management. His broad skill sets have allowed him to interact with everyone from factory workers to CEOs. He has helped implement processes that have increased productivity and profits throughout his career. His ability to grasp entire scopes of projects and quickly determine deficiencies and solutions has helped advance many companies and increase revenues. 

We believe this management team, and those that have yet to come, combine the knowledge and experience that will ensure the success of the company and have the knowledge and experience to add the proper mix of personnel to reach our goals and objectives.

Where we are & why we need you
After more than a year working our tails off we are almost at the point of having fully functional prototypes. We've harnessed the best of technology and design to provide amazing features to solve all the problems of the modern cell phone user.
As seen in:


Possible dendrite related failure:


What's Next?

We already have trusted manufacturing partners with vast experience in electronics ready to help us get Maxergy Solar Adaptors to market.
* December - Spread the word and fund our dream.
* January - Finalize and build the functional prototypes, set up the tooling and start software development
* February - Tooling build out,complete assembly testing and international control certifications. Part qualification and pre-production builds, pilot production, quality assurance and product validation.
* March - Begin manufacturing for the injection molded and thermo-molded parts, software testing.
* April - Finalize the assembly process and begin order fulfillment.
* May - Delivery???

RISKS AND Challenges
We have been working  for more than a year developing Maxergy Solar Adaptors and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisers that will also help.
Manufacturing:
We need to create the tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.
Software:
The software is functional but we still have work to do building all the features that we want to include. Software development sometimes gets tricky and takes longer than expected, but we have a lot of experience in this area and if necessary will look for additional help to solve any problems that could emerge.
We will undoubtedly have surprises on our journey, but we trust that we have the team to overcome all challenges, as we've done so far. Our goal is to make the best possible product for you and deliver it right on time.

The process is:a) Computer automated to supplement and aid the battery b) Eliminates user interventionc) Eliminates Dendrites that eat through separatorsd) Should eliminate thermal runawaye) Eliminates overcharging or undercharging3. Should eliminate the need to buy batteries in your devices future.4. Will be offered with an option to upgrade to new designs.THE TEAM: Atlanta based 27th Century Technologies was founded in 1995 and incorporated in Georgia.Neil Chernoff- Chairman/CEOWith over 44 years in the IBM world, over 40 years in sales/sales management and 25 years in the battery and battery charging field, Neil offers a unique and wonderful background to being the Chairman/CEO of 27th Century Technologies. During his 40+ year sales career he has set many yearly selling records and has sold products to clients like Delco-Remy, IBM, NEC, Texas Instruments, Delta Airlines, Lockheed Martin, Siemens, Transamerica, Independent Life, Celanese, Honeywell, Walmart, Toys R Us, U of Miami and Walt Disney. Neil founded 27th Century Technolgies in 1995.Sabin LupanBrings 42 years of experience in the research,development and integration of electromechanical systems. He has a MSEE in electrical apparata from the Polytechnic Institute of Bucharest and an Executive MBA with 4.0 GPA from Colorado Technical University in 1995.
After 8 years of leading the
electrostatics laboratory of the Research Institute for Electro-technique Industry in Bucharest,
Romania, and 2 years France, in 1980 he immigrated to USA.
He joined General Atomics (GA), Sorrento Electronics Nuclear Radiation
Monitoring division, as a
staff engineer, in 1981, where he developed and integrated digital radiation monitoring system for nuclear power plants.
From 1987-95 he joined GA’s Electromagnetic Systems (EMS) division, where he participated in SDI’s Ground Based
Free Electron Laser proposal
(part of the Lawrence Livermore National Lab team), followed by the Prime Power (battery banks) Validation Experiment, for the
same proposal, and numerous DOD and DOE projects (electric rail guns, avionics load simulators for
Northup-Grumman, Light Intensified Detection and Ranging (LIDAR) for LLNL and two LIDAR proposals for
fishing industry and the
port of Hamburg(Germany), an ultrasonic analyzer for water contamination, and a
high speed train (MAGLEV)
proposal for Orlando Airport-Disneyland. In 1995 he joined the Aeronautical division of GA to develop a
battery pack, charger and integrate the LIDAR in the unmanned air vehicle (UAV) payload. In
1997 he joined Power Integrations (PI), as a field applications engineer (FAE) to promote
and design in a power IC for cell phone chargers visiting hundreds of businesses including Motorola, Black
& Decker, APC , Exide, Galaxy,
Benchmark. In 2002 he joined Power-One promoting company’s AC-DC and DC-DC converters to Silicon Valley data/telecom and
computer companies like Alcatel, Apple, Brocade, CISCO, Google, HP, Juniper, Nortel, Sun/Oracle. In 2006 he
joined Primarion, digital
power fabless IC startup, as a corporate FAE in the Silicon Valley, to
introduce digital power
conversion controllers and integrated power stages to key customers; Google,
Apple, Sun, nVidia, Cisco,
HP, IBM, Intel, Dell, Brocade, Juniper. In 2008 he joined International Rectifier as a senior staff FAE in Silicon
Valley, promoting a broad range of power ICs for telecom, datacom and computing applications
and IGBTs for electric vehicles and solar and wind power inverters. In 2012 he joined 27th
Century Technologies.
Alan Ratskoff Senior Vice President of Retail Sales. Alan has over 30 years of experience in the toy, game, electronics and leisure industries, working for both public and private companies in senior executive positions. VP of Kransco national accounts( Power Wheels), Sr VP Sales University Games, VP National Accounts for Wild Planet Toys to name a few. Throughout this time, Mr Ratskoff has been in charge of sales and marketing to major retailers throughout the world. He has a deep knowledge and has worked on continual basis with such major retailers as Walmart, Target, Toys R Us, Argos, Carefour, Bestbuy as well as distributors worldwide. He has also spent a significant part of his career working with Chinese factories in the design,manufacture and marketing of a variety of toy and electronic products.Mr. Ratskoff's expertise are:Managing sales efforts to mass retailers like Walmart, Target, TRU, Argos, Costco, Carrefour, etc.Managing sales efforts to specialty retailersManaging sales efforts to various online retailers like Amazon, Walmart.com Kohls.com, TRU.com, etc.Managing the various distributors and others that service the online businesses.Developing marketing and proportional programs for the retailers.Developing pricing strategies.PETER MASTROMATTEI 
Twenty Years experience in
program management technical sales, marketing and development of consumer products. In depth knowledge of the
requirements necessary to bring
product from engineering development to factory launch. Able to identify and
close new business
opportunities while strengthening relationships with key accounts. Excellent team leader skills and problem solving
abilities. Strong mediation, negotiation and delegation skills. 
Specialties: · Custom product development and manufacturing process schedules,· Business Development,· Program Management· Logistics Management· Marketing New Product Introduction· Contract and Partnership Negotiation · OEM Account Management/Staff Management · International TravelLARRY KASTNER 
Larry Kastner has more than
25 years of executive leadership experience in the marketing arena. An accomplished corporate strategist,
consultant, mentor and marketer, his vision and expertise in business performance and core marketing issues have
driven notable growth in
consulting and client care programs.     Offering a rare blend of creative and
operational strengths, Larry has achieved exciting company and product turnarounds and is
recognized for his success in brand recognition and growing sales and profits. His strategic
approach to business is reflected in his work with the Federal Government and Fortune 500
companies, where his concept and focus on Marketing streamlining quickly delivered impressive bottom-line
results. His turnaround capability
is highlighted by his accomplishments as President of the Belair Bayou Associations, where he led a distressed
non-profit organization to record profitability and revitalization that included major shifts in
strategy, operations, and communications.          
         Larry’s
exceptional track record of business marketing improvement is based on his philosophy of total engagement in change. He
is known for his ability to quickly identify and analyze issues that go far beyond marketing,
working at a personal level with consultants and clients to refine their organizational
structure Larry believes in kindheartedness, hard work, sincerity, helping others in need and
displaying integrity in and out of the marketplace and he does so with courage.
TIM ZOLLER

Tim Zoller is a Sr.
Industrial Designer/Mechanical Designer with over 28 years of experience and a diverse product development background,
ranging from consumer products to commercial food service equipment (Alto-Shaam). His designs include
security camera enclosures,
computer peripherals (Sonnet Technologies), aftermarket motorcycle components and handheld medical devices (Facet
Technologies). Throughout
his career, Tim has delivered innovative designs for several design consultancies and has made significant design
and engineering contributions to in-house corporate engineering teams- all leaders in their respective
industries. His expertise includes conceptualization, prototyping and manufacturing technologies
appropriate to product, quantity
and industry. Tim’s unique creative flair and engineering sense has helped him receive several design and utility patents,
singularly and collaboratively. Tim
received a Bachelor of Fine Arts degree in Industrial Design from the University of Illinois,
Urbana-Champaign in 1984.

Michael Redd 

Michael Redd has a diverse background
including working for several large corporations (BellSouth.net, MindSpring,
 United States
Gypsum) and starting up several small businesses. He has an excellent understanding of the management,
accounting, technical and
day to day skills required for success. He has worked in multiple industries
from Telecom to Construction
to Office/Property Management. His broad skill sets have allowed him to interact with everyone from factory
workers to CEOs. He has helped implement processes that have increased productivity and profits throughout his
career. His ability to grasp
entire scopes of projects and quickly determine deficiencies and solutions has
helped advance many companies
and increase revenues. 
We believe this management team, and those
that have yet to come, combine the knowledge
and experience that will ensure the success of the company and have the knowledge and experience to add the proper mix
of personnel to reach our goals and objectives.

Where we are & why we need youAfter more than a year working our tails off we are almost at the point of having fully functional prototypes. We've harnessed the best of technology and design to provide amazing features to solve all the problems of the modern cell phone user.As seen in:Possible dendrite related failure:
What's Next?
We already have trusted manufacturing partners with vast experience in electronics ready to help us get Maxergy Solar Adaptors to market.* December - Spread the word and fund our dream.* January - Finalize and build the functional prototypes, set up the tooling and start software development* February - Tooling build out,complete assembly testing and international control certifications. Part qualification and pre-production builds, pilot production, quality assurance and product validation.* March - Begin manufacturing for the injection molded and thermo-molded parts, software testing.* April - Finalize the assembly process and begin order fulfillment.* May - Delivery???

RISKS AND ChallengesWe have been working  for more than a year developing Maxergy Solar Adaptors and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisers that will also help.Manufacturing:We need to create the tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.Software:The software is functional but we still have work to do building all the features that we want to include. Software development sometimes gets tricky and takes longer than expected, but we have a lot of experience in this area and if necessary will look for additional help to solve any problems that could emerge.We will undoubtedly have surprises on our journey, but we trust that we have the team to overcome all challenges, as we've done so far. Our goal is to make the best possible product for you and deliver it right on time.

story:
What is Movie Grub?

Concession lines at the cinema can be very long, crowded and take more time than moviegoers have before show time.  Crowded concession areas are good business for theatres; however, in such cases, the moviegoer may not get the seat he or she wants, miss the previews and/or the beginning of the film.  Moviegoers would solve this issue by simply choosing not to purchase any concessions.

Now when you buy your movie ticket online, you can also buy your food—never stand in crowded concession lines again.

Long Lines & No Time

Concession lines at the cinema can be very long, crowded and take more time than customers have before show time. Crowded concession areas are good business for theatres; however, in such cases, the moviegoer may not get the seat he or she wants, miss the previews and/or the beginning of the film. Moviegoers would solve this issue by simply choosing not to purchase any concessions. The Solution, Movie Grub The App!

Cross Platform and User Friendly

Movie Grub is a very user-friendly app that will work on nearly all mobile devices. Download Movie Grub by using the appropriate application store for your device.  This step will need to be done only once.  Choose a specific theatre to view their concessions menu.  After paying for your items, simply pick them up at the express counter and then walk into your movie.

What We Need & What You Get

The "Movie Grub” Campaign needs your support to take the app to the next level. We are a small company that has managed to make preliminary deals with our ideal client base (cinema chains), the ideal user base (moviegoers) and future marketing support.  We also have an in-house tech, which has designed and programmed the app.

What we don’t have is an in-house team to create a ready for market version for all three major platforms (Android, iOS and Windows).  What we are looking for now are investors to help us raise around $600,00 to $1.2 million for us to bring on other programming teams needed for cross platforming, and to keep the company afloat during the beta period, which could be around 8-months to a year.

Be the first to get on the ground floor of new technology. As you can see, we have many levels of support, of course all levels of support is very appreciated and will be showcased on our website and future business communications.  Moreover, supporters contributing a thousand dollars and up will participate in our profit sharing program for a full year after the app officially launches.

The Underdog

We are a small company with a big idea trying to take that idea to the next level.  An underdog looking to become the next big thing, so be a part of this with us.  Contribute what you can if you cannot be an investor—show some support for the underdog!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position to contribute monetary support, or just want to help us get the “word” out, you can raise awareness by using the Indiegogo share tools to help us get investors.

story:
ATTENTIONS: MARBLE DCS1 AND DCS2 only support the New MacBook Pro 13 inch version but NOT 15 inch. Please be aware of this before contributing.

 

 

  

More and more laptops are featuring the new, powerful USB Type-C port. All of your computer's power, data transfer, and output will be wired through a single USB-C port. It truly embodies technological simplicity.

But what about your stuff? And when you need to multitask, how do you fit everything into a single port? Well, that’s where Marble comes into play: the ultra-portable 2-in-1 docking and charging station that is designed to work with USB-C devices such as Apple’s new 12-inch Macbook, Dell XPS 13 (9350), Samsung TabPro S, Huawei Matebook and other emerging models.

*Marble’s port expansion function should work with all devices that feature a USB3.1-C port. However, the charging function may not work with certain USB3.1-C featured devices if the charging voltage of the device does not fall into one of the five following voltages: 5V/9V/12V/14.5V/19V Marble supports or the manufacturer intentionally disabled the charging function by third-party chargers like HP Spectre X2.

Marble offers a single compact way to connect multiple devices to your USB-C ported laptop, including the new Macbook, Dell XPS13-9350, Samsung TabPro S, Huawei Matebook and other emerging devices.  

With 2 USB 3.0 high-speed ports, 2 USB-C ports, an MSD 4.0 microSD card reader and monitor extension ports like HDMI and Mini Displayport, Marble gives you all the functionality of having your devices nearby. It’s as though they are still plugged right into your computer.  

 

 

With a built-in 60W AC adapter, it's time to say goodbye to all those chargers and adapters for your smartphone, tablet and other devices. That’s because Marble does all the jobs simultaneously! Think of Marble as your super-charger – it’s the perfect system made to charge your USB-C ported laptop while also powering your other devices.  

 

 

When it’s NOT connected to an AC outlet, you can still use Marble as an on-the-go multifunctional hub for your laptop. The power supply of the USB ports will automatically switch from AC to laptop with a total maximum power output of 5V1.5A (following USB bc1.2 specifications).

 

The beauty of Marble is that you can even use it as your super-charger and travel companion without connecting it to your laptop. Marble works as a regular, yet much more powerful charger for your daily life.  

 

The 12.9-inch iPad Pro supports USB Power Delivery as the new 12-inch MacBook. Thus, it can be charged with a 29W charger (14.5V2A). Similarly, the iPhone 6 and later models also support quick charging at 11W (5V2.1A). However, the default chargers are only 5V/2,4A (iPad Pro) and 5v/1A (iPhones) respectively.

Now with Marble, you can fully unleash the fast charging speed of the 12.9-inch iPad Pro and iPhone 6 (and later models) (up to 29W for iPad Pro and up to 10.5W for multiple iPhones simultaneously). That’s twice as fast as charging with Apple’s default charger!

*In order to quickly charge the 12.9-inch iPad Pro using Marble, a USB-C to lightning cable is needed. It can be purchased directly from Apple: http://www.apple.com/shop/product/MK0X2AM/A/usb-c-to-lightning-cable-1-m

Marble offers a single compact way to connect multiple devices to your USB-C featured laptop. Marble DCS1 has 2 USB 3.0 Type A ports, 2 USB-C ports, an HDMI Type A port, an MSD 4.0 microSD reader, and a 60W AC inlet to power it all. In addition, DCS2 is equipped with a Micro HDMI and a Mini Displayport to switch out the HDMI Type A port. It’s the only system designed to charge your laptop while powering all of your devices. 

 

 

One of the greatest technical difficulties we faced during the development of Marble was how to ensure substantial output capacity in such a small form factor with the presence of so many additional ports. We are very proud that we successfully integrated a built-in 60W AC adapter into such a small form factor, which is crucial for any effective multi-device power supply that works with your laptop.

 

3 Ports（1 USB3.0-C + 2 USB 3.0-A） Featured with MoSmart™ Charging Technology

MoSmart™ Charging Technology can detect all the devices that are plugged in and automatically adjust the charging current to the optimal one. From trivial current charging devices like Fitbit to Bluetooth earphones, and from regular current charging devices like smartphones to power-hungry devices like the iPad, Marble takes care of them all and delivers the optimal current automatically.

1 USB3.1-C Port Featured with MoSmart™ Turbocharging Technology

 

On Marble, the USB3.1-C port not only adjusts the current like MoSmart™ ports, but it also supports USB PD2.0 and adjusts the voltage automatically among 5V/9V/12V/14.5V/19V.

Powerful as proven, Marble has a similar size to the Apple 60W charger, but it is equipped with so many extra features that a regular Macbook charger could never provide. Marble is your ultimate super-charger and your best travel companion.

 

 

 

Safety has always been our priority, which is why we built Marble with advanced protection technology. Marble protects all your plugged-in devices from overcurrent, overvoltage, overtemperature and short-circuiting, giving you a stable power supply and peace of mind

 

Marble is made internationally compatible with a working voltage of 100-240V. We will include 1 AC power cord that is compatible with your local socket based on the backer's choice or their shipping destinations. (Backers can specify their AC power cord type in the final survey.)

 

Imagine the hundreds of dollar you would need to spend on all the cables and adapters for your many devices. Now Marble does everything for you, and you can have it all at an affordable price. And let’s not forget the ease of use Marble provides!

 

 

As for YoCam, our previous Kickstarter campaign, we just charged shipping and handling costs without taking care of backer’s import tax and VAT like most other Kickstarter campaigns. It turned out that many of our backers, especially our European backers, were burned by insanely high duty/VAT costs, especially since the courier often charges additional handling and processing fees.
 
Now, we would like to proudly introduce Marble as the first worldwide shipping-friendly campaign. All you have to do is pay a one-time flat shipping fee, and we will take care of all the tax and import duty-related issues. (We know how much of a headache it can be.) Below is a breakdown chart of how we determine the shipping rate for different countries and regions.
 
In brief: With the flat fee we charged, we will take care of all additional shipping costs, including shipping, handling, duty and VAT. We guarantee your peace of mind!

Most backers would like to know Marble’s development progress. Here are a few real video demos of Marble charging and docking functional tests from our engineers in Taiwan.

story:
What is the most common problem we all have with portable batteries?

We forget to charge them and when we need to use them they are dead or low on battery !

Slimger PRO solves that problem !

Stack them up & charge magnetically ! Charge up to 8 units with a single charging cable.


   SlimgerPRO is Winner of iF Design Awards 2015 

                 

                 



Powerful 3000 mAh battery, adding an extra 100-140% to your smartphone

                         


Ultra compact design,credit card sized, fits in most wallets

                         

                         


Magnetic Charging: Stack up to 8 SlimgerPro's and charge them without the use of any cables 

                        

                        


Built in Charging Cable (Lightning or Micro USB)

                        



Built in LED light 

                         


                                                            LED Battery Indicator

                         


                                         Slimger PRO is available in 2 versions:

                                                

   

            Built-in Lightning Connector for iOS or micro USB for Android devices


                                        The Lightning version is Apple MFI certified 

                                                                        

                                          Slimger PRO Product Specs:

                                                     Battery: 3000mAh/3.7V

                                                     Output: 5V/1A

                                                    Size: 90 x 58 x 6.9mm

                                                    Weight: 0.12lbs

          

                 


              

FAQ's:

What does magnetic charging mean?
Slimger PRO magnetic charging allows you to charge multiple SlimgerPRO's simply by stacking them together, you can stack up to 8 units together. Never forget to recharge your power bank for the next time you need to use it.  (1 SlimgerPRO is connected with a micro USB and the rest can be stacked on top of each other)

When will shipping begin ?
We have started manufacturing for the Slimger PRO beta units, we will ship 100 units to the initial 100 units sold on indiegogo in February, all the remaining SlimgerPRO orders will ship in March 2016.

How much extra battery will Slimger PRO give my smartphone ?
Slimger PRO uses the most powerful battery available in the market for its ultra compact design. Battery capacity on Slimger PRO is 3000mAh, It will give your smartphone a minimum of 100% and a maximum of 140%, this depends on the smartphone, for example: an iPhone 6 will get about 120% (one full charge and an additional 20% ), and an iPhone 6 plus will get about 110% extra battery.
Is SlimgerPRO Apple Certified?
YES, the Slimger PRO iOS model is MFi certified, you will not get that annoying pop up message on your phone that sais "not compatible".

What colors are available?
We have decided to only manufacture a black Slimger PRO at this time, we may add more colors later as stretch goals, but at this time only black color.

If you have any questions please leave a comment on our campaign page, or email us at pro@slimger.com
story_txt:
What is the most common problem we all have with portable batteries?We forget to charge them and when we need to use them they are dead or low on battery !Slimger PRO solves that problem !Stack them up & charge magnetically ! Charge up to 8 units with a single charging cable.   SlimgerPRO is Winner of iF Design Awards 2015                                   Powerful 3000 mAh battery, adding an extra 100-140% to your smartphone                         Ultra compact design,credit card sized, fits in most wallets                                                  Magnetic Charging: Stack up to 8 SlimgerPro's and charge them without the use of any cables                                                 Built in Charging Cable (Lightning or Micro USB)                        Built in LED light                                                                                      LED Battery Indicator                         
                                         Slimger PRO is available in 2 versions:                                                               Built-in Lightning Connector for iOS or micro USB for Android devices                                        The Lightning version is Apple MFI certified                                                                                                                   Slimger PRO Product Specs:                                                     Battery: 3000mAh/3.7V                                                     Output: 5V/1A                                                    Size: 90 x 58 x 6.9mm                                                    Weight: 0.12lbs                                         FAQ's:

Battery capacity on Slimger PRO is 3000mAh, It will give your smartphone a minimum of 100% and a maximum of 140%, this depends on the smartphone, for example: an iPhone 6 will get about 120% (one full charge and an additional 20% ), and an iPhone 6 plus will get about 110% extra battery.

Is SlimgerPRO Apple Certified?

YES, the Slimger PRO iOS model is MFi certified, you will not get that annoying pop up message on your phone that sais "not compatible".


What colors are available?

We have decided to only manufacture a black Slimger PRO at this time, we may add more colors later as stretch goals, but at this time only black color.

If you have any questions please leave a comment on our campaign page, or email us at pro@slimger.com

story:
This is the Power-Vessel SWING.

Introducing a most innovative and powerful universal charger designed to be perfect partner of your smart lifestyle. The Power-Vessel is a high tech marvel that allows you to enjoy all of your mobile devices throughout your home and beyond, with amazing power, latest technology and unique function, The Power-Vessel has amazing functions like PD3.0 and QC3.0 fast charger and Universal Charger for your own laptops. so that it allows everyone to enjoy various devices with this all-in-one charger.

 

Bring this all-in-one Power Charger
into every part of your life

  • Ultra Power : Max 130~150W / Rated Max 100W(KC Certificated) Portable Charger
  • Power Delivery 3.0 Type-C : MAX 87W
  • Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 + Universal Laptop Charge USB-A(X3): MAX 70W
  • Input : AC 100-240V 50/60Hz 2A
  • Max output : 130W
  • Max rated output : 90~110W(It depends on each Certification test) / 100W(KC passed)
  • Built-in rotatable Swing Stand
  • SIZE/WEIGHT: 110 x 98 x 20.3mm (WxDxH) / 250g
  • MATERIAL: ABS, PC
  • Intelligent Protection Functions : Over current, Over voltage, Over load, Over temperature and Surge protection.

 

 

Just enjoy this powerful marvel's show!

We've updated some test movie for Backers' easy checking!!

1. Max Power Test

Max power charging test with MacBook Pro 15", LG gram 15", Galaxy and iPhone. For common environmental condition, it can charge up to 130~150W without protection reset.

 

2. Safety Function Test

Power-Vessel has smart safety Functions. Over load, Over temperature, Over current/Voltage, Surge-Protection. You can see how it works at this movie.

 

3. Specification Summary

✅ Monster Power : 130~150W Max⚡⚡(When usign all ports)
✅ Rated Power : 100W(KC Certificated, it depends on each Certification)
✅ PD 3.0⚡ Max 87W Awesome Compatibility : for MacBook, Nintendo Switch, MS Surface and other PD Products
✅ QC 3.0⚡ Fast Charge for smartphone and tablet PC
✅ Max 70W⚡ Universal USB Charging for various Laptops
✅ Built-in rotatable Swing stand and Carbon body design

 

BUILT-IN HIDDEN STAND

 

CHARGING PHONES

 

LAPTOP

 

MacBook Pro

 

 

The most perfect Universal Fast Charger

For your Smartphone and iPhone, 
Macbook, Nintendo switch
and your Laptop

 

​

 

 

"Quick Guide for Power-Vessel Backers"

 

 

" Techs Specs "

  • Ultra Power : Max 130W / Rated Max 100W(KC Certificated) Portable Charger
  • Power Delivery 3.0 Type-C : MAX 87W
  • Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 + Universal Laptop Charge USB-A(X3): MAX 70W
  • Input : AC 100-240V 50/60Hz 2A
  • Max output : 130W
  • Max rated output : 90~110W(It depends on each Certification test) / 100W(KC passed)
  • Built-in rotatable Swing Stand
  • SIZE/WEIGHT: 110 x 98 x 20.3mm (WxDxH) / 250g
  • MATERIAL: ABS, PC
  • Intelligent Protection Functions : Over current, Over voltage, Over load, Over temperature and Surge protection.

                                                                                                                            

 

ANYWHERE FOR YOUR LIFESTYLE

Power-Vessel SWING can be your partner for your all lifestyle. you can see where Power-vessel goes with you. Home, office, camping, outdoor and everywhere with you.

 

 

REWARDS

 

TIMELINE

 

About us

There are plenty of hardware products available on the market, new or old, cheap or expensive, simple or complicated. However, It is hard to find new marvels to meet users needs correctly.

In case of mobile charger products, powerful and stable output is first requirements for new product. and more we've focused to expand cases to be able to use our product. so that we could develop Power-Vessel SWING can be used for ultimate various devices. All-in-one Universal Charger! 

Power-Vessel SWING is the first project that designed and engineered by Fundian, most innovative hardware team in the world.

Now you can meet this Power-Vessel at Indiegogo.

 

Referral Program

If your shares refer a backer to our campaign, and they pledge more than one Power-Vessel Charger, you will win FREE rewards!

Bring one Power-Vessel Charger pledge, you will get one FREE Premium Case (worth $16+FREE shipping)

Bring five Power-Vessel Charger pledges, you will get one FREE Power-Vessel Charger (worth $69+FREE shipping)


The more you share, the more you will win!

*NOTE: referral program is only for backers! And we can oly track online refers. All refers will be tracked by indiegogo.

There are several ways to win, and we suggest you try them all! There is no share time limits and the more you share, the higher chance you have of winning this free award.

Method 1:
If you are already logged in indiegogo, just find these buttons and share quickly.


Method 2:
Log in to indiegogo, visit Power-Vessel indiegogo page:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/power-vessel...

Find the share button and share directly

Method 3:
In addition to the one click share button, you can also take two steps to refer our campaign to more people:

Step 1: Login your indiegogo account, and go to our campaign page, copy the link with the series number, that's your unique referral pixel.


Step 2: Past that link to anywhere with large viewership, like your emails, facebook groups, Linkedin groups, personal blogs, or some forums, anywhere. The more you share, the better your chance is of winning the FREE awards.

Some tips to win

For your winning, here are several really helpful tips:

1. Write something interesting, like digital trends artical title: "For $69, Change your MacBook, Laptop and Smartphones charger, PD3.0XQC3.0 100W Power-Vessel". that's really eye-catcher

2. Share on some good forum. Many great forum like B&H, dpreview, what hifi forum etc, if you are playing on those great forums, it is great to share over there.

3. Share in great facebook/google plus groups. There are many great facebook and google plus groups, you may consider also share in those group. We found several referral program free winners, they shared indiegogo campaign in some large kickstarter crowdfunding facebook groups, and some hardware gadget facebook groups.

4. Paste that link to anywhere with large viewership, like your emails, facebook groups, Linkedin groups, personal blogs, or some forums, anywhere. The more you share, the better your chance to win.

 

How to help us if you don't buy Power-Vessel ?

If you can't afford to contribute to our campaign, or if you're waiting for us to be in physical shops to buy our Power-Vessel, it doesn't mean you can't help us !

Please share, comment, like and spread the good work !

Find us here and share the word ! You may use the indiegogo share tools!

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Pinterest
  • LinkedIn

Thanks for your interest, we are very proud and impatient to send you the best of our products.
We believe you'll soon become our fans like us ;-)

story:
Please remember to send your phone number for shipping to symlis@symlis.com after placing your orders to avoid shipment delay.



The final design and features can be found on symlis.com

Sparrow Lightning version is now renamed as Swallow.

Video above and content below only refer to early design and features. Some of the design and features differ from the final product. Please make sure you read through all specifications on our official website before placing orders.


////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////


Turn your flash drive into a USB cable whenever you want.


Have you found yourself with a dying phone while there was a USB port just a few feet away? It is hard to carry a charger all the time, but finding a USB port is much easier.  

Do you want to carry big files for your smartphone but the phone is out of space? Carrying a SYMLIS Sparrow USB OTG flash drive for your smartphone will make your life much easier.


"A Combo Flash Drive-Phone Cable Is The Most Useful Thing On Your Keys." 

- Chris Mills, GIZMODO


"It is certainly something we have not seen before"- MIKE SHOUTS

"Not many people want to carry around a charger cable everywhere they go, and that's where more portable options like Symlis' Sparrow portable cable comes into play." - Dave LeClair, Gizmag

Featured in


Why SYMLIS Sparrow


Flash drive for daily routines . SYMLIS Sparrow integrates a fully functional USB flash drive with 16G, 32G and 64G options.

Flash drive feature demo


USB charging & sync cable. Charge or sync your phone with SYMLIS Sparrow from a USB port any time. 

USB cable and OTG features demo

Free up your phone’s space. With OTG, you can save large files (such as movies) into your Sparrow, and access them with your phone without compromising your phone’s precious storage space. You can also backup files, photos and more very easily. (click HERE for USB OTG supported smartphone & tablets list)


Frustration free design. Effectively engages with complex environments.

Compare with other mini cables


Small and portable. You always have enough room for it.


Keychain friendly. Carry it on your keychain anywhere, any time.


Covering brands: Acer, Asus, BlackBerry, Fujitsu, Huawei, HTC, InFocus, Lenovo, LG, Motorola, Samsung, Sony, Xiaomi etc. (click HERE for USB OTG (On-The-Go) supported smartphone & tablets list)

Prototypes

Here are some of our early prototypes:


Project Timeline


Where will the money go?

All-perks-reward for #1 referrer

If you brings the greatest referral contributions at the end of the campaign, you will win a collection of perks from each category from $5 to $230 (including Special Editions if the stretch goal is reached).


Q&A

It is that easy to find a USB port?

Yes! Nowadays, USB ports become standard features in many devices in many laptop, desktop, printer, monitor, speaker, wall socket, TV, Xbox, PlayStation, airplane, office, hotel, power bank, car, boat. Keep your eyes open, and you will find them.


How to claim a perk?

If this is your first time using Indiegogo, you could read Indiegogo’s article Here.

What is OTG (On-The-Go)?

USB OTG (On-The-Go) allows your mobile device to become a host to directly communicate with USB peripherals such as flash drives. It often uses a Micro-USB connector to link the host devices.


The difference between OTG, Bluetooth,NFC, and others.

Using Bluetooth to transfer a large file is painfully slow, and usually requires pairing. Most desktop PCs don’t equip Bluetooth.

NFC (Near Field Communication) is relatively new on smartphones and tablets. NFC is faster than Bluetooth. However, NFC requires two devices to remain close together during file transferring. However, most of laptop and desktop PCs don’t equip NFC.

OTG is also very fast. Today, major smartphones, tablets (not iPhone, or iPad) in the market support OTG. OTG is a “Plug & Use” feature for most of the supported devices. You can enable SYMLIS Sparrow’s OTG functionality on the Micro-USB connector to communicate with your mobile devices and use its USB Type A connector to communicate with your PCs.

Some other types of file sharing methods such as Cloud storage and Wi-Fi Direct, need additional Internet or wireless connections. The transferring rates vary depending on conditions.


USB OTG supported smartphone & tablets list.

Click link HERE.

How to refer this campaign to friends?

Click link HERE.

You schedule seems longer than other similar project?

Manufacturing is tricky. Even though we are working hard to keep things on schedule, there may be some unforeseen variables such as delays on material supplies. Manufacturing high quality products requires time and effort. We understand that you are eager to receive your products, but it is better to delay for high quality than lose quality control just to rush production. As you may know already, many crowdfunding projects suffer delays and other complications because they leave themselves too little margin for unexpected issues. Instead of providing you an unrealistic delivery schedule, we leave margins in our schedule for handling these unforeseen obstacles during manufacturing, and we work diligently to minimize the impact on delivery schedule caused by any potential issues in the future.


Address changing, upgrading your perk or wanting to ask additional questions?

You can contact our customer service at symlis@symlis.com with your name and your Indiegogo account name, address and your questions.


My contribution attempt is unsuccessful, how to solve it?

This article may help HERE.

Have suggestions for our product?

You can comment about our product on our website, Twitter, Facebook and Instagram pages. We always welcome your suggestions and take them seriously. We want you to help us to make our final product even better!



Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you can’t contribute this time, please click share buttons on the left to share our campaign to your friends who may need them!

relatively new on smartphones and tablets. NFC is faster than Bluetooth. However,
NFC requires two devices to remain close together during file transferring. However,
most of laptop and desktop PCs don’t equip NFC.
OTG is also very fast. Today, major
smartphones, tablets (not iPhone, or iPad) in the market support OTG. OTG is a
“Plug & Use” feature for most of the supported devices. You can enable
SYMLIS Sparrow’s OTG functionality on the Micro-USB connector to communicate
with your mobile devices and use its USB Type A connector to communicate with
your PCs. 
Some other types of file sharing methods
such as Cloud storage and Wi-Fi Direct, need additional Internet or wireless
connections. The transferring rates vary depending on conditions.



USB OTG supported smartphone & tablets
list.

Click
link HERE.



How to refer this campaign to friends?
Click link HERE.
You schedule seems longer than other
similar project?
Manufacturing is tricky. Even though we are
working hard to keep things on schedule, there may be some unforeseen variables
such as delays on material supplies. Manufacturing high quality products
requires time and effort. We understand that you are eager to receive your
products, but it is better to delay for high quality than lose quality control just to rush production. As you may know already, many crowdfunding projects suffer
delays and other complications because they leave themselves too little margin
for unexpected issues. Instead of providing you an unrealistic delivery
schedule, we leave margins in our schedule for handling these unforeseen
obstacles during manufacturing, and we work diligently to minimize the impact
on delivery schedule caused by any potential issues in the future.

Address changing, upgrading your perk or
wanting to ask additional questions?
You can contact our customer service at symlis@symlis.com with your name and your
Indiegogo account name, address and your questions.

My contribution attempt is unsuccessful,
how to solve it?

This
article may help HERE.

Have suggestions for our product?
You can comment about our product on our
website, Twitter, Facebook and Instagram pages. We always welcome your
suggestions and take them seriously. We want you to help us to make our final
product even better!

Other Ways You Can Help
Maybe you can’t contribute this time, please click share buttons on the left to share our campaign to your friends who may need them!

story:
Social Lock Developers Kit

The Social Lock Developers Kit contains an assembled PCB combining a Bluetooth Low Energy SoC capable of driving a set of locking components. The device locks and unlocks using a secure API. It's made for developers who think their smartphone is a key. Just like we do. With the Social Lock Developers Kit you can add a smart lock that is operated with a smartphone to any system.

 

How did this get started?

In the past months we build the demonstrator of our Social Bike Lock. During this work we discovered a simple need: a well programmed PCB and bluetooth low energy component you can integrate in any design; with a basic Android app to get you started with your lock in hours instead of days.

The very first Social Lock Demonstrator 

 

There are a bunch of solutions on the rise that help you secure your houses, cars, bikes and boats with your smartphone operating as a key. The Social Lock Developers Kit is an easy first step for anyone who is exploring the possibilities of smart locks. 

We chose a bike lock ourselves which is pretty challanging because of the tough conditions a bike lock is exposed to and the reliance on batteries. We are looking forward to see your ideas locks! 

 

The Social Bike Lock Demonstrator


So what is in the Kit?  


An assembled PCB with on it an Bluetooth Low Energy device capable of driving common components like solenoids, servos, etc and charge an attached LiPo.

A common LiPo battery

A basic servo (the one we use in our bike lock)

Online Documentation

Android application to connect with your lock



We are in development..

We successfully made a first prototype of the Social Lock Developers Kit. We need a funding of €20.000 to take the step from one prototype to a reliable and complete Social Lock Developers Kit. A successful campaign will allow us to create at least 100 kits at affordable costs with a local factory in The Netherlands, develop a view missing pieces of software and ask an expert to take a last look at the security issues. 

By supporting our campaign and helping us reach our goal we get the opportunity to create a thriving community of developers working on an world wide open source framework

 

Meet the team 

We are Peter Tettelaar, Daniël Steginga, Gerrit Jan van 't Veen and Gregor van Egdom and a bunch of other Dutch engineers with backgrounds varying from Web and UX Design, Electronics and Industrial Design. We cooperate in several projects with different companies in the lead. This one is started by Dutch Coast. Our team has a decade of experience in failure and success with projects like this. Fortunately the latter is most common to us.

This is actualy the first time we use a crowdfunding platform to start a project like this. Althought many tried this before us, we are still pretty excited about it! 

 

Questions and Answers

What does the Kit solve? 

The kit allows you to create a (portable) lock which can be opened with your smartphone. Send virtual keys, with the Social Lock platform, to your guest users to gain access to your lock.

Why do I need the API?

To send virtual keys or manage your device, you will need the API. 

Nevermind the Kit, can I get my hands on the Social Bike Lock?

Sure you can, but we will start an alternative campaign for the Social Bike Lock. If you are interested in becoming a Social Bike Lock partner, contact us at hello@dutch-coast.com.

  

Other Ways You Can Help

Your not a maker yourself? You like the idea but you ran out of budget? We can use your support. Share this campaign with the world! 

(Questions left? Ask Away!)

story:
Short Summary

Why MotoMod Secure

  • We believe that the Online World needs to be made safer as the the number of incidents of ID theft, payment fraud, IoT hacks are on the rise.
  • We plan to bring International Standard driven Biometric Identification (Fingerprint Meets ISO 19794-4 and Iris meets FCC Class A, RoHS) to a handheld device to secure your home, your payments and your digital data. 
  • Specifically designed for Motorola's largest markets USA and India
  • USA
    • Government Agencies: The MotoSecure has a PIV (Personal Identity Verification) compliant bio-metric sensor and hence can be used by enforcement authorities and government employees and contractors who use PIV credentials for remote access on mobiles.
    • Home Safety, Personal Safety and IoT: Verizon FIOS customers, who use Droid by Motorola services can enable an additional layer of biometric security for their Home and IoT devices and payments and we will work with Verizon Cloud and Verizon Home Internet to make this a reality
  • India - which has an independent Biometric authority (AADHAR/ UIDAI), the various use cases we have identified are as under:-
    • Banks, Payment Banks and Merchants
      • Additional security and authentication for transactions.
      • Fraud Detection and Database Integrity
    • Government of India – Digital India – “DEiTy”
      • Services like Jeevan Pramaan, Property Registrations, National Attendance Register are already AADHAR enabled. A   handheld device that can offer these services will be of great help.
      • 3 Day Passport and many more to come….
    • Individual users
      • GoI  AADHAR enabled services
      • Trust ID
    • Business Users
      • Company Registration, MCA filings, Secure Banking

 

Our Team

  • Meson Labs is a Singapore based think tank of IIT-IIM graduates working in diverse fields of technology and finance, that aims at utilizing technology to provide solutions towards building a better and simpler world
  • Project Lead - Ashish Sharma - I am an MBA from IIM Calcutta, and a Mechanical Engineer from IIT Kharagpur, who has been an entrepreneur for the past ten years. We built the first Personal Health Record company in India which secured two rounds of VC funding before being acquired by a Healthcare Conglomerate.
  • Our core group of serial entrepreneurs includes Computer Professionals, advised by a Board of Senior Finance and Tech Personnel

 

What We Need & What You Get

Key Activities

  • Design: Integration of STQC Certified biometrics devices into a shell for the Moto Z
  • Software Development: Mobile App Development to integrate the services with biometric and payment Apps
  • Hardware and MDK Development: Make the Shell with the Devices Hot-Swappable
  • Supply chain and distribution: We are in talks with financial firms, and agents which work to provide Government Services for purchase and  distribution of these devices and Moto Z handsets.

The funds from this campaign will be split 20-40-40 in the first three stages of the product development.

  • Our Perks our designed to take you along our journey as we try and integrate and build a successful product
  • Also for our early contributors we have a 30% discount on the MotoMod Secure and Limited Edition Sets.
  • The Company is already engaged in building the product and will continue to pursue the same even if the target is not achieved out of the Company Funds. We look forward to your support and hope there is no shortfall.

FAQs

A lot of our readers have asked us if the existing safety and security measures are not enough. We feel that as we do more and more with our smartphones, and incidents of hacking and data theft are on the rise, it behooves us to be extra careful.

 

Home Security and IoT with MotoSecure

Smart homes enabled by IoT enabled devices such as surveillance cameras, door locks and other home appliances such as set top boxes, refrigerators and microwave are transforming our lives. However, these connected devices have also brought cyber threats chillingly close to our every day lives. Recent news of thousands of televisions and fridges being turned into source of malicious emails, hackers using printers and set-top-boxes for mining bitcoins and CCTV cameras being used of DoS attacks illustrate the point.  

Our solution would provide state of art two factor authentication along with anytime access through Verizon network. This would ensure that all your home automation systems would remain securely within your reach wherever you go.  Loss of your phone would not mean loss of your privacy or loss of your home security any longer, and enable a physical lock on the device only you can open.

story:
NOTE: Preorder phase is over. Throw your email on my mailing list to be notified when it is in stock at the hexinverter.net online shop!

What is seqSQUARED?

Find the Bill of Materials here:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Av... 

seqSQUARED is a unique module for analog synthesizers. It is an analog pattern generator/sequencer expander, and serves as a great accompanyment to an array of sequencers of any length.

hexinverter.net has paired up with Re:Synthesis once again to bring a really cool module you can build or pick up ready-made in popular formats!

I think it is best said with an image of how it works (excuse the poor resolution. Indiegogo makes it small - find a larger, more readable version here!):

 


 

Technical Features

  • Analog pattern generation/sequencer arrangement + combining up to 8 steps of sequences long (with 4 sequencers as sources) 
  • Professional eurorack panels available in kit and pre-made form
  • Analog style user interface that feels right at home in a modular synthesizer
  • Internal voltage-controlled clock divider (works with sequencers up to 64 steps in length as sources)
  • "Chaos" feature, which can add randomly tested probability that the step picks a random sequencer's note data instead of the one you have programmed for that step
  • Fits in 26HP eurorack space with easy to assemble kit (or premade)
  • Requires a +/-12 or 15V analog power supply (consumes ~50mA)
  • Accepts standard 0-5V CV and gate signals

 

Formats Available

seqSQUARED will be available in a pretty flexible configuration. Re:Synthesis is for sure providing panels for eurorack, and possibly other formats.

You can preorder these options here on Indiegogo:

  • Preassembled eurorack in 26HP format w/ Doepfer compatible power cable
  • Eurorack kit form with all the necessary board-mount components to make your own module
  • Universal kit form without the eurorack specific jacks, switches and other eurorack only parts, so you can make your own module or standalone in a different format
  • A set of bare printed circuit boards with a programmed microcontroller, so you can source your own components (not for beginners!)
 

More Detailed Information 

Still reading? Awesome. Now I'm going to hurt your eyes with a wall of text about just how cool this module is, and what it can do for your modular setup you've worked so hard to piece together.

Essentially, seqSQUARED ("sequence sequencer!") is a voltage controlled sequential switch to expand a sequencer array with, that works more like a creative musical device than most out there. My inspiration came from the way that most simple "pattern bank" software works -- load up a bank of patterns, and arrange a sequence of them to create a song. 

It also just serves as a sequencer expander. It allows you to take multiple sequencers and chain them seamlessly into one big sequencer (ie: 4x8 steps = 32 steps, etc.) 

So, it serves as an excellent module for someone with, say, a nice set of sympleSEQ sequencers!

The module was designed with analog programming in mind, and does not rely on deep menu editing systems or LCDs like are commonly associated with digital microcontrollers. The idea is a simple, easy to program device that allows you to expand your sequencer array by combining and re-arranging multiple sequencers in interesting patterns. 

What it does is take up to 4 independent sequencers, and turn them into a pattern bank by multiplexing them. Effectively, it turns 4 equal length sequencers into one big, programmable sequencer that can be any combination of 8 of those 4 sequencers...ie: 1, 2, 3, 4, 1, 2, 3, 4 or...4, 3, 2, 1, 1, 2, 3, 4...whatever you program it to! 
 
It also sports a voltage controllable clock divider, and a feature I call "chaos", which simply introduces a percentage change that it will output a randomly selected sequencer's note on the next step.

For more information, and any technical questions, feel free to check out the muffwiggler.com forum thread for this project, or email me directly at: hex[at]hexinverter.net 
 

Okay, so why the pre-orders, and how does this work?

Funding a larger product for a niche market like this is simply too expensive for a university student like myself to front the cost of!

seqSQUARED components and PCBs will be ordered as soon as the funds are ready -- this means that a lot of the parts should be ready before the funding deadline ends. seqSQUARED kits will be shipped out very first, then people who ordered ready made modules will have theirs shipped out a couple weeks after (it takes time to assemble them all).

I am known for making a tremendous amount of updates and answer all emails and comments very quickly, so rest assured you will get to follow through the entire design and production process!

$3,500 will ensure we can get the required minimums to get the parts needed at the necessary prices. If we do not meet that goal, I will still do my absolute best to make this happen. It is highly unlikely, but if we did not meet the goal I would return 100% of everyone's funds.

 

For reference, please refer to my last project successfully funded on here:

sympleSEQ: The easy to build analog step-sequencer 

 

Here is a shot of the CAD renderings of the prototype boards. They will arrive soon and then a video will be made, demonstrating the module in an analog synthesizer environment!

Here is a shot of the CAD renderings of the prototype boards. They will arrive soon and then a video will be made, demonstrating the module in an analog synthesizer environment!

story:
What are BeerBacks™?

BeerBacks™ are smartphone cases that have a bottle opener built into the back.

They are custom fitted and constructed from a premium polymer material designed to protect your smartphone during daily use.

The special design allows for a stainless steel bottle opener to be fitted into the raised section on the back, providing just the right amount of leverage to easily open bottles. 

The raised area on the back also positions the phone nicely to read text messages and other notifications without having to pick your device up from a flat surface.

Why?

Have you ever needed a bottle opener and couldn't find one? 

Maybe you own a bottle opener keychain or a bottle opener belt buckle or even a bottle opener flip flop (they all exist) but do you always have your keys in your pocket, wear that belt or have flip-flops on in the winter? 

I doubt it...but you ALWAYS have your smartphone with you!

That's why we are launching BeerBacks™, it's the perfect solution...why put something you usually need on something you may not always have with you?

Why not put something you need on something you always have with you...problem solved.

With your help we can bring BeerBacks™ to the retail market for the iPhone 4/4s, the iPhone 5/5s and the Samsung Galaxy S3/S4.

This will be our third Crowd Funding campaign, our first two campaigns, The Klick Stylus Pen and The Klick Stylus Slim, were successfully funded and have received great feedback and reviews.

What We Need & What You Get

There is only so much we can do on our own so we need your help!

  • We need $2,000 to create production grade tooling.
  • Another $1,000 for initial product inventory and supplies.
  • You get BeerBacks™ for up to 60% off the MSRP as your perks!
  • Depending on our success, we may even add more smartphone sizes.

How You Can Play a Bigger Part

We have learned that Crowd Funding is a social strategy, we need every backer that believes in us and our products to share them on their social networks and with their friends and family in order for us to be successful...what's the best way to do that? 

Offer Rewards.

We want you to be rewarded for your efforts so this is what we will do for you in addition to sending you perks for your pledge:

  • For every 5 people you refer that pledge $10 or more we will send you an additional BeerBacks™ Case with your perk shipment.
  • You must be a backer yourself of $10 or more in order to qualify.
  • You will be able to choose your rewards after the campaign ends via BackerKit.

Risks and Challenges

Any project comes with a certain number of risks and challenges, we are confident that our previous campaign and production experience will keep things running smoothly.
