This will be our third Crowd Funding campaign, our first two campaigns, The Klick Stylus Pen and The Klick Stylus Slim, were successfully funded and have received great feedback and reviews.


What We Need & What You Get
There is only so much we can do on our own so we need your help!

We need $2,000 to create production grade tooling.
Another $1,000 for initial product inventory and supplies.
You get BeerBacks™ for up to 60% off the MSRP as your perks!
Depending on our success, we may even add more smartphone sizes.



How You Can Play a Bigger Part
We have learned that Crowd Funding is a social strategy, we need every backer that believes in us and our products to share them on their social networks and with their friends and family in order for us to be successful...what's the best way to do that? 
Offer Rewards.
We want you to be rewarded for your efforts so this is what we will do for you in addition to sending you perks for your pledge:

For every 5 people you refer that pledge $10 or more we will send you an additional BeerBacks™ Case with your perk shipment.
You must be a backer yourself of $10 or more in order to qualify.
You will be able to choose your rewards after the campaign ends via BackerKit.



Risks and Challenges
Any project comes with a certain number of risks and challenges, we are confident that our previous campaign and production experience will keep things running smoothly.

story:
Thank you!

Our campaign has now ended and – thanks to you – we reached our goal with some room to spare. In fact, we are proud to announce that bttn is the 2nd most funded technology project ever from Finland!

We will now go deep into the dungeons and start whipping the elves (just kidding, we wouldn't whip anyone) so that we can ship all your goodies very soon.

T-shirts will be shipped sometime next week and they should reach you around the end of October.

The bttns will be shipped in early November and they should reach you sometime later in the month.

We will also tally all the referrals next week and will start issuing your rewards then.

And if you missed the campaign but still would like to order a bttn or two, do drop us a line. 


What Is the bttn?

The bttn is just what it sounds like – a simple Internet connected (either via WiFi or 3G) physical push button that can be used for almost anything using the power of the Internet. Here are some examples:

    You can set the bttn to execute e.g. the following predefined tasks:

    1. Send messages: email or text messages
    2. Send social media messages: Tweets or Facebook status updates
    3. Submit any http get or post request, i.e. control a web page
    4. Control smart home devices: OpenHome and SmartThings compliant
    5. Trigger IFTTT recipes or Zapier zaps
    6. Publish a RSS feed
    7. Update counters on the web
    8. Everything else through our REST API
    9. And much more (no kitchen sink, though)...

    Why Did We Create the bttn?

    Consider the Internet-of-Things (or Internet-of-Everything as some like to call it): everything – yes, literally everything – will be connected. Lightbulbs will talk to houses will talk to entertainment systems will talk to ... something else.

    This massive interconnectedness will fundamentally change how we interact with our environments. We will have unprecedented control over how the things we live with behave and respond to our needs.

    Cars will be safer. TV will be better. Homes will be smarter.

    There's a catch, though. Your alarm clock may talk to your heater may talk to your coffee machine but something is missing: you.

                                                  Even Fido, the official bttn dog, can use it

    The bttn is all about simplicity: making the Internet-of-Things simple, accessible, and – dare we even say it – human again. It is no longer just computer chips talking to computer chips in ones and zeros.

    With the bttn, you take charge using the simplest user interface in the world: a modest push-button.


    Featured in

    Naturally, we think the bttn is the greatest thing since sliced bread. But you don't have to just take our word for it:


    What Is It For?

    That's the beauty of the bttn: only your imagination is the limit. You can create very simple or very complicated actions using our back end but using the bttn will always be super simple.

    Families can use the bttn for communications, safety, and many, many other uses:


    The bttn can be used for home and office automation to bring a shortcut to our everyday lives:



    The bttn is great for service businesses for streamlining their operations and improving communications:



    For example at a medical office, the assistant or nurse can hit the bttn to let the doctor know next patient is ready.


    Retailers and other businesses can easily build customer surveys using the bttn at a very low cost:


    One bttn press at the office and BAM! Your favorite lunch has been ordered for delivery. Press twice for a hungry friend:


    In fact, the more we have spoken with potential users, the more uses we have discovered. We bet you have some ideas that we haven't even considered yet. Even more use case examples in the media gallery! 

    This is Fido's favorite

    We'd love to feature your use case in our gallery!


    How Does it Work?

    The process of setting up and using the bttn is very simple. The initial setup procedure consists of four simple steps:

    1. If you want to use 3G data, insert a GSM microSIM card with a mobile data plan. Voice and text features of a data plan are not needed. Note: W-CDMA version (available in 2015) required in Japan for 3G.
    2. Give it power: Put in four AA batteries, or plug in a 5V MicroUSB power adapter (chances are you already have one a compatible cell phone charger lying around in your home). We did not include a charger, as the world is full of wall outlet power sockets of different shapes.
    3. If you don't want to use 3G data (i.e. no microSIM card is inserted), then Wi-Fi is used. Open your laptop, log in to Wi-Fi access point "bttn", and enter your Wi-Fi network's SSID and password.
    4. A small green led will light up when the bttn is connected.

    Now you can start creating your bttn magic.

    1. Using any browser, go to the URL my.bt.tn, and create an account using the code provided with your bttn.
    2. Press the "Settings" button to give your bttn name and location.
    3. Press the "Configure" button to give your bttn an action.

    Now you can either choose one of the many ready-made actions or create your own. 

    You can select from predefined actions or create your own

    Customizing a pre-made action requires just filling in a some basic information such as a phone number or an email address and the message you want to send.

    It does not get much simpler than this

    And you're done. Everything is web-based and you can control, monitor, or configure your bttn from any web browser no matter where you are.


    If you are technically minded...

    When a user presses a bttn, it contacts our servers and performs a predefined tasks – like texting someone, sending an email, running a program, turning a device on or off, and so on. 

    The predefined tasks can be chosen from a ready-made list (with super-easy customization) or you can create your own if you are feeling ambitious. 

    We've spent a lot of time to make sure that the system is easy enough to use for just about anyone yet it has enough power to satisfy hardcore geeks. 

    We integrate with a whole lot of channels and services

    The bttn communicates with bt.tn servers, which then trigger the pre-set action. The actions can be counter updates, web page updates, twitter tweets, RSS feeds, IFTTT triggers, email, SMS messaging, or any combination thereof.

    Bttn’s multiple patent-pending system offers a wide variety of ready-made drag-and-drop actions as well as wizards for simply and quickly defining new actions.

    You can easily control several bttns

    Using the bttn to trigger an IFTTT recipe is just a matter of a few clicks


    Beautiful by Design 

    We gave an internationally known industrial designer the task of making the bttn beautiful, functional, and robust. Harri Koskinen's earlier work includes the iconic Block lamp and we think we may have another icon on our hands.

    Designed in Finland by Harri Koskinen

    The bttn works in connection with e.g. IFTTT, and Zapier, making the thousands of great integrations and already created accessible with a simple push of a button. Whenever these (and other) services evolve, we evolve.


    What Is in It?

    Please note that battery life depends on usage conditions and patterns


    OpenHome and bttn

    We are particularly excited about the possibilities of the bttn in the Smart Home. So, we have joined OpenHome Labs, a program launched by connected home leader Icontrol Networks. When funded, bttn will work seamlessly with all devices and services bearing the OpenHome logo.


    The bttn plays nice with OpenHome and your smart home

    What Difference Does My Contribution Make?

    By contributing, you help us get to the market faster, smoother, and safer. You ensure you and others get the bttn sooner.

    Contributing also gives a clear signal to us that we are doing something that matters to you – this sort of validation is extremely important to us.

    We've set an initial goal of $50,000 for the campaign. With this funding we can proceed quickly with our manufacturing and get some quality products out very soon. Should we fall short of the goal, we will still proceed with manufacturing but the schedule is likely to stretch and we most likely have to start with smaller volumes, which increases manufacturing price and the eventual consumer price. 


    And What Do Our Backers Get?

    We have created a wide variety of perks ranging from our undying gratitude (which you can earn with surprisingly little money) to a company-wide battery of bttns to your very own custom Configuration Wizard on our server.

    See the right side bar for a detailed list of the perks we offer. If you have an idea for an even better perk, let us know. We just might use your idea!

    You can select your bttn in one of the four colors. Or, maybe, get the whole series.
    And, of course, there is a super-duper cool t-shirt available. We think it looks pretty fab. We hope you agree...

    Press the bttn and Magic Happens™

    Your Reward for Referring Friends

    There are social media buttons at the top of this page. When you click on them, they send a tweet or a Facebook post or a Google+ message with a special URL that leads to this campaign. What is special about that URL is that if your friend makes a contribution, you will be credited with an assist (right, technically it is a referral).

    We keep track of the referrals and we will reward you with a $10 credit towards your contributions for each referral. Because of Indiegogo rules, we cannot give you cash but if you make 3 referrals, you can get a t-shirt for free. If you make 10 referrals, you get a free bttn. And so on.

    The only real catch is that you need to be either logged into Indiegogo OR you need to send the message in connection with your own contribution (the tools will be available on the contribution page) in order for the system to track the referral.

    When you are sending your referral message, you can save the URL and reuse it. You do not have to be logged in when reusing the URL; it is enough that you are logged in when you create it.


    The bttn story

    We are based in Helsinki, Finland, which is one of the hotbeds of European tech startups.

    We've often been asked how we came up with the idea for the bttn. As many of the greatest inventions or services (no, we are not on that level yet but we are working on it) the bttn grew out of a series of case discoveries.

    Two years ago our Founder Harri was sitting with some of his friends at a restaurant terrace in Helsinki, Finland. They wondered why - in the otherwise ready-made world - there were no action buttons at the tables, which could be used to signal waitresses. At the same time, one of them shared his worry about how he could help his 75 year old mother, living alone in her house, to make it day-to-day.

    Thus began the bttn journey. Harri is a serial entrepreneur and making new things is in his blood. He started talking to some of his trusted friends, potential recruits and some potential early backers. Things came together quickly – everybody loved the idea – and the company was started in the Autumn of 2013.

    First prototypes came out in early 2014 and now we are preparing for our first mass production run.


    Risks & Challenges

    Developing new stuff is always a little risky. We think our risks are manageable as we have undergone several hardware revisions already, we have a seasoned team, the prototypes works well, and we have a very tightly focused goal. However, the risks include:

    • Quality issues in production
    • Potential component shortages
    • Key team members being run over by the number 7B tram
    We are keeping a very tight track on our production in order to mitigate any risks. Furthermore, our team never crosses the road in one group in order to avoid catastrophic tram-related accidents.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you like what we do but are not in a position to make a contribution, we'd still like to hear from you. Referrals to friends, feature suggestions, and rah-rah messages are all received with great pleasure.

story:
**The description has been removed for security purposes.**

Hey! My name is Jordan and like many of you, I love playing football with the crew and look forward to playing every weekend. I am an average Joe who plays the sport for fun and for some bragging rights here and there. In my spare time I come up with crazy ideas. This idea, as all of my friends have agreed, is something special that enhances one of our favorite activities!

In every game, there’s always a situation where a team wants to draw up a play to increase their chances of success for the next down. My idea is to have something available at all times and that is easily accessible for whenever you want to make a play. Since none of us want to carry around a clip board, pen, and paper, why not utilize something thats compact and way more advanced?

A no-brainer! The majority of the market has smart phones and there seems to be an app for just about anything. Why not make something for the weekend warriors? Equipped with an armband and the ARMCOACH app, you'll experience instant gridiron dominance and an elevated level of fun!

This campaign will help bring ARMCOACH to life! Your contributions will make the App well, an App! At this moment there are only complete screen shots and a shiny logo. 

The money will fund the demo (not finished, but working) version of the app, which will then be given to testers. Testers will then give us feedback, suggestions, and problems they encountered with the demo. After which we'll make all necessary adjustments and corrections.

 

The Impact

Pick-up football, whether it’s tackle, touch, or flag has become a tradition for countless friends and families around the country. All of us try to play like our favorite players we see on TV and with ARMCOACH we can at least take another step toward that goal!

My development team is excited and anxious to get started on a working model! Why? Because like me, they're football fans too and think this is something special!

Your contributions will put them into high gear to produce a fantastic product! This is the first of many ARMCOACH Apps as I look to create a business of high performing, quality software that cannot be duplicated! 

This campaign is the start of ARMCOACH. As a sport software suite and a franchise. ARMCOACH will appear on the court, diamond, ice, grass and even the gym.  

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends, family, neighbors, co-workers, complete strangers, and most importantly, ANYONE who enjoys or plays FOOTBALL!!

 

Here's How You Can Help ONLINE!

Find, Like, and Share ARMCOACH on Facebook!

https://www.facebook.com/Armcoach

 

Follow and Tweet about ARMCOACH on Twitter! @ArmCoachAPP

https://twitter.com/ArmCoachAPP

 

Find, Watch, Like and Share via YouTube! 

http://www.youtube.com/user/ArmCoachAPP

 

Copy/Paste the Indiegogo.com link to any of the Above sites!

www.indiegogo.com/armcoach

story:
Company Overview

EZPC’s, are the brainchild of a group of Silicone Valley, and Bay Area Computer Engineers, each having at least 25+ years or more experience in building, servicing, repairing and designing computer systems, and networks. 

EZPC, Inc. is a New Start-up for July 2014, and will be based in Sacramento, California.  The company is moving quickly to secure funding for its operations with a product launch date sometime within the 4th Quarter of 2014.

EZPC Market

If the EZPC concept is successful it is projected that there may ultimately be at least 1-EZPC Computer System in 75% of homes worldwide.  There could be an EZPC in every classroom worldwide.  Further it is projected that more than 66% of the world’s population will have an Ez-Drive in their hand, purse or pocket.

Switch  "BOOTABLE"  Ez-Drive Technology

At least “1-EZPC in every Home” and at least “1-EZPC in every Classroom” could factor out to be Millions of EZPC Units over the next few years worldwide.


THE WAY COMPUTERS SHOULD BE MADE...!

The EZPC’s functionality is revolutionary and represents an easy and simple change to how personal computers are made and used.  The EZPC will have a longer in service life than traditional computers, thus producing less electronic waste, and offer tremendous green energy, and technology budget savings.


MILITARY GRADE PARTS & COMPONENTS:

Reliable & Dependable 

 

Certified EZPC Technology

EZPC Computers are designed the way computers should be made. To insure the universal uniqueness of the EZPC for the market, brand name Manufacturers such as Dell, HP, Lenovo, Acer, ASUS, Toshiba, Sony and others can produce genuine EZPC Certified Systems.   Do-it-Yourself builders can also get in on building EZPC's Certified Systems.  Authorized Computer Service Centers can provide localized support for the EZPC. 

If you are involved in Computer Technology you want to be on the EZPC Team of Supporters and included in the EZPC Network.



EZPC plans to make and manufacture its own unique versions.   The EZ-Desktop version of the EZPC is ready to Manufacture and Market.  The EZPC-AIO All-In-One Version is ready to Manufacture and Market.  The EZ-Laptop Versions are under final design specs with the prototypes expected any day.

The exact price of each unit remains undetermined until the molds are made and the features components are finalized.  However starting prices of $199 for the Desktop, $249 for the Laptop, and $299 for the All-in-One Version are the targeted introductory online and retail prices for the EZPC units.


Funding Summary

EZPC is seeking Funding; Investments, Partners, Advertisers, and Industry Relationships that can push a 4th Quarter 2014 launch before the Christmas Holidays.   

EZPC would like to raise $100,000, to complete the development of the EZPC’s.  The final development includes the Unit Mold Making so production and sales of the EZPC’s can begin.  Getting the mold complete for the Ez-Laptop is critical thus funds are needed immediately.

Acquired funding will be immediately used to implement the EZPC Corporate Infrastructure, Website Development, Online Shopping Store, Office Acquisition, Assembly and Servicing Facility.  Any unspent funds will apply towards Marketing, Advertising, and Sales Force Training.

 


Click here to see the EZPC Start-up Business Plan Video


 

                                                    Contribute $1 or MORE..!


Every $1 Counts and your dollar tells us that you understand the EZPC Technology and want to be involved with introducing and bringing the EZPC to the Market Place.

Our true goal is to get $1 from as many as 100,000 Supporters who are tired of traditional computers and their problems.  Once you have had or experience an EZPC you will not want any other type or kind of computer ever again.  

Early Crowd-Supporters of at least $1 or more, will be given priority consideration for the EZPC Seeding Program, and a Lifetime EZPC Membership which is $99-Annually. Early Crowd-Supporters will be used as Beta-Testers when needed for new future EZPC Models.  Welcome to the birth of the EZPC Family, and its Future..! 

For more information visit our Website at www.EZPC.com


Do Your Part & Get Paid $$$


Other Ways You Can Help

As soon as the EZPC Concept hits the Technology Media Channels this campaign could take off.   If you are a Crowd Funding Consultant, Marketer, Media Advertiser, a Blogger or a Business Person seeking an opportunity to offer EZPC your products or services please invest your $1 first before contacting us.   After you invest your $1 then send us an email about your intentions or CLICK-HERE to tell us what your products and services are and what it is worth.  We do need help, as much as you can provide.

The opportunity to Invest is open to anyone who can spare $1 usd, however if you cannot afford the $1 you can do the following.

  • Like us on Facebook
  • Tell your friends, use the Indiegogo Share Tools!
  • Visit the Investment Page on our Website.

And that's all there is to it.

is projected that there may ultimately be at least 1-EZPC Computer System in 75%
of homes worldwide.  There could be an EZPC in every classroom
worldwide.  Further it is projected that
more than 66% of the world’s population will have an Ez-Drive in their hand,
purse or pocket.

At least “1-EZPC in every Home”

story:
english down below - www.PKparis.com


Résumé

" NOUS VOULONS QUE NOS CLIENTS SOIENT FIER DE NOS PRODUITS "

- La plus petite clef USB3 au Monde       (64GB à laisser sur votre laptop)

- La plus petite clef USB au Monde pour Android     (tablette/smartphone)

- Un porte clef malin, pour ne plus ni chercher , ni perdre sa clef USB

- Une clef USB mousqueton, pour l 'attacher/détacher instantanément où vous voulez

- Des clefs USB pour tablette/smartphone, pour echanger dans les 2 sens

- Plus de clefs innovantes à l'étude pour faciliter votre vie à la maison ou en voyage


 (our video K'lip, ... and video K'2 on youtube/channel/PKparis)

PKparis, “Premium Keys of Paris” société française établie en 2013, par une équipe qui possède 20 ans d’expérience dans l’industrie hi-tech crée des produits de stockage simples, innovants, design et ergonomiques pour vos ordinateurs, tablettes/smartphones, TVs en voyage ou à la maison, commercialisés sous la marque PK .

Parce que nous considérons que l’expression “ce qui est petit est joli” demeurera à l’origine des évolutions des nouvelles technologies, PKparis a décidé de se focaliser sur le design du plus petit produit hi-tech : la clef, un produit qui regroupe intelligence et connectique, et qui sied dans le creux de la main . 

Grâce aux clefs innovantes de PKparis, vous sauvegarderez, partagerez, utiliserez et échangerez vos données avec plaisir. Nos clefs USB, clefs wifi, clefs HDMI et autres clefs faciliteront votre vie digitale.

Le slogan de PKparis, "Inspired", imprègne chacun de nos produits, associant toujours une idée à un design. Notre logo, emblème de notre identité,  combine simplicité, couleur orange et métaphore et façonne l’esprit de toutes nos clefs.

La métaphore de notre logo vient de « peka » signifiant « étoile » en dialect des îles  marquises. Comme une étoile dans le ciel, notre logo guide notre vision. Il connecte le soleil à l’étoile polaire comme PKparis connecte votre monde avec ses produits. Ces deux sources de lumière ont toujours été un repère pour les aventuriers. Avec PKparis vous pourrez naviguer dans le monde digital à votre guise.  

Enfin, tous nos produits commercialisés sous la marque PK, sont conçus à Paris par un vivier de talentueux ‘designers’, nous liant à une longue tradition d’excellence et d’élégance mais aussi au désir de nous engager dans le futur dès aujourd’hui. Cette ‘french touch’ unifie toute notre gamme . 

                                  PK K'1 : la plus petite clef USB3.0 au monde

Notre besoin 

Nous avons besoin de votre aide.

  • Face à Goliath :  Nous sommes une petite start-up (3 personnes, bureau dans notre sous sol). Faire un business électronique dans le marché très compétitif des clefs usb, face aux sociétés de X Milliard d’euro n’est pas facile  …
  •  Nous sommes différents:  Nous nous concentrons sur les clefs premiums et innovantes exclusivement. Chaque produit apportera quelque chose de nouveau. Notre objectif avant tout : que vous aimiez et que vous vous souveniez de nos produits.
  •  Votre aide:  Nous avons commencé grâce au soutien de nos amis, mais pour commencer nos produits 2014, nous avons besoin de votre aide.

Impact

  • Notre projet : faciliter l’accès à votre monde digital. Ou le produit est très bon ou nous ne le produirons pas (même si nous avons perdu de l’argent). Nous avons déjà annulé 2 projets car trop décevants.
  •  Nos produits : voici 2 produits que nous avons lancés mi octobre 2013, et plus de produits excitants sont à venir bientôt. Nous pensons alors que vous serrez d’accord que nous sommes différents et que nous ferons la différence … ensemble, avec votre aide.

Votre aide

Certains d’entre vous ne peuvent contribuer financièrement, mais vous pouvez aider à:

  • Promouvoir notre marque et nos produits autour de vous (email, etc)
  • Vendre nos produits
  • Nous suivre sur facebook
  • Contribuer aux designs, aux idees etc  (aller sur www.pkparis.com/vous)

                      PK K'2 : la plus petite clef USB au monde pour Android

----------------------------------------


Short Summary

" WE WANT OUR CUSTOMER TO BE PROUD OF OUR PRODUCTS "

- the world smallest USB3 key, 64GB to plug and stay on your laptop

- the world smallest USB key for Android (tablet/phone)

- a clever Keyring, to avoid to look for or lose your USB key

- a carabiner USB key, to attach it whereever you want

- USB Keys for tablet/smartphone to exchange in both way

- more innovative Keys to help life at home or in travel


PKparis, Premium Keys of Paris, to connect your world, is a French company established in 2013, by a team with 20 years experience in hi-tech industries, to create a unique range of simple yet small innovative, designed and user-friendly storage products for computers, mobiles/tablets,TVs and cars, under the brand PK.

Considering that the term “small is beautiful” will always drives the new technologies, PKparis decided to focus on the design of the smallest but vital hi-tech product: a key, a device gathering intelligence and connection small enough to sit in your hand.

With PKparis’s innovative keys, to store, use, share and exchange your data will always be a pleasure. Our small USB keys, WIFI keys, HDMI keys and our future releases will facilitate your daily digital life.

Our compagny’s tagline ,"Inspired", informs our range of products, the result of harmonising an idea to a design. Our logo drives the identity of the brand, combining simplicity, a metaphore and the  orange color to reinforce an aspect of the key, be it its quality or its use. The metaphore of our logo comes from Peka, meaning ‘star’ in marquises islands dialect .

Indeed, like a star in the sky, our logo guides our vision. It connects the sun and the Polar star as PKparis connects your world with its products. These two sources of light have always been a guide for adventurers. With PK products, you can navigate the digital realm as you choose.

Finally, all our products are designed in Paris by a pool of talented designers, tying us to a long tradition of excellence and elegance, but also to a desire to engage with the future now. This ‘French touch’ is evident throughout our product range.


What We Need & What You Get

 we need your help .

  • Facing Goliath:
    We are a very small start up (3 of us, office in our underground). Making a hardware business, in the very competitive market of usb keys, facing Billion$ compagnies ... is not easy .
  • We are different:
    we will focus  on premium and innovative product only, each product will bring something new. Our target before all : you will like & remember our products .
  • Your help :
    we started with friends 's funds, but we need now to start our 2014 products. we need you.

The Impact

  • Our project : to facilitate the access to your digital world. Or the product is very good or we will not produce it (even if we lost money). We already canceled 2 projects because it was disappointing.
  • Our products : here are 2 products we launched mid october 2013 and more exiting products are coming soon, then we think you will agree that we are different and we will make the difference...together, with your help. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • You can  advertise our brand and product  around you (emails, etc)
  • You can sell our products 
  • You can follow us on facebook
  • You can contribute with design, ideas ... go to www.pkparis.com/en/you

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Biography

My name is Chitanshu Vora. I am a Pharmacist by profession; a science major and aspiring tech product designer. I have a passion for tech gadgets especially with fantastic design. It would be a dream come true to one day make designing tech gadgets a full-time career. As a father of two sons I realize all of our kids want tech-time. When I saw the children trying to hold the phone to watch "Yo Gabba Gabba", I thought there's a real need for a small, sleek and affordable smartphone holder. So just like many other Kickstarters I embarked on making a prototype.


My business partner suggested I should incorporate a stylus to the smartphone stand. And once we found a manufacturing partner they added a waterproof USB flash drive to the final design.  That's how US3 Drive was born!

Android Data Transfer Adapter!

Android Data Transfer Adapter now available to all US3 Drive funders as a Add-On contribution (see new perk).




Waterproof flash drive, stylus and phone stand in a small package


US3 Drive the 3-in-1 multi-purpose waterproof flash drive. Stylus and smartphone stand works with all Android Smartphones and Apple iPhones.


"US3 Drive: A 3-in-1 multi-functional device" TechRepulic

"Well, it makes perfect sense for a smartphone accessory to play different roles at various times, too, and this is where the US3 Drive comes in. Ubergizmo 

"Flash drives seem to find their way into washing machines, so this device will keep your bytes safe." 9to5Mac

"US3 Drive Performs Three Functions" Device Magazine

"One of the best parts is the fact that the US3 drive has a Samsung memory chip, which makes it very reliable." Cqwen

"It combines a flash drive, smartphone stand, and stylus all a keychain-worthy size." TechnologyTell

"Waterproof touch phone holder set a 3-in-1 Flash Drive" Hwdio

"USB Drive - a small but useful accessory." LiveJournal

"US3 Drive: A 3-in-1 multi-functional device" TechRepulic

"Well, it makes perfect sense for a smartphone accessory to play different roles at various times, too, and this is where the US3 Drive comes in. Ubergizmo 

"Flash drives seem to find their way into washing machines, so this device will keep your bytes safe." 9to5Mac

"US3 Drive Performs Three Functions" Device Magazine

"One of the best parts is the fact that the US3 drive has a Samsung memory chip, which makes it very reliable." Cqwen

"It combines a flash drive, smartphone stand, and stylus all a keychain-worthy size." TechnologyTell

"Waterproof touch phone holder set a 3-in-1 Flash Drive" Hwdio

"USB Drive - a small but useful accessory." LiveJournal

Manufacturing Partner

The product manufacturer we're working with produces electronics for some of the top world renowned companies were quality and durability is first priority.

Production Timeline:

After a successful Kickstarter launch we now want to bring US3 drive to a broader fan base and give others a chance in becoming a part of history. Funders will get the final product by December 2013:

October 30th 2013:  Funding of $2000 or more is complete and funds will be used for Tooling and finalizing of the mold.

November 2013: Manufacture small run of product for quality control testing.

Late November 2013: Approve final product and packaging.  

December 2013: Product release and receive. Ship product to funders.

NOTE: The final design may vary but the key features remain unchanged.

Thank You! For taking the time to look at this project on Indiegogo!


The Dream:

By funding this project of mine, you will fulfill my dreams of becoming a tech-designer. This will give me a break in my career and shed light on my career path and lead me to success.

“Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.” - Gail Devers

Spread the Word:

Whether you like to be a funder or not, you can always help by spreading the word about my project to your friends and family by using all the share tools that are available  on Indiegogo. I appreciate all the help and looking forward to send this exciting new perk to all the funders.

"USB Drive - a small but useful accessory." LiveJournal

"US3 Drive: A 3-in-1 multi-functional device" TechRepulic
"Well, it makes perfect sense for a smartphone accessory to play different roles at various times, too, and this is where the US3 Drive comes in. Ubergizmo 
"Flash drives seem to find their way into washing machines, so this device will keep your bytes safe." 9to5Mac
"US3 Drive Performs Three Functions" Device Magazine
"One of the best parts is the fact that the US3 drive has a Samsung memory chip, which makes it very reliable." Cqwen
"It combines a flash drive, smartphone stand, and stylus all a keychain-worthy size." TechnologyTell
"Waterproof touch phone holder set a 3-in-1 Flash Drive" Hwdio
"USB Drive - a small but useful accessory." LiveJournal


Manufacturing Partner
The product manufacturer we're 
working with produces electronics for some of the top world renowned 
companies were quality and durability is first priority.

Production Timeline:

After a successful Kickstarter launch we now want to bring US3 drive to a broader fan base and give others a chance in becoming a part of history. Funders will get the final product by December 2013:

October 30th 2013:  Funding of $2000 or more is complete and funds will be used for Tooling and finalizing of the mold.
November 2013: Manufacture small run of product for quality control testing.
Late November 2013: Approve final product and packaging.  
December 2013: Product release and receive. Ship product to funders.
NOTE: The final design may vary but the key features remain unchanged.
Thank You! For taking the time to look at this project on Indiegogo!


The Dream:
By funding this project of mine, you will fulfill my dreams of becoming a tech-designer. This will give me a break in my career and shed light on my career path and lead me to success.
“Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.” - Gail Devers



Spread the Word:
Whether you like to be a funder or not, you can always help by spreading the word about my project to your friends and family by using all the share tools that are available  on Indiegogo. I appreciate all the help and looking forward to send this exciting new perk to all the funders.

story:
My Moontime 2.0 – The Updated Version Of The Popular App Needs Your Support! 

Beloved App Since 2014 To Easily Know & Use Your Period And Fertility Potential. Life Might Be One Big Mystery - But Your Cycles Don't Have To Be...

The time has come for your favorite app - My Moontime - to get updated or be gone forever. Apple’s latest App Store updates require apps to meet certain standards and we have decided to turn to you, our loyal supporters, friends and family - in order to help us fund those important updates. 

What Is My Moontime App? – Click Here to find out more about how this unique app can change the way you live your everyday life. Featured in HuffPost, BuzzFeed, Marie Claire and Nylon Magazine, My Moontime has helped thousands of women keep track of their cycles, hormones and inner energy flow!

As you already know, My Moontime app is a 100% independent project developed and funded by Dana Michelle Gillespie, a certified skin care specialist, meditation and EMA dance teacher. She wanted to help other women keep track of their menstrual cycle and moon cycle in order to enhance their awareness and achieve a balanced hormone cycle and life. Once she launched the app, it became an overnight success, with over 26,000 women downloading and using it daily.

Want To Keep Using The App? – Then we need your support in order to comply with Apple’s App Store rules. This new updates requires an extra $40,000 and it’s up to you to help us launch the updated version on both iOS and Android WORLDWIDE. If we don’t comply with Apple’s guidelines, our app will be gone forever and women all over the world will have to rely on poorly-designed and impractical applications once more. 

Why Help My Moontime Shine? By supporting our project, you are giving thousands of women just like you the opportunity to:

  • Track Their Menstrual Cycle 
  • Monitor The Moon Cycle 
  • Understand The Combination Of Menstrual Cycle’s & Moon Cycle’s Energy Flow 
  • Improve Their Daily Life Based On A Balanced Hormone Cycle 
  • Learn More About Themselves 

Hurry Up! Our goal is to raise $40,000 in order to cover the update expenses and continue offering every woman My Moontime app!

"I created this app for myself. I needed a way to track both my menstrual cycle and the moon cycle, as well as the energy potential of the both of them combined - so I could go about my day with more awareness and understanding of myself. Otherwise I tried to track my cycle with other apps and by hand and I would always loose track and show up to work pms-ing and during a full moon and they would surprisingly be the worst days ever. Having this app has helped me know what's coming ahead and plan accordingly and take better care of myself." - Dana Gillespie, My Moontime App Creator

Spread The Word And Let Your Friends, Family And Colleagues Learn More About Our Efforts To Make Every Woman’s Life Easier!

Thank You For Your On-Going Support & Faith!

story:
Tiny cameras with HD video capability create big issues with shake and jitter. Unfortunately, camera stabilizers (or "steadies") are still big, bulky monsters, not at all appropriate for these miniature cameras and phones. This is the reality that led to creating the weeSteady.

* Note: weeSteady requires a tripod adapter to use with an iPhone or other smartphone.

* Demo: See the Gallery link above for a video showing the weeSteady in use shooting an iPhone video. Wow!

How weeSteady Works

You stabilize a video camera by putting high-inertia mass underneath it to dampen out the little jiggles and wiggles that distinguish amateur video work from professional work. Existing camera steady products provide this heavy mass within the product itself — of course, making them big, bulky, and heavy devices.

WeeSteady intelligently uses the mass of your own arm and body to stabilize your camera or phone videos. It turns out that most of that annoying jittery motion comes from a combination of the bad ergonomics involved in holding the camera with your hand, and the bad stability of your spindly fingers and wobbly wrist being in the mix.

 

WeeSteady is gripped in your palm, with the camera mount extending upward between two fingers, inside your lightly closed fist. You hold weeSteady the same way pros have held video cameras for decades — with your hand lightly closed and your fist turned parallel to your shooting direction.

 

The result? Massively more stable video shots!

Design & Construction

I have a powerful aversion to paying good money for cheaply made products. So, in developing the weeSteady I decided I wanted to create a "lifetime product," one that uses the most lavish materials and construction methods possible. After all, this should be a product you use on a regular basis for decades into the future. You want it to feel like a professional product in your hand, and to never corrode, or break, or fall apart. Right?

WeeSteady is made from investment cast 316 stainless steel, electropolished to a gorgeous permanent sheen. The tripod stud and the lock nut are also made from 316 stainless steel. I could have used plastic, I guess. Instead, I chose to go for extreme quality. The result is the most extremely over-engineered and over-built little camera gadget you've ever touched.

The weeSteady Project

I have been doing product development work for clients for the past 35-years, and have had this growing idea for accessories for the smallest cameras for some time. I've done the design and prototyping and product testing. I've sourced the materials and suppliers. Now, I'm ready to quickly take the weeSteady to mass production and into the marketplace.

Delivery For Christmas Guaranteed!

weeSteady parts are being cast and machined locally in Tennessee and assembled and packaged right here in Nashville. This lets me work swiftly and have the entire process close by, and... very importantly, allows me to safely guarantee shipping all weeSteady pre-orders on or before December 10th, 2013 — easily in time for Christmas delivery!

Use Of Funds

I want to treat this like I am sharing a project with investors, not just "donators." I am not a charity, and you are not here to just give away money. That said, the funds from this project will be used (a) to pay for mass production tooling, (b) to pay for packaging tooling, (c) to pay for final assembly and shipping from my warehouse, and (d) to hopefully generate some profits to seed additional weeGadgets products for small camera users.

The timetable for the project is (a) close out the fully funded project in 14-days, (b) wait 7-days for PayPal to release the funds, (c) immediately pay my suppliers for the tooling and mass production quantity order, plus as many more units as the money raised will allow. Tooling and review of sample parts will take 5-weeks. Mass production, assembly, and receipt of the products to my warehouse will take 3-weeks. So, there will be about an 8-week dead period following the release of funds before I can ship your products to you.

Add it up and you have the project closing, and 9-weeks later your products being shipped to you. Of course, I will provide regular updates as the process unfolds, so you will always know exactly where things stand in getting your products delivered to you.

Thank You For Your Support!

story:
Our mission:

Reshaping your iPhone interaction.

You love the design, aesthetics, material, and feel of iPhones? But you also want to keep your iPhone protected to preserve your experience for the months and years to come? Then you probably know the frustration that comes with unboxing your iPhone just to box it right back into one of the many bulky, unaesthetic veils called phone cases. 

We think: No more choosing between experiencing and protecting your iPhone - why not have both?  That's why we crafted Arc Pulse: 

The case your iPhone deserves.

 

MEET ARC PULSE

 

With Arc Pulse, you can finally enjoy the iPhone experience while preserving it, too - no compromises. At Arc, you are the center of our development efforts.

Here are our some of our features and opinions of media and early testers:

 

Arc Pulse's key features:

Preserves the iPhone experience

Protection where it matters

Patented two-part minimalist design 

Precision made aerospace grade metals 

Silver titanium and black aluminum

No 5G signal interference

Available for all iPhone 12 models

 

OUR PHILOSOPHY

Today, phone case manufacturers are busy designing larger, stronger, or more aesthetic cases. Meanwhile, they forget what they were trying to achieve in the first place - preserving the iPhone experience.

With Arc Pulse, you can experience your iPhone as it was intended to be. During our design process, we extract essential features - those aspects of your iPhone that matter most to you, true to our motto:

 

Essential Design.

Essential Engineering.

Essentially for You.

 

 

The essential features we identified together with our hundreds of testers are Design, Interaction, and Protection. Follow us along as we demonstrate what these features mean for your new iPhone experience.

 

 

DESIGN

Show your iPhone.

When you buy an iPhone, you don’t just buy a phone, you buy an experience. An experience worth protecting, but an experience that should remain true to itself.  We present the most essential iPhone case design yet. 

 

 

 

INTERACTION

Feel your iPhone.​

How does it feel to hold your iPhone without a case? The feel of gorgeous surgical-grade stainless steel band combined with the precision-milled matte glass back - right at your fingertips. This is an interaction worth preserving.

 

 

Yet, typical phone cases require you to say goodbye to the premium experience. They add bulk and weight and replace luxurious materials with plastic. It's time that our iPhone cases match the design standards we value in our iPhones.

The Arc Pulse preserves your intended iPhone interaction like no other case before. Its ultra-slim design and aerospace-grade, high-quality metal surfaces strive to match the iPhone's interaction standards.

 

 

Great interaction doesn't just mean great aesthetics and material feel. Simplicity in design is key. That's why we match the iPhone's simple, elegant design as closely as possible. With our slide-on fit™, it's simple to add to your iPhone, ensuring perfect fit out of the box. For ease of use, all components of the Arc Pulse will be tightly bonded together. Here you can see the two components and how the Arc Pulse is added to your phone. Simple as that.

 

 

But how well does slide-on fit work? Here is a little demonstration:

Do you agree that your iPhone’s luxurious, well-crafted materials should be at your fingertips at any time? 

 

 

PROTECTION

Protect your iPhone.

Among our three essential features, protection presented a challenging engineering challenge. We asked ourselves, how can we provide you with the perfect balance of protection and original feel. How can we protect the iPhone experience without compromising it? Our answer:

Protection where it matters most.

 

High-tech materials and top of the line manufacturing techniques are fused in a dual-layer protection design. Aerospace-grade titanium and aluminum distribute the shock of an impact across the surface of Arc Pulse. Then, a shock absorbent, custom-engineered inner layer absorbs the impact - keeping your iPhone safe.

Whether it's the front, back, or camera of your iPhone, Arc Pulse has you covered.

 

 

The Arc Pulse's dual-layer protection system combines the best of two worlds, the shock distribution properties of a hard shell and shock absorption of a soft inner layer.

 

Distributing the force of an impact

Our primary protection objective is your iPhone. Still, we went out of our way to select the best materials and surface finishes to keep the Arc Pulse looking as new as ever after a drop.

Titanium Grade 5 has an extraordinary strength to weight ratio. It's light & highly corrosion resistant yet guarantees some of the best resistance to drops and shocks.

Aluminum 7075 is already one of the most resistant aluminum types available. Both metals are tagged "aerospace" for a reason. By first heat treating the metal and then hardening the surface of the Arc Pulse Aluminum we push the material to its limits.

Both metals are precision manufactured and polished with CNC-Milling.

 

Absorbing the shock

We combine the premium metals with a custom engineered inner layer that absorbs the shock of an impact. The Arc Team joined forces with a senior partner experienced in developing shock resistant impact materials in the automobile industry. Together, we developed a material that is perfect for the Arc Pulse protection system. This layer is tightly bonded to the metal shell.

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

Together with you we want to reshape technology interaction. To bring Arc Pulse: The case your iPhone deserves we depend on your support.

We've come a long way since the first 3D-printed models shown below. These here are two of our earliest prototypes - the first one isn't pretty, but the second one got the vision across and our feedback & early support was amazing. Thank you everyone who supported us early! You really helped us pull through a challenging year.

 

 

Since then, Arc Pulse has gone through dozens of design iterations, material changes, finish alterations and manufacturability checks. We successfully acquired private funding & government subsidies to investigate, validate and prototype Arc Pulse. Today, we are at the next step in bringing the Arc Pulse to you.

 

 

 

Hardware products have a key challenge: You need the numbers. In other words, industrial production requires sufficient initial funds. Every of your contributions goes directly to taking the final steps towards production and bringing the Arc Pulse to you.

Our partners are waiting for our go. Once we reach our goal we will take the final steps before beginning production. However, we value transparency: We are at the end of our prototyping stage, but not quite yet in the production stage. Some fine-tuning development steps require us to start parts of the production process first. Most notably the creation of Tooling. As a final step before production we will again fine-tune the last aspects of Arc Pulse. We have validated our slide-on fit™ in rigorous testing steps throughout the last months already. After creating the final tooling, we will again ensure the Arc Pulse fits to your iPhone perfectly, every time.

We are looking forward to sharing our progress with you throughout the next months with regular updates. If you have any questions, feedback or concerns - send us a message through Indiegogo or any of our social media channels!

 

STRETCH GOALS

Our goal at Arc is to reshape your technology interaction. We seek to apply essential design and engineering to other products to expand the Arc Pulse ecosystem. Apple's new MagSafe feature opened an exciting avenue for us to explore. First on his shortlist is a mag safe wallet that matches the essential design of the Arc Pulse. If we reach 800 sales, every backer will receive priority access to the best price we will ever offer for this perfectly matching add-on. Additionally, we plan to expand the color range of the Arc Pulse - the new iPhones provide exciting color palettes we'd love to match. 

 

REWARD TIERS

 

 

MEET OUR TEAM

The Arc Team was established in 2019 by technology enthusiasts with the common goal of reshaping technology interaction. Moritz

A visionary by nature, Moritz ingenuity and passion drives the development at Arc. Combines years of experience in computer aided design with a degree focused on Human-Machine Interaction.

Tom

Characterized by a keen passion for systems optimization & data science. Graduated in artificial intelligence & contributed to solving challenging manufacturing problems at the Fraunhofer Institute for Production Technology in Germany.

Niclas

Niclas is driven by his motivation to understand you and meet your needs & expectations. He cares about answering your questions, concerns and feedback (niclas@arc.enterprises). Today, relating to supporters is more and more a mix of humans and data impressions. His experience in psychology and AI allows him to combine both approaches.

 

TIMELINE

 

SUSTAINABILITY

We believe each of us carries responsibility to contribute to a healthy planet. Here's what we do:

Carbon-negative supply chain

Transportation generates CO2. For every Arc Pulse purchase we donate a disproportionate amount to credible non-profit organizations. Our delivery of the Arc Pulse to you has a carbon-negative footprint.

Preventing broken iPhones

Manufacturing a smartphone generates as much CO2 as the electricity you use to power it for 3 years. Every broken iPhone less is a win for the planet.

Build to last

Our products are build to last you throughout the entire life-cycle of your iPhone.

End of life in mind

While the Arc Pulse is build to last, we keep the product's end of life in mind. Every production step is selected  with recycling as key criterion. We identified key partnerships that will allow us to match our high standards.

 

SOCIAL MEDIA & CONTACT

 

Got a question? Contact us at niclas@arc.enterprises

If we reach 800 sales, every backer will receive priority access to the best price we will ever offer for this perfectly matching add-on. Additionally, we plan to expand the color range of the Arc Pulse - the new iPhones provide exciting color palettes we'd love to match.  REWARD TIERS  MEET OUR TEAMThe Arc Team was established in 2019 by technology enthusiasts with the common goal of reshaping technology interaction. MoritzA visionary by nature, Moritz ingenuity and passion drives the development at Arc. Combines years of experience in computer aided design with a degree focused on Human-Machine Interaction.TomCharacterized by a keen passion for systems optimization & data science. Graduated in artificial intelligence & contributed to solving challenging manufacturing problems at the Fraunhofer Institute for Production Technology in Germany.NiclasNiclas is driven by his motivation to understand you and meet your needs & expectations. He cares about answering your questions, concerns and feedback (niclas@arc.enterprises). Today, relating to supporters is more and more a mix of humans and data impressions. His experience in psychology and AI allows him to combine both approaches. TIMELINE SUSTAINABILITYWe believe each of us carries responsibility to contribute to a healthy planet. Here's what we do:Carbon-negative supply chainTransportation generates CO2. For every Arc Pulse purchase we donate a disproportionate amount to credible non-profit organizations. Our delivery of the Arc Pulse to you has a carbon-negative footprint.Preventing broken iPhonesManufacturing a smartphone generates as much CO2 as the electricity you use to power it for 3 years. Every broken iPhone less is a win for the planet.Build to lastOur products are build to last you throughout the entire life-cycle of your iPhone.End of life in mindWhile the Arc Pulse is build to last, we keep the product's end of life in mind. Every production step is selected  with recycling as key criterion. We identified key partnerships that will allow us to match our high standards. SOCIAL MEDIA & CONTACT Got a question? Contact us at niclas@arc.enterprises

story:
The world’s first charging and data transfer cable of its kind! Organizing your cables has never been simpler or more addictive. Simple to use and ingenious, SuperCalla will meet all of your OCD needs.  Our "automagic" technology holds the SuperCalla cable in a neat and tidy shape while remaining fully functional and extendable.  Our patent-pending design provides easy storing, fast charging, and organized traveling all in the palm of your hands—you will never want to put it down!

Please note: shipping and upgrade fees are not included in your perk contribution. International shipping may have some restrictions. Please read the entire campaign before contributing. Thank you!

⚡Quick and easy to coil and organize!

⚡Short 3ft (0.9m) or long 6ft (1.8m) cables!

⚡From neatly coiled to fully released just like that!

⚡Great for traveling. Quick and easy storage with no tangles!

⚡Combine SuperCalla with any car mount for a winning combination.

⚡SuperCalla is truly one of a kind. It doesn't get any better than that!

⚡Fold and connect, fold and connect again, it's that simple!

⚡This cable is impossible to put down!

⚡We call it the twister. Once you figure it out, it's fairly simple!

PLEASE NOTE!: iPhone, 100W and 6ft options require additional upgrade fees collected during the survey process. Surveys are automatically sent out 11 days after your contribution was made. We are temporarily unable to ship to the UK for contributions made after January 1st, 2021. We apologize for this inconvenience. Please see more information below.

 

⚡Up, up and out of the way!

⚡Easily coil your cable for a neat and tidy charge or data transfer session.

⚡Make your coil small or large keeping those counter tops looking great.

⚡Unlike any other cable you have ever set your fingers on!

⚡Here is a dual cable setup we use. So nice and clean. What do your cables look like?

⚡SuperCalla is short and organized but does not require disconnecting to use the device unlike other short cables.

⚡Charging your AirPods has never looked so good!

⚡Even wireless chargers are better with SuperCalla!

⚡Gotta love not having cables clogging the drawers!

7-Time Project Creator!

⚡Charles Harris leads the team with 7 years crowdfunding experience raising nearly $4 million dollars USD with support from over 90,000 crowdfunding backers worldwide! See his other campaigns listed at the bottom of the page.

Warning! This is not a toy for children! Keep out of reach. Suggested for ages 15 and up.

Coil, snap, uncoil, repeat. During our brainstorming sessions we could not put SuperCalla down. The snapping of the magnets and coiling of the cord was satisfying and extremely addictive. We quickly realized that we were fidgeting with our cables for fun as much as they were charging our devices.  We cannot wait to see all the designs our supporters come up with!  Please keep in mind, this product is not only plugged into an outlet when charging, it contains magnets as well.  Please be cautious and keep out of reach of children.  We suggest the use for ages 15 and up.  

⚡SuperCalla will become your desk toy of choice. Your office buddies will be jealous!

⚡We call it the flattened flower. Okay, now get back to work!

⚡What size coil would you like? The choice is yours!

Supercalla is as functional as it is aesthetically pleasing.  Our cables are up to speed. SuperCalla is rated for fast charging, data transfer, and it is also compatible with wireless fast charging technology. SuperCalla cables are also made to last. They're reinforced with our flexible, protective silicone tubing and made with premium, high-grade materials.  Last but not least, our cables are compatible with nearly every phone or device in your arsenal!  Let's get charging together!

Our specs and technology are up to date with what manufacturers suggest and provide with the majority of their devices in order to provide a fast, safe charging environment.

Upgrades / Shipping VERY IMPORTANT

Please note: you will be able to choose your type, color, and length during a survey we send to the email associated with your account 11 days after your contribution was made! All above reward pricing is for standard NON-iPhone connection types in 3ft (0.9m) length.

There will be a $2 upgrade for iPhone connection types.

 We have recently added a type C to type C charging cable with 100W 5A PD charging capabilities that will incur an additional $3 charge (this specific cable may only be available in 3ft length).

There will be a $3 upgrade for 6ft (1.8m) length cables.  

These upgrades are per cable. You will be able to upgrade and make these selections after the campaign ends. The upgrades are done like this to reflect the true difference in cost for us to manufacture, but so that mix and matching options within different perk levels is possible.

VERY IMPORTANT

Below is our estimated shipping charges for standard shipping. The shipping charges are based on our expected volume and could increase or decrease slightly.  The shipping charges shown are the estimated amount you will be charged.  NOT a per cable charge.  You will be charged shipping during the survey we send 11 days after your contribution was made. The final cost will be calculated during the final checkout process, this is just an estimate! Shipping is based on weight and dimension of your package and NO shipping is included with your contribution. 6ft and 100W cables weigh more than the 3ft cables and will cost more to ship.

We are temporarily unable to ship to the UK for contributions placed after January 1st, 2021. We apologize for the inconvenience.

For USA orders:

The single: $5-7

The double: $7-9

The triple: $9-13

The family: $15-17

The office: $18-20

For International orders:

The single: $10-12

The double: $12-15

The triple: $15-20

The family: $20-30

The office: $30-45

VERY IMPORTANT

All transactions are NONREFUNDABLE once outside of the IndieGoGo 10 day refund window.  Surveys are sent 11 days after your contribution was made to allow this window to close. Please see our FAQs for details.  Supporting a project on IndieGoGo is NOT like buying something online and once the refund window is closed we cannot offer refunds. Please see IndieGoGo's FAQs for details. Please contribute responsibly. We are temporarily unable to ship to the UK for contributions placed after January 1st, 2021. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Our team researched charging cable standards and what goes into the same cables that come with your devices.  Not so we could duplicate them, but so we could make them better!  We tested hundreds of cables, connection types, magnets and silicone tubes ensuring our cables have superior quality while meeting USB requirements and international safety certifications.

⚡Functionality is key to our patent pending product. Genius, but it wasn't rocket science!

⚡We have tested hundreds of cables to get to this point. There is no turning back now!

⚡Our sleeves provide protection and is key to the functionality of SuperCalla Cables.

⚡As fancy as connection leads have become, we found the simplest designs to perform the best!

⚡Let's just say the office didn't have enough space!

⚡Seemingly ordinary, these magnets are not your typical breed!

Not only are we a father-son and father-daughter duo—we are all related!  Combining all of our knowledge was a no-brainer.  Together we have a combined total of over 100 years of experience in business operations, engineering, project management, product design and development, process engineering, supply chain management, digital marketing, and entrepreneurship!

⚡My father, my uncle, my cousin and I complete what I call a dreamteam!

⚡Charles Harris leads the team with 7 years crowdfunding experience raising nearly $2 million dollars USD with support from over 50,000 crowdfunding backers worldwide!

⚡I have always loved simple ideas. You can find these projects I launched under Xpand Indiegogo and on Kickstarter!

⚡We used our phones to film and shoot the entire campaign, and we used our SuperCalla cables to keep us charged up and to transfer all of our footage and images!

Risks and challenges 

With launching a new product into the world, there are risks and challenges. We feel confident that the risk for this project is very low. We are ready to begin our manufacturing process once our funding goal is hit. We have experience from 6 previous successfully delivered campaigns! Our team is 100% ready to bring SuperCalla into the world. Generally the biggest risk on any crowdfunding platform is for unknown delays in manufacturing. Things can always change along the way when bringing a new product into the world for the first time. With a technology product, there are many hurdles to jump over and we are ready to jump. This isn't my first rodeo and we are ready to tackle any unforeseen issues that come our way. We plan to bring as close as possible, SuperCalla cables in its demonstrated form on this project. All information we disclose in updates, in the comments and in private or direct messages in this campaign or through emails is subject to change as we move through production. There may be critical decisions we need to make moving forward that we did not foresee or that we cannot control. Our ultimate goal is to deliver one awesome cable to our supporters!

story:
XCAN is the world's smartest wireless phone charger for vehicles.

Just place your smart phone on XCAN for automatic navigation launch and fast wireless charging simultaneously.

 

 XCAN helps you to focus solely on driving!

 

 

 

 

 

XCAN is the world's first wireless charger that uses NFC technology. 

XCAN is innovating right now. 

Place your smartphone onto the holder, and it will automatically start navigating!

 

It’s now time to say good bye to your old car phone mounts and chargers!

Other products are designed with infrared (IR) sensors which are famous for use in fire detectors. IR sensors detect all kinds of objects, even your hands moving in the air. Because of this, the device could releases your phone and could cause an accident.

Unlike IR sensor products, the FOD (foreign object detection) sensor only recognizes digital signals. This makes it much safer than existing products with no worry about dropping your phone. It’s safe. 

By putting your phone on XCAN, it immediately recognizes and automatically holds your smartphone.

You can release the auto-hold by pushing a button.

 

 

 

 

XCAN is designed to release your smartphone when the electric current is cut off, allowing you to easily pick up your phone.

Do not waste your time for picking up your phone.

 

Carrying both a charger and phone mount every day is such a hassle, especially tangled cables that interrupt you while driving.

But, you do not need to bring all of these every time. 

XCAN solves these problems all at once. 

Simply put, it’s a 2-in-1 device for dual wireless phone charging and holding.

We recommend using QC 3.0 Charger for fast wireless charging.

 

XCAN is compatible with both iPhone (since XS model) and Android OS smartphones. With just one XCAN, you can set different settings for an Android smartphone and an iPhone respectively . (e.g. Android-Google Map / iOS-Apple Map)

With the XCAN you can use navigation, play music, and so much more without worrying about your phone’s battery life.

 

You can adjust the angle and distance of XCAN to place your phone on it.

Also, the package includes two types of holders which you can use according to your situation. There is a dashboard mount that can be attached to a glass surface or

a blower clip that can be clipped on to the air conditioning blower.  

 

NFC and wireless chargers use the same induced current. As a result, interference happens between them. While wireless charging, ​your smartphone works as a receiver. Also, the smartphone performs as a transmitter when you use the NFC function.

When using the NFC function and wireless charging together, the wireless charging has a stronger frequency band than NFC. As a result, NFC could not send the stored information to your phone due to not getting electric power. 

If the phone has NFC, the electricity flows from phone to NFC. In other words, this boosts to run the phone battery out. XCAN is designed to block the wireless charging function first and use NFC. After NFC recognition, the power used for NFC is transferred to wireless charging.

XCAN seems to operate NFC and wireless charging at the same time. Actually, NFC activates first, and later the charging function is working. When removing the phone, XCAN resets itself so that it recognizes NFC again. CNA has certifications and patents for this technology.

 

 

How to install XCAN inside the car

1. Dashboard mount

Snap the ball onto the body of XCAN's and then fix the nut by turning it. Attach the suction cup to the window or dashboard and then fix it with the suction clip. You must check to see if the suction clip is open before you attach the suction cup.

Use XCAN after fixing it at the desired angle by using the adjusting screws 1 and 2.

When the adhesive strength weakens, simply wash it with water to allow the adhesive strength to return.

2. Blower clip

Snap the ball onto the body of XCAN and then fix the nut by turning it.

After clipping on the clips to the blower, fix them by using the fixing stand.

Please use XCAN after fixing it at the desired angle.

 

How to set the automatic navigation

XCAN is compatible with both Android and iPhone.  

<Android>

When you search ‘XCAN’ in the Play Store, ‘XCANVehicle’ will appear. You can also use ‘XCAN Tools’, which is an exclusive app for using it on a desks.

After selecting the OS of the phone you will be using, please choose the application you would like to run automatically when you place your phone on XCAN.

To complete the setting, press on the “Write" button on the bottom of the screen and then place your phone on the XCAN device. 

 

 

 

Moreover, with just one XCAN, you can set different settings respectively for an Android smartphone and an iPhone by using a Android Phone.

* VIDEO

 
 
<iPhone>
 
For backers who using only iPhone, we recommend using "Shortcut "app:
 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

CNA is a company located in New York that started the XCAN project in April 2019. For over a year, CNA worked hard to improve XCAN as much as possible. We did several tests taking the completeness and safety of XCAN, production periods, and the campaign schedule into consideration during development.

At the same time, CNA made sure to secure a fast and accurate delivery process for its backers.

Our team is happy with the results that we have received from the XCAN project.

 

 

CNA is a start-up company based in New York. The team consists of a group of experts who have a minimum of 20 years of experience in wireless products and the field of NFC antenna management.

We have always been very interested in malfunctions between NFC and wireless chargers. By utilizing our experiences and know-how, we decided to carry out the XCAN project.

We have focused our attention on creating a device that allows for wireless charging and NFC to run simultaneously without interference problems, allowing users to charge their device while using apps.

We put in our best effort to develop the XCAN project, so we would appreciate you giving both your interest and support to XCAN.

 


This campaign is powered by FUNDINGINSIDER. Prepare your campaign's consulting, video production, and general marketing with us.
 

CNA has completed functional and most other necessary tests using the final prototype and proved XCAN’s product safety.

XCAN is now ready for mass production.

We will complete manufacturing and start shipping less than one month after the successful completion of the Indiegogo campaign.

 

If the product gets damaged during the shipping process, we will exchange the product for new one.

If the product stops working due to malfunctioning, there is a 1 year warranty.
