The team consists of a group of experts who have a minimum of 20 years of experience in wireless products and the field of NFC antenna management.We have always been very interested in malfunctions between NFC and wireless chargers. By utilizing our experiences and know-how, we decided to carry out the XCAN project.We have focused our attention on creating a device that allows for wireless charging and NFC to run simultaneously without interference problems, allowing users to charge their device while using apps.We put in our best effort to develop the XCAN project, so we would appreciate you giving both your interest and support to XCAN. This campaign is powered by FUNDINGINSIDER. Prepare your campaign's consulting, video production, and general marketing with us. CNA has completed functional and most other necessary tests using the final prototype and proved XCAN’s product safety.XCAN is now ready for mass production.We will complete manufacturing and start shipping less than one month after the successful completion of the Indiegogo campaign. If the product gets damaged during the shipping process, we will exchange the product for new one.If the product stops working due to malfunctioning, there is a 1 year warranty.

story:
In Brief

We are going to create a smartphone app that uses biometrics, instead of national identity systems, to generate reliable credit information. We think that if microfinance lenders used our app it would help microfinance live up to its potential as a vehicle for global change and economic progress, with real benefits for both borrowers and lenders. Please read on for more information and don't forget to share our campaign when you're done!

A Little Background and Explanation

In the last few decades, microfinance has revolutionized commercial lending by making funds available to demographic segments that were previously shut out of conventional banking markets. Microfinance lenders (we also call them MFIs, for Micro Finance Institutions) make small, unsecured loans to borrowers who then use the money to start their own business. Under the original model of microfinance lending created by Muhammad Yunus in 1976, the borrower gains access to funding by joining a small lending circle whose members support and monitor them to make sure they are behaving responsibly. Repayment is guaranteed only by the borrower’s reputation in the community. Thus, by taking out the loan, the borrower essentially collateralizes the loan with their social standing.

Nothing prevents the borrower from joining multiple lending circles and taking out multiple loans. Furthermore, not every microfinance lender utilizes the lending circle model. In South Africa, microfinance lenders resemble traditional banks in that they have brick and mortar branches with loan agents inside; there is no need to join a lending circle. Blue Financial even used to advertise that their customers would be able to secure a loan from them in under an hour.

In 2010, India’s microfinance market was rocked by a crisis.  Borrowers in the state of Andhra Pradesh were becoming over-indebted and the lenders were not practicing ethical collection behavior. One particularly horrific example of unethical lending behavior is of lenders who encouraged borrowers to commit suicide so that the proceeds of their life insurance policy could be used to pay off the loan. Growing numbers of borrower suicides embroiled the microfinance industry in a public scandal, with populist politicians denouncing lenders for loan sharking behavior and urging borrowers to intentionally default on outstanding loans. Microfinance's reputation for being a social impact vehicle took a huge hit as a result of the Indian crisis and other similar crises in other countries.

The Indian crisis generated a global campaign against over-indebtedness, as well as the idea for Luminos. Despite the backlash against microfinance, a number of researchers have concluded that the inaccessibility of credit is one of the primary challenges restraining developing economies, and so microfinance will continue to be a growing market in developing economies. But traditional credit bureaus are ill-equipped to address the needs of the growing microfinance market. Often times there isn't a strong national system of identification akin to the Social Security Number we use in the United states. In general, the typical microfinance borrower is characterized by the absence of any recorded interaction with national institutions like the courts or banking system. But even in the absence of such information, there is a reliable way to keep track of borrowers: with biometrics. Biometrics provides a reliable way of verifying a person's identity in countries with weak national institutions, and so biometrics will be a key piece of our solution. 

What We Want to Do

Our solution is LumiKnow. LumiKnow is a mobile app specifically tailored for microfinance institutions using biometrics. It will have the capability to interact with our database in order to deliver meaningful information about borrowers to the lending agent. The app will utilize a borrower's biometric as the “primary key” of our database, meaning the borrower’s biometrics will drive the database search to call up the borrower’s information for the lending agent. The app will also come in a free version (with a limited number of searches) so that anybody with a smartphone (not many now but growing!) can see the information being provided about them, and thereby make it easy for a borrower to see if the information is correct. After utilizing our product, the lender will know for certain whether the borrower has any other outstanding loans; whether the borrower has or has not already been judged bankable by a reputable agent; and if the borrower has already received a microloan. In short, the goal is to make it easy and cost effective for microfinance lenders to find out whether a potential borrower is "bankable."

How LumiKnow Will Help People

1. Prevention of over-indebtedness.

LumiKnow will make the information lenders need to prevent over-indebtedness readily accessible and cost effective. Over-indebtedness is the primary challenge that has yet to be overcome in microfinance markets. The material consequences of over-indebtedness consist of a wide range of additional costs to those who are already struggling financially. In the worst case scenario, over-indebtedness actually leads to further impoverishment. The microfinance industry recognizes that overindebtedness among microfinance borrowers is the most pressing risk facing the industry because it has the potential to cause both financial and reputational damage to the entire industry. Damage to the entire industry harms MFIs even in countries where the problem does not exist. 

Over-indebtedness is avoidable. A good start for lenders is implementing conscientious lending standards, such as those promulgated by the SMART Campaign. Most importantly, however, lenders must find bankable clients. The process of identifying such individuals, called character risk due diligence, is time consuming and costly. Loan agents must query the borrower at length, and then make home visits to further verify the information. If there is no system for sharing borrower information between MFIs, this process must be completed for every new borrower. In some microfinance markets, lenders resorted to sharing an excel spreadsheet back and forth. Allowing a third party like Luminos to assemble and synthesize this information is much more efficient for an MFI. Once the character risk due diligence is performed by one MFI, it does not need to be performed again if every MFI has a way to access that information. Access to that crucial information is the service we aim to provide with the LumiKnow Mobile App, and it will go a long way towards preventing over-indebtedness.

2. Increase repayment tendency.

LumiKnow revolutionizes the notion that a poor person's reputation is adequate collateral to secure repayment of a loan, and will have dramatic effects on borrower repayment tendencies. A study of better borrower identification in Malawi found that total loan repayment was 92.2% among fingerprinted borrowers, compared to only 66.7% in the control group. Similar results were seen in a Guatemalan study showing the amount of a lender’s portfolio in arrears (unpaid/overdue) decreased from 67.2% to 52.8% after the implementation of credit bureaus. The following graphic sums up this market effect:


3. Cheaper loans for worthy individuals. 

With more information, lenders are better able to assess risk, and offer loans at lower rates to less risky individuals. LumiKnow will provide information that will make it less risky for lenders to make loans. Risk and interest rates are directly proportional, that is, the higher the risk, the higher the interest rate. 

4. Help MFIs lend to poorer clients.

Because poorer borrowers tend to repay less often, microfinance institutions are forced to distribute larger loans to relatively well off borrowers to cover the loss of unpaid loans. Private credit bureaus help alleviate this problem, by creating borrower profiles that MFIs use to accurately assess an individuals’ risk and craft appropriate lending terms, based on more than just personal wealth. A study of the Guatemalan microfinance system found that the establishment of credit bureaus allowed lenders to reach borrowers with an average total asset value of 3,000 quetzales (USD 382.53) down from 11,000 quetzales (USD 1,402.61), representing a 73% decrease in wealth requirements.

5. Faster recognition of troubled borrowers, allowing MFIs to address these borrowers sooner.

In most credit systems, there is a considerable delay between the point where borrowers are getting into trouble and the point where the problem becomes apparent in the collection statistics of lenders. LumiKnow would diminish the time it takes to recognize a troubled borrower, especially when providing real-time reporting. 

6. Help keep the MFIs’ books in better health, thereby preventing downsizing or closure, and providing continued opportunities for borrowers.

LumiKnow will allow MFIs to more accurate select borrowers according to their risk profile and balance the risk weightings of their portfolios. In microfinance, what's good for the goose is good for the gander (i.e., lenders and borrowers, respectively). If MFIs are able to do their business better, borrowers will reap the benefit of an efficient, strong market that affords opportunity to meritorious individuals. Everyone wins. 

How We Plan to Use the IndieGoGo Funds

Expense Breakdown


Programming the Lumiknow app will account for 49% of our expenses if we complete our campaign successfully. Legal expenses are our next biggest expense, at 15%. Rewards fulfillment follows closely on the heals of Legal, coming in at a projected 13% of expenses. IndieGoGo will take 12% of our proceeds if we don't make our funding goal, or 8% if we do make it. Hardware is projected to account for 12% of our expenses. A successful campaign will fund our project for 6 months. 

Why Us?

My friend Isaac and I are passionate about economic development. We were co-interns at the Overseas Private Investment Corporation during the summer of 2012.  In developing the idea for Luminos, Isaac and I have repeatedly promised ourselves that we will do everything possible to help microfinance live up to its potential as a vehicle for global change and economic progress. 

To further this goal, we are launching a non-profit in conjunction with Luminos LLC whose purpose will be to educate microfinance borrowers about their rights and responsibilities, and to advocate for legal reforms that will strengthen the infrastructure of developing economies. Isaac has generously agreed to chair the non-profit, which we are calling Luminos Borrower Outreach.

Please Share!

Talk about us! Spread the campaign via your own Facebook pages and Twitter feeds! Email your friends who you think would like some of our perks! Comment on our posts on Indiegogo. Our exposure on Indiegogo is based on traffic. The more sharing and comments, the better the exposure! 

Rewards Preview

In addition to the descriptions on the right, you can also consult the preview images below.

Note Pad (Scribe reward level)


Bottle Opener (Handyman reward level)



Koozie (Thermal Ninja reward level)


Thank you for reading, please pledge your support today!

story:
Meet Tiny Lens:

Microscopes are not items that people typically have in their home due to size and cost, but they are an incredible amount of fun and highly educational.

It is the mission of Tiny Lens to provide Tiny Lenses to children in underfunded school systems who do not have the budget to purchase microscopes for their classroom. 

We are providing one FREE Tiny Lens to a child in an underfunded school for every Tiny Lens that we ship to our backers, so please help us achieve our goal of allowing every child despite their socioeconomic status, to be able to explore their world.

Note: The lens sticks on via suction and can be removed and reapplied as many times a you like, the material lasts for years and years without leaving any residue!


coffee bean

leaf

blue jeans


pepper

my friend's eye

bath towel

The team has completed the design for the lens, the design for the mold, and the plan for the manufacturing process. All that is left is the production of the mold, molding the lenses, and shipping to backers!

The mold represents the most expensive part of the process and is the real secret sauce behind being able to produce enough Tiny Lenses to get them into the hands of all of our eager supporters.

We have invented a method for producing these lenses that will allow us to produce them faster and for less money than any of our competitors, this will enable our team to make Tiny Lens accessible to people of all socioeconomic backgrounds and will allow our team to supply them at a reduced cost to children and schools without the means to afford lab grade microscope equipment.

Mold production will begin as soon as we meet our goal, and is estimated to take approximately 2 weeks. With one week of shipping and two weeks of molding the lenses, we should be shipping product to backers within 5 weeks of meeting our goal!

Our team is committed to the educational community, both here in the United States and abroad. We hope to put Tiny Lenses in the hands of every child in classrooms everywhere.

Risks & Challenges

The primary risk involved with our project is getting the mold made, it is an expensive process, costing thousands of dollars and can take up to two weeks. If all goes well with mold making, then the product production and the shipping date should go exactly as planned.

We have enlisted the help of a well known and well trusted optical manufacturer to make the molds for us, ensuring that the product is the highest quality possible and can produce stellar results..

Other Ways You Can Help

Please post on social media about our campaign and send us nice comments :)

story:
About The Moto Dawg

In this brave new world, keeping accurate records and receipts for everything you do, buy... or whatever...  is a must. Because if you don’t you will end up on the short end of the stick.

Just like you have tax records and medical records for yourself along with bank records and financial records for your home and business, keeping "tight" records for maintenance and repairs... along with any upgrades or modifications... for your motorcycle is just as important.

But digging through a box of oil stained, wadded up old paperwork trying to find work orders and receipts for a repair... maintenance... modifications... warranty work... or that special component that has been installed on your motorcycle sucks and can be like looking for a needle in a haystack.

And if and when you do find it... chances are it’s almost impossible to read because the ink that's used in the receipt printers ends up disappearing like a David Copperfield magic trick!

This is where the Moto Dawg mobile app steps up and crushes the problem. With this... simple to use and ultra-dependable... mobile app, any motorcycle owner can securely store, and update all of their service, repairs, upgrades and modification/customization records along with other important documents at lightning speed and easily retrieve them with the tap and swipe of a finger whenever they need them!

The best part of the Moto Dawg app is that because all the stored and secured information is local to the users’ phone, it can be accessed with ...or without... coverage allowing riders to have all their data with them wherever they are.

It doesn’t matter if it’s 2 wheels, 3 wheels, On-road, Off-road, Sport bike, Cruiser, Touring, Custom... or whatever. Motorcycle owners can now enjoy the peace of mind of having a secured, easy to access and FREE "tool" for keeping track of ALL their motorcycle information sitting right in the palm of their hand.

Get additional details at:  http://www.motodawg.com

The Impact Of The Moto Dawg White Label Project

The Moto Dawg App has been a project that consumed the best part of 2012 with development. After completion of the beta testing phase, the app was auditioned to various insurance and extended warranty companies in the motorcycle industry for their approval as proof of valid record keeping from motorcycle owners when dealing with claims.

Recognizing the huge benefits of having repair and maintenance records digital stored and easily accessible... along with the tamperproof feature so they couldn’t be altered... our new technology was welcomed with open arms to the market place.

But within a short time of being available to the motorcycle public, we started to get requests from the big franchise motorcycle dealers... as well as smaller repair shop operators... wanting to know if it was possible to get their own version of the Moto Dawg app so they could brand it with their own graphics and business information and provide to their own customer base.

After taking a look at what was going on in the industry, it was very apparent that the mobile marketing options available for motorcycle businesses were either very limited, and in most cases, did not exist at all.

So we dug in even deeper and ran some test marketing campaigns to make sure that if we went ahead and put the effort into creating a private label opportunity, the demand was going to be there. To put it mildly, the demand was overwhelming and they all wanted it yesterday.

The big problem we encountered was that the initial setup fee to rebuild our app and include all of the killer features it has built into it just wasn’t cost effective.

After looking at several options that would be more cost friendly, our tech guys came up with the brilliant concept of developing our own custom software platform that will clone our Android and iOS Moto Dawg app as a white label product. That way we can avoid all of enormous costs associated with app development.

With this platform in place, each motorcycle business has the ability to customize the appearance of the app and create a dealer-to-customer line of communications through the app without having to spend a fortune on development.

One more thing... this platform integrates with all of the social media the business may be using along with including a mobile website function to tie into their existing html website.

This really is an ideal situation for the typically non-technical small motorcycle dealer or repair shop because it requires no software expenditure or technical skills along with giving the businesses a distinct competitive advantage against their competitors.

Simply put... this software platform gives any motorcycle business the opportunity to supply their customers... free of charge... with a very valuable piece of mobile technology that not only offers a huge benefit to the motorcycle owner, ...but also provides a huge financial... and customer retention benefit... to the business owners without the huge upfront costs associated with mobile app development.

Why we need you and what your help will do...

As one would expect, there’s been many challenges in creating this white label software program. For one, there is no other in existence, and because there are no models to go off of, we had to do a lot of research and brainstorming to bring the concept together that would actually perform as we envisioned it. So needless to say, we’ve come up a little short of what we need to complete it. If you should decide to contribute, here’s what your contribution will help us do:

• Finalize the software platform development.
• Setup the membership website and video tutorials for the businesses            
   participating in our white label program.
• Put our marketing campaign on steroids.

The Whole Enchilada!

As you can see, we've put together some very cool "perk-packages" in exchange for your help.

The most exciting of them is a rare chance for you to score a super fine 2009 vintage wine from the Dry Creek Valley in California which is home to some of the best wines in the world.

The wine master of this vineyard... who is a personal friend... has agreed to help us out by generously reserving the last few cases of this very cool themed vintage so that we are able to offer them to you.  

This Indiegogo campaign is for US consumers only and shipping for all our perks is free. Be sure to check out the bundles we want to send you! 

                                  

Other Ways You Can Help

I get it that some people just CAN'T afford to contribute and that’s cool. Obviously I KNOW how tight things can get when it comes to money. If you're unable to donate anything to the cause, I'd really appreciate it if you could at least give this page a 'share' around your social networking sites!

Indiegogo is hooked up with all the necessary 'sharing' links so it's quick and easy for you to just help me spread the word about this project! Man... It would mean a lot to us!

 

Who Are We?

AMI Services was founded by Mike Matthews who has been involved in all aspects of the motorcycle industry for over 20 years. 

This experience includes part owner of a small OEM motorcycle manufacturing company, creating various training tutorials for custom motorcycle builders, organizing and producing live training motorcycle repair as well as builder training seminars and numerous other Motorcycle Business related products and services.

With the major impact mobile technology is now having on the day to day operations of all the motorcycle dealers and repair shops, AMI services is now focusing on the development of mobile marketing solutions for the industry.

                                             

                                              

Thanks again for your help!
story_txt:
About The Moto DawgIn this brave new world, keeping accurate records and receipts for everything you do, buy... or whatever...  is a must. Because if you don’t you will end up on the short end of the stick.
Just like you have tax records and medical records for yourself along with bank records and financial records for your home and business, keeping "tight" records for maintenance and repairs... along with any upgrades or modifications... for your motorcycle is just as important.
But digging through a box of oil stained, wadded up old paperwork trying to find work orders and receipts for a repair... maintenance... modifications... warranty work... or that special component that has been installed on your motorcycle sucks and can be like looking for a needle in a haystack.
And if and when you do find it... chances are it’s almost impossible to read because the ink that's used in the receipt printers ends up disappearing like a David Copperfield magic trick!
This is where the Moto Dawg mobile app steps up and crushes the problem. With this... simple to use and ultra-dependable... mobile app, any motorcycle owner can securely store, and update all of their service, repairs, upgrades and modification/customization records along with other important documents at lightning speed and easily retrieve them with the tap and swipe of a finger whenever they need them!
The best part of the Moto Dawg app is that because all the stored and secured information is local to the users’ phone, it can be accessed with ...or without... coverage allowing riders to have all their data with them wherever they are.
It doesn’t matter if it’s 2 wheels, 3 wheels, On-road, Off-road, Sport bike, Cruiser, Touring, Custom... or whatever. Motorcycle owners can now enjoy the peace of mind of having a secured, easy to access and FREE "tool" for keeping track of ALL their motorcycle information sitting right in the palm of their hand.
Get additional details at:  http://www.motodawg.com


The Impact Of The Moto Dawg White Label Project
The Moto Dawg App has been a project that consumed the best part of 2012 with development. After completion of the beta testing phase, the app was auditioned to various insurance and extended warranty companies in the motorcycle industry for their approval as proof of valid record keeping from motorcycle owners when dealing with claims.
Recognizing the huge benefits of having repair and maintenance records digital stored and easily accessible... along with the tamperproof feature so they couldn’t be altered... our new technology was welcomed with open arms to the market place.
But within a short time of being available to the motorcycle public, we started to get requests from the big franchise motorcycle dealers... as well as smaller repair shop operators... wanting to know if it was possible to get their own version of the Moto Dawg app so they could brand it with their own graphics and business information and provide to their own customer base.
After taking a look at what was going on in the industry, it was very apparent that the mobile marketing options available for motorcycle businesses were either very limited, and in most cases, did not exist at all.
So we dug in even deeper and ran some test marketing campaigns to make sure that if we went ahead and put the effort into creating a private label opportunity, the demand was going to be there. To put it mildly, the demand was overwhelming and they all wanted it yesterday.
The big problem we encountered was that the initial setup fee to rebuild our app and include all of the killer features it has built into it just wasn’t cost effective.
After looking at several options that would be more cost friendly, our tech guys came up with the brilliant concept of developing our own custom software platform that will clone our Android and iOS Moto Dawg app as a white label product. That way we can avoid all of enormous costs associated with app development.
With this platform in place, each motorcycle business has the ability to customize the appearance of the app and create a dealer-to-customer line of communications through the app without having to spend a fortune on development.
One more thing... this platform integrates with all of the social media the business may be using along with including a mobile website function to tie into their existing html website.
This really is an ideal situation for the typically non-technical small motorcycle dealer or repair shop because it requires no software expenditure or technical skills along with giving the businesses a distinct competitive advantage against their competitors.
Simply put... this software platform gives any motorcycle business the opportunity to supply their customers... free of charge... with a very valuable piece of mobile technology that not only offers a huge benefit to the motorcycle owner, ...but also provides a huge financial... and customer retention benefit... to the business owners without the huge upfront costs associated with mobile app development.
Why we need you and what your help will do...
As one would expect, there’s been many challenges in creating this white label software program. For one, there is no other in existence, and because there are no models to go off of, we had to do a lot of research and brainstorming to bring the concept together that would actually perform as we envisioned it. So needless to say, we’ve come up a little short of what we need to complete it. If you should decide to contribute, here’s what your contribution will help us do:
• Finalize the software platform development.• Setup the membership website and video tutorials for the businesses               participating in our white label program.• Put our marketing campaign on steroids.
The Whole Enchilada!
As you can see, we've put together some very cool "perk-packages" in exchange for your help.
The most exciting of them is a rare chance for you to score a super fine 2009 vintage wine from the Dry Creek Valley in California which is home to some of the best wines in the world.
The wine master of this vineyard... who is a personal friend... has agreed to help us out by generously reserving the last few cases of this very cool themed vintage so that we are able to offer them to you.  
This Indiegogo campaign is for US consumers only and shipping for all our perks is free. Be sure to check out the bundles we want to send you! 


                                  


Other Ways You Can Help
I get it that some people just CAN'T afford to contribute and that’s cool. Obviously I KNOW how tight things can get when it comes to money. If you're unable to donate anything to the cause, I'd really appreciate it if you could at least give this page a 'share' around your social networking sites!
Indiegogo is hooked up with all the necessary 'sharing' links so it's quick and easy for you to just help me spread the word about this project! Man... It would mean a lot to us!
 
Who Are We?
AMI Services was founded by Mike Matthews who has been involved in all aspects of the motorcycle industry for over 20 years. 
This experience includes part owner of a small OEM motorcycle manufacturing company, creating various training tutorials for custom motorcycle builders, organizing and producing live training motorcycle repair as well as builder training seminars and numerous other Motorcycle Business related products and services.
With the major impact mobile technology is now having on the day to day operations of all the motorcycle dealers and repair shops, AMI services is now focusing on the development of mobile marketing solutions for the industry.
                                             

                                              
Thanks again for your help!

story:
Are you always looking for that missing wire that it makes you frustrated? 

 

 

 

The multipurpose device charger that not only allows you to charge your phone, but also other devices only on one single charger.

 

 

We Solve Problems

How many times you see someone asking if you have an android charger that he could borrow for awhile but you don't have one because you're an iphone user. And what if everyone he asked are iphone users, don't you feel bad for him? What if you can help him for having a charger that fits both Apple and Android users?

 

We Make Things Simple

If you look at leading technology companies like Apple, their way of innovation has always been emphasizing on simplicity. Thus, this has inspired many creators including us to create a solution that is simple, user-friendly and beneficial to all.

 

We Save Time and Save Space

If you have spend time looking for that missing wire you probably how annoying it can be. Too much cables and wires can really waste your time figuring which wire is for which. And if you own multiple devices, packing the chargers is going to take up a lot of space is your bag when you travel. Why don't just bring one charger that fits all?

 

Three Charging Ports is Better Than Two

Most wireless chargers in the market either supports  1 or 2 devices to charge simultaneously . But we utilize every space we have on the charging board to allow more device to charge. Using La Orey, you are able to charge 3 devices at the same time. 

Stand and Charge

Are you in a middle of video call and your battery runs out? Just plug in to La-Orey and continue your video call.

 

 

 

Multipurpose Charger For All Phones

Worry about your phone doesn't support wireless charging? Or you left your special casing? Worry no more! La Orey supports all kinds of phones that uses USB charging and wireless charging. 

 

Slim and Sophisticated Design 

La Orey is designed to be slimmer than iPhone X and the size is smaller than other most chargers in the market by 35% 

 

Penetrable Charging
The penetrable charging allows your phone to charge without removing the phone case. This is applicable to all phones that allows wireless charging.
 

Whether you’re team IOS or team Android, La Orey Wireless Charger is able to fit your needs. We also added a simple touch of usb port with strong magnet that fits all kinds of device.

story:
My name is Eduardo Ramirez, and the reason I’m starting this campaign is to upgrade my home computer space into a small computer lab. The lab will be use to develop new mobile application programs that can help introduce a new era in mobile development. Furthermore, I am an online student at the University of Phoenix and my major I’m pursuing for my Bachelor’s in Mobile Development. This campaign is so important to me and for the environment of future technology. With the help of contributions, it will guarantee to get better equipment and top notch software to establish my propositions.

The total of funding I’m looking for to start up process is the mark of $25,000. I know other computer labs cost much more in the world, but with this type of proceeds will touch based with what I need in order to accomplish the first steps. If I do not reach my entire goal, the funds will deposit into my savings and keep them there until the limit is reached and start the campaign once again.

I believe that my project is valuable for the world because society depends on new technology for the better, especially for the young children. With a new Mobile Development project, we can point a new beginning in mobile technology. In addition-Imagine an app that can show your Facebook page in a form of a projector or an app that can turn your home lights on and off or a video call that can be seen like a hologram.  Ideas will always light up the future...

story:
Hello!

We are YALOS - a team of young and ambitious app developers and we want to invite you to participate in our new project – an unique Android app 'ADVISOR' that is predestinated to become an indispensable assistant and trustful friend for all smartphone users. But let's start from the very beginning!

HOW IT STARTED OR: “BINGO, WE HAVE AN IDEA!”

Like most modern people, we became totally addicted to our smartphones and can't imagine our lifes without endless text chats and calls with our friends, relatives, clients and bosses. The smartphone became to usnot only a means of communication but also an alarm clock, planner, calendar, map... to put it simply a live-saving and essential device! And as being a programmer is not a job but a lifestyle it means that we need to be available 24 hours a day and 7 days a week. And we noted one thing: you can spend the whole day sitting next to your phone and it keeps absolute silence. But you need only to leave for two minutes to get you a coffee or something else and within this short period of time you'll receive at least five very important calls, ten extraordinary important SMS-messages and two or three reminders about calendar events of exceptional importance! Of course you can grab your smartphone every time when you got distracted for a few minutes to check whether you missed something but sometimes you simply don't think about it – especially if your head is full with a millions of other tasks. Of course the information about the missed call or unread message stays on your device and sooner or later you'll see it. But in some cases even one hour delay can have not very pleasant consequences. For example you can miss an attractive job offer or forget about a school performance of your beloved child simply because you didn't hear the reminder... Besides that, all these standard notification icons and info panels are boring as hell!

Anyway, on a nice day somewhere back in the middle of 2015 our idea machine Nick got a cool idea that was caught up by our whole team: why shouldn't we create our own mobile helper – a useful and functional app that reminds the smartphone user about important events in an unusual and funny way? That was the day when our project ADVISOR was born.

STAGE 1. WHAT HAS ALREADY BEEN DONE

We started our project from the development of the general concept. We've decided that our 'advisor' should be performed as a funny animated character that moves into the smartphone and starts to inform its owner about different important events. We decided to replace the boring standard phone notifications with funny scenes performed by this character. We also decided to add some purely entertaining scenes where the character makes some funny actions. Our app should operate above all other apps to ensure that the user for sure notices the important information. We also decided to add voice to the character's image so that it can use its voice to notify the user about the important events.

After some thoughts we decided to chose the image of a funny dog. Together with our designer we've created a charismatic character: the Dog, and created animated scenes with him. After the app is installed, the Dog settles right in your smartphone. Most of the time you don't see him but if something important happens and Dog needs to remind you about it he appears on the screen on the top of all other running apps. You get the impression that the funny character interacts with you like a real living creature and you'll for sure love his great personality!

In the first version of our app that was released in December 2015 we offer only four main notification types:

  • about missed phone calls
  • about unread SMS-messages
  • about calendar events
  • built-in alarm clock

We also made the interesting feature that if the smartphone is in the silent mode the Dog still reminds about the missed events but his mouth will be closed and he will hold a sign with the actual information.

Besides that the user can activate the entertaining feature when the Dog appears on the screen at certain time intervals and displays the funny entertaining scenes. Currently we have four entertaining scenes: reading a newspaper, having dinner, doing some sports exercises and sleeping.

All functions of the app can be adjusted according to your personal needs (you can turn on only the necessary types of notification, change the number and frequency of the notification, change the volume level, turn the entertaining scenes on or off etc.)

You can take a look at our website http://adviserdog.com/en and get a better impression of our current app or watch the video above.

STAGE 2. WHAT ARE WE DOING RIGHT NOW

The first version of our app was quite successful and received good user feedback. Now we have more than 21 thousand downloads in Google Play with an average ranking of 4.4 stars. That's a pretty good result for a startup project. But we don't want to stop at this point. We want to move this project forward so that it doesn't stay a simple reminder app for missed calls and messages. It should become a big and useful assistant app with a funny animated character that provides help for the smartphone users and becomes a real friend. This is the main new feature of our app that distinguishes it from any competitors. We want to add a whole bunch of new features to make a really useful helping tool. We also want to create a big collection of different characters with their own personalities (ninja, cat, girl, military man, cave man etc.) to chose from. To sum up, we want to transform the standard smartphone operation procedures into interesting animated scenarios that provide the users with happiness and positive emotions.

Now we work on the second version of our app. It will get as many es 13 new notification types covering the most popular messengers, email services and social networks: WhatsApp, Skype, Telegram, Facebook-Messenger, Wechat, Snapchat, Gmail, Mail.ru, Yandex.Mail, vk, google hangouts, instagram, twitter.

Our Dog will inform the smartphone users about missed emails and messages. We plan to finish the new version by September. The new set of notifications will drastically increase the app's functionality.

STAGE 3. WHAT DO WE WANT IN THE FUTURE?

But our plans don't stop here! We already have a whole bunch of ideas for the next versions. One of our next main tasks is the development of new funny and charming characters with unique animations so that every user can find the best helper based on his/her own preferences. 

It would be cool if you can help us to decide what characters we should do next and what individual features should they have!

One more important task is the integration of new notifications. We distinguish two main types: internal smartphone functions (such as battery level, low memory resources etc.) and integration of external services (weather forecast, news and many others).

Here are some of the new functions that we want to dedicate to our 'Advisor' in future versions of our app:

  • Notification about low smartphone memory
  • Notification about necessary clean-up
  • Notifications about low battery and charging
  • Notifications about the presence or absence of mobile networks
  • Notifications about available free wi-fi networks
  • Weather forecasts

We also want to add new entertainment scenes, for example:

  • In the morning: waking up, having a shower
  • Breakfast and dinner
  • Storylines during the day: peeking out from different screen edges, walking and laying on the screen, playing ball, singing songs, reactions when touched with the finger: grumbling, making angry noises, laughing...
  • In the evening: yawning and going to bed
  • In the night: snoring and sniffing (and being angry when woken up)

We also want to make our ADVISOR international and add all most popular European and Asian languages, it means that the app needs to be translated at least in 20 main languages of the world.

The development of a really good and useful app is a long, complicated and expensive process and if we want to achieve a high-quality result it requires really big investments. Dear friends, and that's the point where we want to address you! We don't simply beg you for money, we offer you the participation in the development of a future high-quality product! And we also want to grant you with some nice presents and a huuuuuge plus-point to your karma ;))

We'll also be very thankful for your advices, tips or interesting ideas about the features or characters that you'd like to see in our app.

WHAT DO YOU GET IN RETURN FOR YOUR DONATION

To thank you we've prepared different types of rewards. Depending on the donated amount you can receive a nice souvenir or even leave your name in the history of our project! Besides that all contributors receive the current version of our app directly after the donation (please note that it's designed only for Android version 4.0.3 or higher). And most rewards include the future second version with unlimited access that will be provided after its release.

You can see the list of our great rewards on the right in the reward section (please note that the app is Android only)

Please note that the phisical goods (printed certificates, souvenir magnets, t-shirts) will be shipped out in two batches (after 30 days + allow us several days for the manufacturing and shipment procedures; and after 60 days + allow us several extra days for the manufacturing and shipment procedures)
 

WHAT PURPOSES YOUR DONATIONS WILL BE USED FOR

The current goal of our campaign is 40.750 US-Dollar. For sure you want to know what we plan to do with this money and how much it costs to develop a high-quality mobile app. We try to answer this question briefly.

1) Development of new characters. This is the most cost-intensive part of our project. It's necessary to understand that it's not enough simply to invent a new character's image and to draw it once. Each character not only needs an individual appearance, it also requires unique features and animations for all notification and entertainment scenes. Basically it means that we need to create, build up, draw and voice-over a lot of short cartoons. It's a very complicated work that requires not only the participation of our designers, but also the skills of experts in the sphere of digital animation because we want to provide the users with really unique characters having their own features, habits and personalities.

On the current stage we want to make at least one new character. The artwork and its adjustments for the creation of one character image require approximately 1.000 USD.

The development of the character features and action scenarios for one image costs about 500 USD.

Each new character requires 10 notification animations: four already available actions from the first app version:

  • missed calls
  • unread SMS-messages
  • calendar events
  • signals of the built-in alarm clock

and 6 new actions:

  • Notification about low smartphone memory
  • Notification about necessary clean-up
  • Notifications about low battery and charging
  • Notifications about the presence or absence of mobile networks
  • Notifications about available free wi-fi networks
  • Weather forecasts

Each action lasts at least 7 seconds. There will be a total of 10 x 7 = 70 seconds of animation. One second of high-quality digital animation costs about 100 USD. It makes 7.000 USD for one character.

But we also want to entertain our users and grant them positive emotions by showing funny entertainment scenes that are performed by the characters in their free time. Our project of entertaining animations includes the following actions:

  • In the morning: waking up, having a shower: 20 seconds
  • Breakfast and dinner: 20 seconds
  • Storylines during the day: peeking out from different screen edges, walking and laying on the screen, playing ball, singing songs, reactions when touched with the finger: grumbling, making angry noises, laughing...: 50 seconds
  • In the evening: yawning and going to bed: 15 seconds
  • In the night: snoring and sniffing (and being angry when woken up): 20 seconds

It makes about 125 seconds of animation for one character. The approximate animation consts for two characters are: 125 x 100 = 12.500 USD

But that's not all. All animations need to get a voice-over with cool voices that can be performed only by professional voice-over artists. The cost of their work can vary from 500 to 1000 USD. The duration of our animations is about 150 seconds or 2,5 minutes. If we use the minimum cost, it's 2,5 x 500 USD = 1.250 USD.

2) Technical development. Android is a very popular system that has spread all over the world. On the one hand it's really great because it means that our app has millions of potential users. But on the other hand it means that each manufacturing company adjusts the Android OS according its requirements. It can add, change or remove any functions and features. As a result it becomes really complicated to develop an app that would operate perfectly on all possible Android devices. Sometimes our developers spend many weeks on a task that appeared to be easy as pie.

For the estimation of the coding work you can use the average market values for app development (for example on this website: http://www.formotus.com/14018/blog-mobility/fig...). The estimated programming works for the new version are about 15.000 USD.

3) Testing. As we've already mentioned above, the popularity and huge variety of the available Android devices is a big advantage and disadvantage at the same time. We want to ensure that our app works properly on the most popular smartphones and it means that we need to do a lot of testing work on different devices. We also try to react on all user complains who faced any troubles with our app and therefore we need to recreate the operating conditions as exact as possible. Therefore we cooperate with testing laboratories, hire experienced testers and rent different smartphone devices.

The approximate testing costs for the app (including the work of professional testers and at least 100 test users) are 3.000 USD.

4) And last but not least the most important thing which is obligatory for each app development process: COFFEE! Being proper app developers, we work a lot in the night because it's the best time to get genius thoughts and bright ideas! And it means that we need coffee. A lot of coffee. Liters of coffee every day!

We estimate our coffee resources for the whole time of app development at 500 USD.

If we calculate all the things mentioned above we get the necessary amount of 40.750 USD.

We hope that our little project was able to attract your attention and we will be glad to cooperate with you! Maybe some of you even become the creators of new cool characters for our app! Also we'll be very happy if you share the information about this campaign with your friends in social networks.

With warmest greetings,

your YALOS development team

We also want to create a big collection of different characters with their own personalities (ninja, cat, girl, military man, cave man etc.) to chose from. To sum up, we want to transform the standard smartphone operation procedures into interesting animated scenarios that provide the users with happiness and positive emotions.Now we work on the second version of our app. It will get as many es 13 new notification types covering the most popular messengers, email services and social networks: WhatsApp, Skype, Telegram, Facebook-Messenger, Wechat, Snapchat, Gmail, Mail.ru, Yandex.Mail, vk, google hangouts, instagram, twitter.Our Dog will inform the smartphone users about missed emails and messages. We plan to finish the new version by September. The new set of notifications will drastically increase the app's functionality.STAGE 3. WHAT DO WE WANT IN THE FUTURE?But our plans don't stop here! We already have a whole bunch of ideas for the next versions. One of our next main tasks is the development of new funny and charming characters with unique animations so that every user can find the best helper based on his/her own preferences. It would be cool if you can help us to decide what characters we should do next and what individual features should they have!One more important task is the integration of new notifications. We distinguish two main types: internal smartphone functions (such as battery level, low memory resources etc.) and integration of external services (weather forecast, news and many others).Here are some of the new functions that we want to dedicate to our 'Advisor' in future versions of our app:
Notification about low smartphone memory
Notification about necessary clean-up
Notifications about low battery and charging
Notifications about the presence or absence of mobile networks
Notifications about available free wi-fi networks
Weather forecasts
We also want to add new entertainment scenes, for example:
In the morning: waking up, having a shower
Breakfast and dinner
Storylines during the day: peeking out from different screen edges, walking and laying on the screen, playing ball, singing songs, reactions when touched with the finger: grumbling, making angry noises, laughing...
In the evening: yawning and going to bed
In the night: snoring and sniffing (and being angry when woken up)
We also want to make our ADVISOR international and add all most popular European and Asian languages, it means that the app needs to be translated at least in 20 main languages of the world.The development of a really good and useful app is a long, complicated and expensive process and if we want to achieve a high-quality result it requires really big investments. Dear friends, and that's the point where we want to address you! We don't simply beg you for money, we offer you the participation in the development of a future high-quality product! And we also want to grant you with some nice presents and a huuuuuge plus-point to your karma ;))We'll also be very thankful for your advices, tips or interesting ideas about the features or characters that you'd like to see in our app.WHAT DO YOU GET IN RETURN FOR YOUR DONATIONTo thank you we've prepared different types of rewards. Depending on the donated amount you can receive a nice souvenir or even leave your name in the history of our project! Besides that all contributors receive the current version of our app directly after the donation (please note that it's designed only for Android version 4.0.3 or higher). And most rewards include the future second version with unlimited access that will be provided after its release.You can see the list of our great rewards on the right in the reward section (please note that the app is Android only)Please note that the phisical goods (printed certificates, souvenir magnets, t-shirts) will be shipped out in two batches (after 30 days + allow us several days for the manufacturing and shipment procedures; and after 60 days + allow us several extra days for the manufacturing and shipment procedures) WHAT PURPOSES YOUR DONATIONS WILL BE USED FORThe current goal of our campaign is 40.750 US-Dollar. For sure you want to know what we plan to do with this money and how much it costs to develop a high-quality mobile app. We try to answer this question briefly.1) Development of new characters. This is the most cost-intensive part of our project. It's necessary to understand that it's not enough simply to invent a new character's image and to draw it once. Each character not only needs an individual appearance, it also requires unique features and animations for all notification and entertainment scenes. Basically it means that we need to create, build up, draw and voice-over a lot of short cartoons. It's a very complicated work that requires not only the participation of our designers, but also the skills of experts in the sphere of digital animation because we want to provide the users with really unique characters having their own features, habits and personalities.On the current stage we want to make at least one new character. The artwork and its adjustments for the creation of one character image require approximately 1.000 USD.The development of the character features and action scenarios for one image costs about 500 USD.Each new character requires 10 notification animations: four already available actions from the first app version:
missed calls
unread SMS-messages
calendar events
signals of the built-in alarm clock
and 6 new actions:
Notification about low smartphone memory
Notification about necessary clean-up
Notifications about low battery and charging
Notifications about the presence or absence of mobile networks
Notifications about available free wi-fi networks
Weather forecasts
Each action lasts at least 7 seconds. There will be a total of 10 x 7 = 70 seconds of animation. One second of high-quality digital animation costs about 100 USD. It makes 7.000 USD for one character.But we also want to entertain our users and grant them positive emotions by showing funny entertainment scenes that are performed by the characters in their free time. Our project of entertaining animations includes the following actions:
In the morning: waking up, having a shower: 20 seconds
Breakfast and dinner: 20 seconds
Storylines during the day: peeking out from different screen edges, walking and laying on the screen, playing ball, singing songs, reactions when touched with the finger: grumbling, making angry noises, laughing...: 50 seconds
In the evening: yawning and going to bed: 15 seconds
In the night: snoring and sniffing (and being angry when woken up): 20 seconds
It makes about 125 seconds of animation for one character. The approximate animation consts for two characters are: 125 x 100 = 12.500 USDBut that's not all. All animations need to get a voice-over with cool voices that can be performed only by professional voice-over artists. The cost of their work can vary from 500 to 1000 USD. The duration of our animations is about 150 seconds or 2,5 minutes. If we use the minimum cost, it's 2,5 x 500 USD = 1.250 USD.2) Technical development. Android is a very popular system that has spread all over the world. On the one hand it's really great because it means that our app has millions of potential users. But on the other hand it means that each manufacturing company adjusts the Android OS according its requirements. It can add, change or remove any functions and features. As a result it becomes really complicated to develop an app that would operate perfectly on all possible Android devices. Sometimes our developers spend many weeks on a task that appeared to be easy as pie.For the estimation of the coding work you can use the average market values for app development (for example on this website: http://www.formotus.com/14018/blog-mobility/fig...). The estimated programming works for the new version are about 15.000 USD.3) Testing. As we've already mentioned above, the popularity and huge variety of the available Android devices is a big advantage and disadvantage at the same time. We want to ensure that our app works properly on the most popular smartphones and it means that we need to do a lot of testing work on different devices. We also try to react on all user complains who faced any troubles with our app and therefore we need to recreate the operating conditions as exact as possible. Therefore we cooperate with testing laboratories, hire experienced testers and rent different smartphone devices.The approximate testing costs for the app (including the work of professional testers and at least 100 test users) are 3.000 USD.4) And last but not least the most important thing which is obligatory for each app development process: COFFEE! Being proper app developers, we work a lot in the night because it's the best time to get genius thoughts and bright ideas! And it means that we need coffee. A lot of coffee. Liters of coffee every day!We estimate our coffee resources for the whole time of app development at 500 USD.If we calculate all the things mentioned above we get the necessary amount of 40.750 USD.We hope that our little project was able to attract your attention and we will be glad to cooperate with you! Maybe some of you even become the creators of new cool characters for our app! Also we'll be very happy if you share the information about this campaign with your friends in social networks.With warmest greetings,your YALOS development team

story:
The Little Big Horn College Rams Booster Club is a 501 (c)3 non-profit organization raising money to purchase a Ram mascot. Our small tribal college located on the Crow Indian Reservation in Montana serves nearly 300 students.

We compete nationally in NJCAA Men's and Women's Basketball, but we do not have a mascot. The Booster Club is devoted to creating a stronger sense of school spirit. The more fans we can get in the seats is better, because when our basketball fans see a successful program and school spirit they just may enroll in classes.

Our small college serves as a bridge between high school and four-year universities. Many of our students do not believe in their ability to succeed in college and the instructors do a lot of coaching in the classroom.

Having a mascot can become a crucial element to recruiting students, recruiting fans, energizing fans and building a greater sense of community on campus. Consider donating to our cause. We already have $240 raised and only need $500 more.

In addition to crowd-sourcing, the Booster Club is selling $10 membership cards, holding raffles and soliciting donations from local businesses.

The more fans we can get in the seats is better, because when our basketball fans see a successful program and school spirit they just may enroll in classes.
Our small college serves as a bridge between high school and four-year universities. Many of our students do not believe in their ability to succeed in college and the instructors do a lot of coaching in the classroom.

story:
The BBP is a networked 3d printer controller board, features everything you need to upgrade your 3d printer. 
www.fastbot3d.com
https://www.facebook.com/FastbotBBP

It is powered by AM335x, 1GHZ Cortex-A8 processor, and contains 5 or 7 stepper motor drivers, 3 heaters, 6 endstops, 6 fans, 1 microSD Card socket, 1 Ethernet socket, and 1 USB socket so you can connect with USB WiFi or camera.


It is Powerful!

The BBP runs on a powerful 32-bit ARM (1GHZ Cortext-A8), and with the help of Programmable Realtime Units inside this chip, it can generate high frequency step signal.

Firmware

We have developed a 3d printer firmware to fully use the PRU. With the help of this firmware, it is easy to generate high frequency step signal, and that is why BBP can make 3d printer faster.

Apart from the advantage of speed, the BBP also makes 3d printer easier to use. 

Remote controlling & monitoring

It is quite mesmerising to watch a 3D printer create an object in front of you but sometimes you don't have the time to check it in real life.

WiFi enabled 3D printing

Connect an USB WiFi dongle to BBP, and it will enable your 3D printer to connect wirelessly to any web enabled device. There is no need for cables anymore and you can start, stop, and monitor your print from anywhere!

The BBP supports OctoPrint for remote controlling & monitoring.

The First Android 3d printer controller

The BBP is running Android System, we use the OctoPrint APK which integrates the 3D viewer and the slicer. 

More information can be found here:

http://wiki.fastbot3d.com/android-user-guide



Mobile Application

We also created an Android APP to make printing easier, which integrates the 3D viewer and the slicer. You can move, rotate and resize the model on the platform. When you want to print, you just need to press the make button, then it will automatically slice the STL file into gcode command and print it out. The APP still in beta version.

Do you need to know more detailed hardware specification? Here you are!

Technical Specs:

Microcontroller

  • Texas Instrument Sitara AM335x, 1GHZ Cortex-A8 ARM
  • 2 Programmable Realtime Units (PRU) to generate really high frequency step and dir signals
  • 4GB eMMC
  • 512M DDR3 memory
  • 10/100M ethernet
  • microSD card
  • USB Host to connect USB disk, WiFi, Camera .etc
  • USB Device interface, shows to the computer as a mass storage device

Stepper drivers

  • 5 ~ 7 DRV8825 stepper drivers
  • 1/32 microsteps
  • Each capable of driving bipolar steppers up to 45V and 2.5A
  • Digital control of the current setting for each driver

Outputs

  • 3 heaters, 2 for extruder and 1 for HBP
  • 6 connectors for fan or LED light belt, all adjustable

Inputs

  • 3 Thermistor (ADC) inputs
  • 1 Thermalcouple (MAX6675) inputs
  • 6 endstops
  • 1 connector for external power button

Extensibility

  • 50 pins FFC connector for 24 bits TFT LCD and touch screen
  • connector for 2 extended steppers
  • connector for 3 extended heaters
  • Serial connector to print debug log
  • Lots of pins broken out, including step, direction and enable pins for the stepper drivers
Website
http://www.fastbot3d.com/
Documents
http://fastbot-wiki.wikidot.com/
Source
https://github.com/fastbot3d

Risks & Challenges

We have finished most of the electronic modules designing and prototype testing. There is always risk when manufacturing systems as complex as electronics. We will spare no effort to meet deadline for delivery.

story:
Let me start by saying that I have a passion for the game and I've been playing from the age of three and still active at 59. The Transpuckter has 6 sleeves of 5 units for a total of 30 pucks. Made of durable ABS plastic, lightweight at less than 3 lbs with a center handle for easy carrying and was designed to insert two extra pucks without interfering with your grip. With a diameter of 12''x 5''1/8 in height. It doesn't only look good on a table top, it's also meant for sliding on the ice surface making it easier to gather pucks.

The funds will go towards production, e-commerce and marketing. Presently at a crossroads and need to drive it to the next level with a first run of 7K units. Different parties such at Hockey Canada, Sport Chek, Hockey Experts, Sports Experts and Hockey Shot are waiting on the conception of this product for retailing. Budweiser wants to launch this product upon availability. The Transpuckter is a registered trademark and is patent pending. An innovation that is suited for today's game.  This product was approved by more than a hundred players and coaches of all ages through the process of trail and error.                              

Thanking you in advance.

story:
riimo-2 converts iPhone, iPad or iPod touch into IR-beaming universal remote


Lightning, USB-C or Mirco USB  dongle Intelligent Mobile Smart IR Remote Control Supports all the IR remote control enabled devices.

Mini size and easy control

 

Lightning, USB-C or Mirco USB  dongle Intelligent Mobile Smart IR Remote

 

riimo instore Promotion with beauty beauty :)

 

riimo 2 : Mass Production Ready Shipping Now

 

Unbox Therapy riimo unbox review 

 

 
riimo Packaging Design
 

 

Say Goodbye! old remote sets

Remote: No battery, Damage, lose.....

 

 : all in one and signal one for all

CONTROL INFRARED IR DEVICES WITH YOUR IPHONE OR IPAD

Many devices are commonly controlled by infrared remote controls these days – televisions, video recorders, air conditioners, and more. Using your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch as a universal remote control gives you many accessibility advantages. You can make use of whatever accessibility features your iDevice has – VoiceOver, Zoom, Switch Control, etc. – and there’s no need to learn to use a new device.

 

Converts iPhone, iPad or iPod touch into IR-beaming universal remote

The Best universal remotes

If you have lots of AV gear, a universal remote is a must. These are the best.

riimo a Ultra-Small Smart IR remote for ANY devices

 

The riimo in the media

 

 

Today

The riimo is setting a new bar in the world of iPhone / iPad / iPod touch remotes, with a single plug-in Infrared (IR) adapter enabling your Apple device to beam out a near-limitless array of IR commands. All that's needed is the 3.5mm dongle, the latest iPhone OS and the free riimo Apps; once you're setup, you can then control your TV, AV receiver, Blu-ray player and whatever else is lucky enough to be in your home theater rack and support IR dictation. Better still, the app allows users to customize the way they control their gear, with full multitouch and accelerometer support complementing the ability to add (soft) macro buttons. Oh, and did we mention that this wealth of functionality will only set you back $6 dollar Huzzah!

The riimo IR transmitter plugs into the 3.5mm headphone jack of your phone or tablet, and works with the iR Universal Remote Control app. Because the transmitter is attached to your phone, you do need line-of-sight from your phone to the device you want to control.

 

How does it work

riimo: the first product in riimo line of universal remote control products for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad.

 

 

 

Forget your old remote, and enjoy the comfort. riim Take control with all IR devices


riimo is a portable way to turn any iPhone, iPod touch or iPad into a universal remote and free TV guide.

riimo users can easily control TVs, DVRs, stereos, etc., whether they are at home or on the go. riimo offers features and functionality previously available only in remotes costing several times as much.


 

It even works with your Apple iOS!

Destined to put an end to multiple remote misery, the riimo runs off your iGadget’s power so you can take it wherever you may roam. And thanks to its online IR code database, you can control devices even if you don’t have the original remote to hand. Use it in hotels, at work, or even to annoy channel-hogging friends. Blipping genius, eh!

 

Why choose riimo

· It's the most affordable ($6) and robust universal remote accessory for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad.
· Instead of having one remote for every device - or even an oversized universal remote with too many buttons - riimo customers only need to handle an iPhone, iPod touch or iPad (okay, well the iPad's not that small...)
· Unlike other iPhone remote solutions, riimo plugs into the headphone jack, which frees up the 30-pin dock connector for charging while while the remote is in use. riimo users will never be without a remote when device battery is low. Also, iPhone users won't have to flip their phones upside-down to use the remote.
· Robust database of manufacturer-supplied infrared codes for easy Apps set up. 
Additionally, only the buttons appropriate to the activity in use (like watch TV, listen to music, watch DVD) appear on the screen.
· riimo users can customize the way they control their equipment with touchscreen buttons, Apple's Multi-Touch gestures, and accelerometer controls. For example swiping two fingers down the screen can reduce volume and flicking the iPhone forward can change the channel.

As its name suggests, the riimo doesn’t physically consist of very much. Its little box contains just a riimo ‘dongle’, and a reasonably handy little holder for the dongle that’s attached to a key ring.

The riimo dongle is around an inch long and a mm or so wide, with a 360-degree IR transmitter on one end and a plug for pushing into your iDevice’s headphone slot on the other. The necessary free app for driving the dongle has to be downloaded from Apple App store.

 

 

More info

Compatibility
 

iPhone 4, 5/5S, 6/6S

iPod Touch
2-4 gen

iPad

 

Requires iPod Touch (4rd Generation), iPhone 4/5/6S or iPad running iOS 7.0 or later

riimo software app (available as a free download from the Apple App store)

Supports virtually all home entertainment devices with infrared capabilities.

 

The Impact

The idea of having a universal remote like the riimo on your iPad/iPhone/iPod touch seems to make perfect sense. After all, long - and frequently frustrating - experience suggests that the best universal remotes are those that feature some sort of screen display to help you keep track of what you’re trying to achieve on which device. And models with touchscreens take the vital sense of control immediacy to a whole new level.

Add to this the riimo’s support for gesture-based controls on its iPod/iPad/iPhone home, as well as the extra-large screen area available on an iPad, and you really could be talking about the universal remote to end all universal remotes.
