story:
Thank you to the 2,750+ backers who made the Shock Clock a success!

We have a new product launching called Pavlok Rise that will not just wake you up, but also help you form a healthy and productive morning routine. Click the link to check it out...

 

Click here to check out Pavlok Rise

.....

 

From the team that brought you the Pavlok Breaks Bad Habits wearable device on Indiegogo in 2014...

 

 

 

   

 

 

....we bring you a new product that helps you do one thing better than any other:

 we make you wake up. 

 

The Problem

You know the feeling – you set an alarm the night before, sure you're going to wake up. But when you hear the alarm....and well – you just can't help hitting the snooze button.
 
You lay in bed too long and end up feeling rushed, frustrated, and tired your whole day.
 
But what if you didn't have to feel that way? What if you could get up, effortlessly and naturally, at the time you desired?
 
What would you do with that extra hour? Would you eat breakfast? Would you meditate? Would you exercise?
 

 

 

 

Shock Clock Wake Up Trainer Will Make You A Morning Person

The Pavlok Shock Clock isn't like other alarm clocks you've tried. Other alarms rely on annoying you until you give up and get out of bed – awake but now in a terrible mood because of your annoying alarm. that is NOT how you want to start your day.
 
Often, a simple touch can work much better than the sound of an alarm.
 
The Pavlok Shock Clock is the first device that uses effective, tested sensory inputs to wake you up and keep you alert.
 

As Seen In

 

How does it wake me up?

The Shock Clock uses three sensory stimuli to ensure you wake up.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Shock Clock Wake Up Trainer is the Next Evolution of the Pavlok Alarm Clock App

In 2014, we launched an IGG for the Pavlok Device. The Device was designed to help break bad habits, using a mild electric zap.

 

The campaign was a huge success, and we successfully fulfilled all of the units to our IndieGogo backers in 2015 (how many times has that NOT happened!!).

 

Shortly after we started shipping we launched a very simple app – the Pavlok Alarm Clock app. It was (and still is) very basic: one alarm, choose your stimulus, and press save. It's not fancy, but holy @#$% is it effective!

This isn't just some crazy idea – we've had hundreds of Pavlok users testing a simple version of the Alarm Clock software to wake up quickly and feel alert every morning, and their stories are inspirational to hear. Here is what just a few Pavlok users had to say about the basic alarm feature:

 

 

 

 

 

If the Alarm App Works, Then Why An Indiegogo Campaign?

We started with the Pavlok Alarm, but users wanted much more.

The Alarm is SIMPLE. It only lets you set a single alarm. You snooze it by pressing on the button --- something several users would do subconsciously.

So we're back on IndieGogo, developing the features to make this the world's BEST alarm clock.

 

 

With your help and support we can add three new features:

  • Snooze Lock: Pavlok Shock Clock will use motion tracking to know when you’re out of bed and won’t let you cheat.

  • Accountability: Pavlok Shock Clock will let your friends know if you don't wake up----and if you don't get out of bed, optionally give them the ability to zap you awake. 

  • Sleep Cycle Analysis: Pavlok Shock Clock will use motion tracking to know when you’re out of bed and won’t let you cheat.

What's the Difference Between The Pavlok and the Shock Clock Wake Up Trainer?

The original Pavlok is $199, includes the alarm clock app, self zap, habit training, and more.
The Shock Clock is $99, and is focused as an Alarm. (No self zap, better sleep tracking, better motion tracking, etc.)
IF WE HIT OUR STRETCH GOAL OF $50,000, WE'LL ENGINEER THE SHOCK CLOCK WAKEUP TRAINER TO BE UPGRADEABLE (as a paid add-on) TO THE FULL PAVLOK (for IndieGogo Supporters). 
This means, you'll be able to upgrade the device to get all of the features of the Pavlok, should you decide to, any time in the future (as a paid upgrade).
 

Here's the Plan For Stretch Goals:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What Do I Get With The Shock Clock Wake Up Trainer?

 

The Shock Clock comes boxed with the Shock Clock module, a wristband, and a charging cable. Wristbands are available in 5 different colors: pink, black, blue, grey, and red.

 

 

 

     

    How Do I Use The Shock Clock Wake Up Trainer?

     

    The wristband and module of the Shock Clock are meant to be work to bed at night. You set the alarm from the app (available in Android and iOS) and choose how you want to be woken up.

     

    There are three types of wake up options:

    1. Beep

    2. Vibrate

    3. Zap (mild electric stimulus)

           

     


    When the alarm goes off, the Shock Clock will alert you to wake up using the stimulus you selected. We recommend starting with a beep or vibration to wake up, with a Zap if you don't get up with the beep or vibrate.

     

    How Do I Turn Off The Alarm?


    With Snooze Lock off, You can snooze/turn off the alarm from within the app, or you can short press (snooze) or long press (disable alarm) on the lighting bolt of the Shock Clock module.

     

     

     

     

     

    With Snooze Lock on, the device will require that you stand up and walk around. If you try to go back to sleep? Well...ZAP.
     

     

    Campaign Timeline

     

     

     

     

    Will the Shock Clock Wake Up Trainer Help Me Get To Sleep Earlier?

    Dozens of our users tell the same story --- the act of using the ShockClock makes them become morning people. They naturally begin to fall asleep earlier in the evening, converting them from night owls to morning people.
     

     

    Why We Aren't Like Other IndieGogo Campaigns (hint: you'll actually receive your product on time)

    Unlike other projects we have a proven product and we have a proven team. We have built devices before, and we have already engineered this tech. With IndieGogo's support, we'll build the SOFTWARE to make this device the best alarm clock ever.
     

    The Team Behind Pavlok Shock Clock Wake Up Trainer

     

    The Pavlok Team


    Founder Maneesh Sethi has a solid track record as an entrepreneur: he ran the website Hack the System and invented the "big brother" of Shock Clock, the Pavlok which successfully raised over $280,000 in 2014 on Indiegogo, and now has been shipped to over 10,000 people globally.


    He has also written four programming books (including an international bestseller), and helped launch numerous New York Times Bestsellers (such as The 4- Hour Chef by Tim Ferriss). 
    Behavioral Technology Group (parent company to Pavlok and now Shock Clock) has grown to include 10 all-star team members specializing in software design, engineering, marketing and customer service.
     

    Frequently Asked Questions

    How do I set the Alarm?

    Via Bluetooth and the included iOS/Android App.

     

    Will the alarm still go off if Shock Clock disconnects from my phone in the middle of the night?

    Yes the alarm will still work because when you press "save alarm" in the app it actually saves the information to the Real Time Clock memory in the ShockClock, meaning you don't have to keep your phone connected for the alarm to work. Likewise you'll be able to shut off the alarm without connecting to your phone in the morning – only connect when you need to change one of your alarms.
     

    What is the difference between the $129 Shock Clock that ships at the end of the campaign and the $99 Shock Clock that ships in September?

    There is no hardware/software difference between the two. We only have a limited number available from our initial production run, so we're offering anyone who is willing to wait for us to replenish stock a lower price. Both will receive the software features at the same time – all features by September.

    For those that get the $129 shipping at the end of the campaign they will get the basic alarm app that we have working right now, and they will automatically be enrolled in our "beta tester" group and they'll get the most cutting edge versions of the software features as we develop them.

    The feature that I want the most is a stretch goal. If you don't reach the goal, does that mean it will never get developed?

    Not necessarily, but it will definitely take us longer. We're hoping that this campaign will be super successful so that we can afford to hire the software engineering talent to develop all of these features quickly & have them work great. The more money we raise, the more features we can commit to by the delivery date in September.

    How Can I Choose to Be Woken up?

    The Shock Clock will wake you up with haptic feedback:  beep, vibration or zap.

    How uncomfortable is the zap?

    The electrical stimulus is carefully designed so that it is enough to be uncomfortable, but not so strong that it hurts (and nowhere near dangerous – the Shock Clock is CE/FCC certified and 10,000 Pavlok users have proven it is safe and effective). It's a lot like a static shock you get when you touch a doorknob after rubbing your feet on the carpet.

    What is the Battery Life?
    The battery life ranges from 3-5 days and charges through micro USB.

    What Devices are Compatible with the Shock Clock App?
    Apps support Android 4.3+ iOS 6+

     

    General Questions


    Is There a Warranty?
     

    Yes, we offer a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty against defects.

    What is The Prospective Delivery Date for the Shock Clock?

    If you buy the 'Get Shock Clock NOW' perk your Shock Clock will ship once the campaign ends. If you've selected any other package expected delivery is September 2016.



    Do you have a Medical Disclaimer?

    Yes - https://buy.pavlok.com/pages/medical-disclaimer

    How do I upgrade my perk?

    https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

    I would like a refund. How do I do this?

    https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

     

    Have any other questions? Feel free to reach out by posting a question in the public comments section, or by sending us an email at support@pavlok.com.

story:
Ourspop PocketHuB is the lightest and smallest USB Type C dock for the New Macbook and others Ultrabook.

 

Why you need Ourspop PocketHuB for your New Macbook?

The new 12’’Macbook is the coolest notebook in the world, but it only comes with 1*USB Type C port, you can’t plug in anything to it. Then you need Ouspop PocketHuB to extend USB 3.0, HDMI, SD card reader, micro SD reader. 

Ourspop PocketHuB comes with nice design in aluminum body. 

Small size, only 38g, easy to carry. 

What you can get from Ourspop PocketHuB:

  1*USB Type-C (charging, data transfer, video output)

  1*Standard HDMI port up to 4K output

  1*USB 3.0 A

  1*SD card reader

  1*Micro SD card reader

  1*Charging indicate LED

 Technical Spec:

Available in 4 colors: Pink, Grey, Gold, Silver. 

Choose your favorite color now!

Dimensions of Ourspop PocketHuB:

Key features about Ouspop:

1, Charge your Macbook while the Ouspop PocketHuB is plug-in.

2, Support dual display with external monitor via HDMI cable.

3, Connect with projector to do presentation in a meeting via HDMI cable.

Benchmark with competitors:

Connectors of Ourspop C4:

  1*USB Type-C (charging, data transfer, video output)

  2*USB 3.0 A

  1*SD card reader

  1*Micro SD card reader

  1*Charging indicate LED

About Ourspop team:

Ourspop is reliable company from China to offer high-quality technology and electronics products at affordable price.

All of Ourspop products will comes with

--1st class electronics components produce under the solid manufacture system;

--2-years warranty of repair or replacement service;

--3 times 100% quality checking during the full production process.

Please check the details of  Ourspop warranty terms here: http://ourspop.tech/warranty

 

 “Anyone who submits a video about Ourspop products with more than 5000 views on YouTube gets free Ourspop products.” 

1, The video should talk about Ourspop products, reviews, demonstration or any content about Ourspop products.

2, The plan will work for worldwide, every people from every country who buy Ourspop products.

Please check the details here: http://ourspop.tech/promote

Or you can contact ourspop here: promote@ouspop.tech.

 

FAQ:

1,Why flexible target?

Ourspop is a professional manufacturer for PC and Smart phone accessories. We already start the mold of Ourspop PocketHuB in August 2016, It is under firmware debug and trial production now, No matter the fund raising amount, we will complete Ourspop PocketHuB and ship to all of our backers!

 

2, When will Ourspop PocketHuB start shipping?

The mass production of Ourspop PocketHuB will start on end of October 2016, 

so we will start shipping from beginning of December 2016.

 

3, Is it free shipping worldwide?

Yes, all of indiegogo backers worldwide free shipping at the early bird price.

 

4, What express service we will use?

All perks are shipped using DHL ecommerce with  7-15days to arrive from Shenzhen China to any country in the world. Notice that your country may charge you an import duty fee, this should be taken care of automatically by DHL ecommerce when they deliver you the package. 

Some European backers told us DHL will charge import tax at their country, if you prefer slow shipping but tax-free like Singapore Post or EMS please leave msg or email to support@ourspop.tech. we will double confirm with you before we ship out the parcels. 

 

Ourspop's offical site:

http://ourspop.tech/

 

Welcome to visit Ourspop at China Sourcing Fair Mobile Edition, 18-21th Oct. 2016,

Asia World Expo, near HK Airport. 

Booth No: 8E11

 

More video about production of PocketHub:

Testing process of PocketHub:

Here is the the testing process of PocketHub we filmed at our SMT factory. We have 3 times full function testing for every pieces Type C hub after SMT and DIP. The 1st testing is 100% current testing to check out if there is any shortcut on the PCBA, we set 5V on the current equipment and connect the PCBA by Type C port, if the current is above 0.02A, that means the PCBA have circurt problem, have go back to production.The 2nd time testing is 100% full function testing for each port, including the HDMI, SD card, micro-SD card, 2*USB 3.0A, specially for the USB C fast charging function! We test every pieces by Macbook! The 3nd times is after assembly with case, we will do the same testing with PCBA again(100% for every pieces, full function), to confirm every pieces work perfectly before ex-factory.

Tooling of PocketHub

Here is the tooling of PocketHub. The tooling normally takes 40-50 days production since mechanical design is ready. T1 takes arround 25days, While T1 is ready, we always takes the T1 case to fit with PCBA board, to find if there is any mistake to fix while T2. T2 takes arround 10 days, after T2 the tooling is nearly 90% finish. Sometimes T3 is the final one, sometimes it takes more time to fix the small problem, like connector positions,surface and others.

story:
We’ve found that the charging efficiency of wireless charging products in the market is generally low. Heat caused by inefficient charging leads to even worse efficiency, which can cause terrible damage to phones. Because of this, we decided to direct our own research, in a joint effort with others, into developing new technologies and using different materials that enable greater charging efficiency and protection for your phone.

Mongda Wireless Charger Features

Intelligent active cooling system to ensure more efficient charging

By adopting an automatic cooling system, Mongda can keep the phone’s temperature below 29˚C. This ensures the battery will be kept at low temperatures while charging, protecting the battery and extending the lifespan of your phone.


Heat conducting CNC aluminum alloy material absorbs heat fastHigh performance
cooling fan blows heat away quickly, ensuring low heat through out High speed
cools fast once powered on to absorb heat material,Military grade eat insolating semi conductor remains cooler to the phone’s surface, lowering its surface 
temperature.

Fast Charging

Advanced technology detects your wireless charge compatible devices, delivering up to 7.5W for Apple devices, and 10W for Samsung. iPhones are charged to 50% in 38 minutes and fully charged in 2.5 hours.

Optical Environment Sensor

Intelligently identifies natural and artificial light sources to adjust the rotation speed of the cooling fan when the brightness changes. This automatically reduces the noise caused by the fan while charging at night.

Mongda Jion The Global Sources Consumer Electronics Show

Our Mongda have been well appreciated by friends, experts and exhibitors from all over the world at Global Sources Consumer Electronics Show, Hong Kong. in 13th April.Everyone wanted take a group photo with Mongda.

 

What Do the Professionals Think about Mongda?

Read more details here.

Read more details here.

Read more details here.

Read more details here.

Read more details here.

Unboxing review from MeAppleCat:The Mongda Wireless Charger has not only the shape of Batman，but also the same powerful ability as Batman. It helps and protects your mobile phone just like Batman protects his Gotham City. Meanwhile, the Mongda Wireless Charge perfectly inherited the feature of Batman, efficiency, security and tranquility. 
Unboxing review from Smart Tech in Youtube: Compared with other wireless chargers, Mongda makes your mobile phone battery safer and more durable. You deserve to have one.
Unboxing review from Nicolò Cumerlato(Italiano)Because of the design of the alien spacecraft, I was attracted by its mystery at first glance.Yes, this wireless charger has such magic powers. The unique cooling system makes charging faster and safer. The excellent noise reduction makes you sleep more comfortable.

Comparison

We chose Indiegogo instead of Kickstarter because Indiegogo allows us to ship our product sooner – We don't want our fans to wait for several more months!order now to receive sooner!!

            

Multiple Protections

With the built-in over-voltage, over-current, over temperature and short-circuit protection features, Mongda Wireless Charger effectively protects your device and the charger itself. It is convenient & easy to operate, while at the same time, providing all these safety protections. If the charger does experience overheating, it will automatically power off to avoid safety hazards and ensure the dual charging safety of the wireless charger and the mobile phone.

Foreign Object Detection(FOD)

Mongda Wireless Charger’s optimized Foreign Object Detection (FOD) system cuts power to prevent overheating if objects containing metals are placed on it.

Case Friendly

MongDa intelligent wireless charger can charge up to 8mm away, supporting the thickest 4mm mobile phone cases. To ensure the best charging performance, keep the case thickness to 2mm or less.

Design

The design concept adopts scifi elements of UFOs and spaceships. The detailed aerodynamic design highlights the unique fast charging technology it possesses.

Referral Program

Why do we have a referral program? To encourage you to share! Earn great rewards easily by sharing with people who were not able to get their pre-orders before the campaign officially ended.Join us to win the FREE prize!

Our Indiegogo referral program runs from April 9th to May 9th, 2019. If you refer five backers to our campaign, and they pledge at least one charger each, you will win FREE rewards!Click these quick share buttons to start!

 

How to Buy

Why Choose Us? We have proven experience!

MongDa’s team members average over ten years of experience in electronics R&D and oversaw development for the standard iPhone wireless charging brand Belkin. After doing market research, we’ve found that the charging efficiency of wireless charging products in the market is generally low. Heat caused by inefficient charging leads to even worse efficiency, which can cause terrible damage to phones. Because of this, we decided to direct our own research, in a joint effort with others, into developing new technologies and using different materials that enable greater charging efficiency and protection for your phone.

 

Why do We Make Indiegogo Crowdfunding?

We want to do the most, to show the best. Indiegogo allows us to pay more attention to the needs of backers, improve the quality and customer service of our product, thereby achieving our goal: become the best explorer and forerunner in the high-tech field.

FAQ


1.)Does normal wall adapter work with mongda?

 
QC2.0 or above adapter is needed.


2.）Can I charge with phonecase on ?


It can be charged with mobile phonecase, cases up to 4mm thickness.


3.）Can I use wireless charger to charge two phones at the same time?


Only support charge one phone at a time.


4.）What is the LED indicator status？


LED on when charging, LED off when fully charged.


5.）What phones are compatible with this device?


All wireless charging phones that support the QI protocol.such as iphone X.


6.）Shipping schedule 

In May


7.）How many specifications does the charging plug have?


We have 3 different plugs that are used by different countries. Please pay attention to selecting the specific one you need.


8.）What is the length of the included usb cable?


Standard micro usb cable with 1 meter.


9.）Does it automatically TURN OFF when the phone is fully charged?


Yes , mongda will automatically turn off when fully charged.


10.）Does this charges AirPods or Apple Watch?


No.

story:
Getting the cinema experience has never been easier

  

 

See the MovieMask Premium here!

 

 

 

NOT another VR device (!)

Why? What's your secret?

 

So your lenses are special? show me!

 

So what does that have to say for me?

It means you get 4 times the resolution as on a standard mobile VR, and can enjoy any content from any app!

The short explanation for why we deliver 4X the resolution is all because of the optics. On conventional VR, the content is splitted in two,  one picture for each eye. So, even a smartphone with a resolution of 1920x 1080, will only provide 960x 1080. But then the aspect ratio is completely off. In order to keep the aspect ratio (usually 16:9 for most 2D-content), the image has to be shrunk (as shown below to the left) to ~960x540, which turns into 1/4 of the smartphones original resolution. With MovieMask however, we're able to give you the full resolution (picture to the right). 

 

The MovieMask Premium rocks (!)

For the Movie lovers out there, you're going to be best pals with the design winning and super comfortable MovieMask Premium.

 

 

​

 

Choose from three different colors:

Did we mention you can also use it to steer your drone(s)?

 

And we have delivered over 10.000 MovieMasks to date!

Since we started our journey, we have delivered over 10.000 MovieMasks to all the movie-lovers out there, and we now have goods in our warehouse ready to be shipped to you!


Here's our CTO Harald, with a lot of MovieMask cartons ready for shipping

You have my interest, what's your story?

We got the idea for the MovieMask in January 2016, and founded the company in May. In September 2016, we launched a crowdfunding campaign for our first product, "MovieMask 1.0", which got funded by nearly 300% and shipped to over 30 countries across all continents. We delivered the products two months later.

Shortly after, we got into the premium reseller of Apple products in Norway, Eplehuset, as well as the biggest telecom provider, Telenor. The last year we've been featured in over 100 Norwegian stores, and we have captured 2,7 % of the Norwegian VR market.

MovieMask 1.0 (old) in the stores of Eplehuset, Apples premium reseller in Norway

Ok, sounds promising. So what's new?

We believe MovieMask delivers an immersive cinema experience, but we knew that we would have several areas of improvement after our first try (even with 30+ prototypes made pre-launch). The first versions sold over 3000 units, which gave us some fantastic feedback on improvement suggestions! It would have been impossible to make the new MovieMask without them, and their key suggestions were:

  • Improved the optics
  • Made it adjustable
  • Made it compatible with glasses

 

 

(Very) low-budget, one-take video explaining our two new versions of MovieMask

 

 

Who are we?

Founders of MovieMask with the new products, Eirik and Harald 

Our team consists of entertainment engineers from Trondheim, Norway - and we are all determined to make fun and engaging products that are easy to use. After watching Quentin Tarantino's Hateful Eight in the cinema in San Fransisco a bit over a year ago, we were just so amazed by the cinema feeling. We then started thinking about how todays media consumption is more and more mobile driven. However, what we have gained in mobility, we have lost in experience.

Håvard  (our CFO), illustrating the feeling we're pursuing with MovieMask

Over the course of the next 6 months, we made around 30 prototypes that we tested on over 1000 users, before heading over to China to find production partners for our first product. The crowdfunding campaign combined with the domestic focus, enabled us to get tonnes of positive feedback before we've got deep down into production development to improve our product.

We have made quite a few prototypes (nearly hundred now), and testet a lot of other solutions

Now, we're feeling confident that we'll deliver a good cinema experience to you! The molds are all done, and we have allready produced 10.000+ units of the MovieMask :) 


Our CTO Harald expecting one of the moulds used to make the MovieMask

This campaign has been our door-opener to the world, and our goal is that one day we can grow into a Norwegian brand focusing on entertainment technology that is fun and easy to use.

Ada and Harald from Times Square, ready to take MovieMask global (!)

Seems like you've come a long way. Why should I throw my money at you?

If you're interested in supporting a small startup that believe it has created a great product for all the movie-lovers out there, we hope you will consider getting your own portable cinema :)

story:
What is uFusion?

uFusion is an easy configurable 9DoF AHRS system that mix data coming from 3 axes accelerometer, 3 axes gyroscope, 3 axes magnetometer to extract Attitude and Heading References. It’s studied to simplify the integration in your project.  In fact, uFusion can be soldered on your own PCB or can be used through its motherboard.

uFusion data output can be read with 2 type of standard communication: UART or SPI. Additionally, the motherboard allow to read data using the USB 2.0 standard.

Here you can download the uFusion User Manual.

Here you can see a video that explain the possibility of calibrate the magnetometer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3XVmdCtJO10

 

 

 

How to use uFusion?

uFusion can be used in a really easy way.

uFusion can be soldered on your PCB or used alone with its motherboard. It can be interfaced through UART, SPI or USB and can be communicate through many I/O register that allow you to set it and get the output values.

As soon as possible, we’ll publicate the driver for Linux/Android and Arduino and they will be downloadable for free. These will help to communicate with uFusion so that you can focus on other part of your project without stressing trying to make uFusion working.

 

 

 

What can be done with uFusion?

uFusion can be used in many different applications. Wherever you need to know how an object is tilted or oriented in the space, uFusion can solve your issue. Just think and make.

Here is a list of some possible applications, but your creativity can invent many others.

· Helicopters, quadrotors and fling UAV

· Underwater vehicles

· Camera stabilization

· Balancing robots

· Gaming and virtual reality

· Compensated compass

· Position detection

· Motion capture

· Robot navigation / SLAM

· Antenna control

 

Status of the project

Research: done! We have already spent a lot of time (day and night) doing research about the state of the art, designing solutions and experimenting.

Prototyping: done! As you can see in the videos and in the pictures, we produced many prototypes before we have found the one with the best performance.

Testing: done and doing. We have performed many test on the system. We have stressed it a lot in different conditions. We can not permit that it stops working in the real system.

Pre-production: completed. We have chosen the best component on the market, designed the PCB and arrange with a factory for the production.

Production: just waiting for you!

 

How can you help us?

Prototypes of uFusion have been tested for more than 6 months and have demonstrated good performances and good reliability. We are very proud of our product and we think that it is ready to be produced and commercialized. We have some quote from several electronic board manufacturers and we’re ready for the first big order. Unfortunately, electronics board are expensive to manufacture, so we need your help to order the first big quantity.

story:
MOTORIZE YOUR KAYAK

Convert a kayak into an easy to use hands free motorized version.  The "kit" would be low cost, estimated under $200.00 retail, and easy to install.  As the video shows one can go at a nice speed operating the motor with one foot while steering along with the paddle.

The "kit" adds little weight, as the picture shows me holding up the kayak.  Shallow water operation is still easy as the video shows.  Conversion back to a regular kayak is easy and only takes seconds.  Installation is relatively easy as i was successful in my first attempt at my office without any assistance.

There seems to be nothing available that is this easy and at this price.  Monies would be used to produce kits, distribute to stores, advertising, and insurance to make this invention available to the public.

story:
Finally, it's time to charge battery now!

For Lightors battery, you don't need a separate charger. It is rechargeable with micro USB cable. Three hours later, you will have brand new batteries in you hands! Lightors battery is environmentally-friendly and can be used up to 1,000times. This smart battery has stronger power and lasts longer. Charging and data transfer are two times faster than general cables as well. Also there is braille for the visually-challenged to distinguish each end of USB cables. Save earth by using Lightors battery!


Step futher for your convience and clean environment.

We've created an innovative product, regarding social issue that AA or AAA battery based products come out to the market consequently. 
Convience of USB chargeable technology finally settled down to tiny battery by our innovative product 'LIGHTORS'. 
LIGHTORS battery is used for up to 500times with micro 5-pin cable port which is nomarlly used for charging smart phone(android).


The size of LIGHTORS battery is exactly same with AA and AAA battery so that you can use them any of products that are AA or AAA battery based.

Once the batteries run out of charge, you can simply plug them into any existing micro 5-pin USB cable and recharge them.

Unlike other rechargeable batteries out there, you don’t need a separate charger to house the batteries while charging. 
All you need to do is plug a micro-USB cable into the internal port in the batteries and it will begin recharging instantly. 
Not only can you recharge the batteries more than 500 times, it’ll reduce the cost you spend on batteries by that much as well as reduce the amount of waste that’s created from throwing out traditional batteries as well.



Batteries are something that’s needed for use in small devices whether it be in the home or office. Disposing of standard batteries is an increasing problem because although their uses are various and many, disposing of them is not healthy to the environment. Lightors resolves these issues from a different perspective in providing an easy-to-use alternative. Now, not all batteries are created equal.

Lightors are extremely convenient batteries for use whenever and wherever.

Unlike other rechargeable batteries, you don’t need an additional charger to house the batteries while charging. Micro-USB cables are the standard when it comes to charging most smart devices today, which makes it much more convenient than having to keep track of an external charging cradle.

Lightors could help potentially reduce battery waste from 10 billion to
20 million annually!

Detox the earth, Innovative battery 'LIGHTORS'

The Environmental News Network reports that annual global consumption of batteries is at a staggering 10 billion (the US makes up 3 million alone).
Of the total number of batteries consumed, approximately only 2% (200,000) get properly disposed of for recycling while the remaining 9.8 billion are simply thrown out thus contaminating the environment further.
Lightors is an eco-friendly and innovative product that protects the planet by reducing discarded battery waste by 1/500 (from 10 billion to 20 million). Regularly disposed batteries can bring tremendous harm to the environment. 

One Lightor battery provides the same value as 500 standard single use batteries.

Extremely cost-effective and affordable, Lightors offers users a way to reduce costs in battery spending (+$48 Billion Industry). If purchasing one batter was $1, you would be saving $499 inadditional battery spending. This is not only incredible cheaper, but a substantial reduction in resources used to make, store, dispose of extra batteries.

Throwing away batteries after a single use is probably the most convenient, but isn’t there way to solve major problems in the world that affect people and our earth? Isn’t there a way overcome the disadvantages of using a traditional battery cradle forrecharging? Our product was developed to address this problem. 
However, there were issues with producing AAA batteries due to size and fitting in the PCB and mechanisms in a much smaller form factor. 
Finally, we were able to come up with a working model recently in December 2014 to offer two different sizes of Lightors batteries.

Lightors is a young company that contributes to the development and distribution of advanced eco-friendly products adding innovative new products to your daily life tomake a difference in the world. The origin of our brand name means “people that make light”.

Light makes for a better society, meaning brightening and making positive changes, and it’s important to focus on creating valuable work that brings light to this world.

We want to extend our apologies once again at the mishap we had yesterday revolving our prematurely posted update. Again, the update was posted without receiving proper approval, which has caused some negative feedback and loss of faith from some of our backers.  

Although a lightning port stretch goal is something we would love to include, at this time we cannot verify its feasibility and thus have decided to create new stretch goals in its place.  

Our first stretch goal will be for the same amount of $150,000. This stretch goal is to double the number of uses for Lightors. Currently, we can guarantee that Lightors can be used at least 500 times. This stretch goal will allow the development and guarantee of at least 1,000 uses.  

The second stretch goal is for amp increase. This stretch goal will be for $200,000 and will guarantee a 10% increase in mAH for both types. The AA batteries will increase from 1500mAH to 1650mAH while the AAA batteries will increase from 600mAH to 660mAH.  

Again, we want to extend our apologies for our previous error and hope it will not deter current and future Backers from supporting our campaign.  


Posted above is our current domestic patent and our international patent is currently pending. (PCT/KR2014/011245) Just to clear the air, Lightors is a unique product that does not exist anywhere else in the world and we stand by our product.

As a recognized Hi-Seoul Brand company, Lightors has received recognition for being a promising and representative small-medium enterprise by the city of Seoul. 

Only those companies that offer globally competitive innovative technological products are able  to receive this special recognition in hopes of expanding Korea's domestic export enterprise.

Risks and challenges

Lightors is a relatively young manufacturing and distribution company of eco-friendly innovative products that add high value to our daily lives and make a difference in the world. 
With our flagship product, we’re entering the smart accessory market to match other smartphone peripherals. 

Lightors = “Light”+ “ors” 

The origin of our name means “people that create light”. 
Light provides for a better society and brightening peoples’ lives with positive changes. 
Always focus on creating something positive and bringing light to the rest of the world. 

From a technical point of view, the main challenges we faced when creating Lightors were “how will we offer USB charging while minimizing circuit discharge”, “how can we maximize Ni-MH capacity”, and “how will we minimize power loss in the circuit configuration”. From a mechanical standpoint, we were worried whether we would be able to construct a durable micro-USB port for charging.

However, with our experienced developers having years of experience in battery/electronics, we were able to overcome 90% of the inherent risks and finished pilot testing without any issues. If we’re able to successfully fund our project, we promise that we will deliver all products in less than 5 months.
story_txt:
Finally, it's time to charge battery now!For Lightors battery, you don't need a separate charger. It is rechargeable with micro USB cable. Three hours later, you will have brand new batteries in you hands! Lightors battery is environmentally-friendly and can be used up to 1,000times. This smart battery has stronger power and lasts longer. Charging and data transfer are two times faster than general cables as well. Also there is braille for the visually-challenged to distinguish each end of USB cables. Save earth by using Lightors battery!Step futher for your convience and clean environment.We've created an innovative product, regarding social issue that AA or AAA battery based products come out to the market consequently. Convience of USB chargeable technology finally settled down to tiny battery by our innovative product 'LIGHTORS'. LIGHTORS battery is used for up to 500times with	micro 5-pin cable port which is nomarlly used for charging smart phone(android).The size of LIGHTORS battery is exactly same with AA and AAA battery so that you can use them any of products that are AA or AAA battery based.Once the batteries run out of charge, you can simply plug them into any existing micro 5-pin USB cable and recharge them.Unlike other rechargeable batteries out there, you don’t need a separate charger to house the batteries while charging. All you need to do is plug a micro-USB cable into the internal port in the batteries and it will begin recharging instantly. Not only can you recharge the batteries more than 500 times, it’ll reduce the cost you spend on batteries by that much as well as reduce the amount of waste that’s created from throwing out traditional batteries as well.



Batteries are something that’s needed for use in small devices whether it be in the home or office. Disposing of standard batteries is an increasing problem because although their uses are various and many, disposing of them is not healthy to the environment. Lightors resolves these issues from a different perspective in providing an easy-to-use alternative. Now, not all batteries are created equal.
Lightors are extremely convenient batteries for use whenever and wherever.
Unlike other rechargeable batteries, you don’t need an additional charger to house the batteries while charging. Micro-USB cables are the standard when it comes to charging most smart devices today, which makes it much more convenient than having to keep track of an external charging cradle.
Lightors could help potentially reduce battery waste from 10 billion to20 million annually!
Detox the earth, Innovative battery 'LIGHTORS'
The Environmental News Network reports that annual global consumption of batteries is at a staggering 10 billion (the US makes up 3 million alone).Of the total number of batteries consumed, approximately only 2% (200,000) get properly disposed of for recycling while the remaining 9.8 billion are simply thrown out thus contaminating the environment further.Lightors is an eco-friendly and innovative product that protects the planet by reducing discarded battery waste by 1/500 (from 10 billion to 20 million). Regularly disposed batteries can bring tremendous harm to the environment. 

One Lightor battery provides the same value as 500 standard single use batteries.
Extremely cost-effective and affordable, Lightors offers users a way to reduce costs in battery spending (+$48 Billion Industry). If purchasing one batter was $1, you would be saving $499 inadditional battery spending. This is not only incredible cheaper, but a substantial reduction in resources used to make, store, dispose of extra batteries.


Throwing away batteries after a single use is probably the most convenient, but isn’t there way to solve major problems in the world that affect people and our earth? Isn’t there a way overcome the disadvantages of using a traditional battery cradle forrecharging? Our product was developed to address this problem. However, there were issues with producing AAA batteries due to size and fitting in the PCB and mechanisms in a much smaller form factor. Finally, we were able to come up with a working model recently in December 2014 to offer two different sizes of Lightors batteries.



Lightors is a young company that contributes to the development and distribution of advanced eco-friendly products adding innovative new products to your daily life tomake a difference in the world. The origin of our brand name means “people that make light”.


Light makes for a better society, meaning brightening and making positive changes, and it’s important to focus on creating valuable work that brings light to this world.

We want to extend our apologies once again at the mishap we had yesterday revolving our prematurely posted update. Again, the update was posted without receiving proper approval, which has caused some negative feedback and loss of faith from some of our backers.  
Although a lightning port stretch goal is something we would love to include, at this time we cannot verify its feasibility and thus have decided to create new stretch goals in its place.  
Our first stretch goal will be for the same amount of $150,000. This stretch goal is to double the number of uses for Lightors. Currently, we can guarantee that Lightors can be used at least 500 times. This stretch goal will allow the development and guarantee of at least 1,000 uses.

Again, we want to extend our apologies for our previous error and hope it will not deter current and future Backers from supporting our campaign.

Only those companies that offer globally competitive innovative technological products are able  to receive this special recognition in hopes of expanding Korea's domestic export enterprise.

Lightors is a relatively young manufacturing and distribution company of eco-friendly innovative products that add high value to our daily lives and make a difference in the world. With our flagship product, we’re entering the smart accessory market to match other smartphone peripherals. Lightors = “Light”+ “ors” The origin of our name means “people that create light”. Light provides for a better society and brightening peoples’ lives with positive changes. Always focus on creating something positive and bringing light to the rest of the world. From a technical point of view, the main challenges we faced when creating Lightors were “how will we offer USB charging while minimizing circuit discharge”, “how can we maximize Ni-MH capacity”, and “how will we minimize power loss in the circuit configuration”. From a mechanical standpoint, we were worried whether we would be able to construct a durable micro-USB port for charging.
However, with our experienced developers having years of experience in battery/electronics, we were able to overcome 90% of the inherent risks and finished pilot testing without any issues. story:
What is Quick Reply for Android

Quick Reply for Android is a necessary and useful app which is very easy to use. Taking our own, and needs of other users into consideration, we've realized how necessary it is for Android. 


The very name, Quick reply indicates that it enables us to reply quickly to a text message in a few easy steps, no matter what we are doing on our phone. 


Functionality

As we have already stated, the main characteristic of Quick Reply app is to shorten the time we need to reply to a text message. However, its main function is to ensure smooth operation on the phone after texting. 

Just imagine that you can just swipe down and quick-reply, without ever leaving the app, and then return to whatever you were doing … checking emails, using Twitter, Facebook… 

Additional options also include 


Design

We followed the instructions of the new Google material design and came up with a solution.

We also had in mind those who want to adjust the design to their own preference, which is basically the beauty of Android. Customization.


Quick Reply Store

Selling themes in the Quick Reply Store will enable us to continue developing our app.


Post / upload your theme and earn money.

How?

It is quite simple. Each user who downloads Quick Reply has the possibility to post themes in the Quick Reply Store, and to earn money from sales of that theme. 

How much can one earn? 

80% of the profit would go to the user, whereas Quick Reply would keep 20% as the maintenance cost (software developer, designers, servers..)


Why We Need You
This is where we need your support. We ‘ve chosen this way of financing in order to collect the money for realization as quickly as possible. This way of financing turns the idea of QuickReply into reality and what is most important it stays free in the Google play store. All together, we can make this happen.
_____________________________________________________________________________
Update:

We received a lot of questions about the costs and my explanation wasn't that clear. Sorry for this. 
A part of the money, i.e.one half is going to programmers, designers and servers that would store our themes. The other half would be used for maintenance for the year to come. This all costs quite a bit. If I had all of these skills, I wouldn't need your help to make this app. I just have an idea, like most of you.  



How You Can Help

We appreciate donations of any size but if you are unable to give, please tell your family and friends about QuickReply for Android by directing them to this campaign @ http://igg.me/at/quickreply or just share on Facebook, YouTube, Tweeter or Google+. Thank You.

story:
The Soweto Ultimate Inter-Schools Event

The Gauteng Flying Disc Association (GFDA), passionately inspired by the vision of growing Ultimate and disc sports in South Africa was awarded the opportunity to form part of Move-it, Moving Matters(TM) Get Ahead Sports Program (GASP) to introduce Ultimate to 20 schools in the Soweto region. Over the past few months the GFDA has been teaching intern coaches (The Movers Team) from Move-it, Moving Matters(TM) from their SIT-UP (Sports Internship Training For Unemployed Persons) how to play Ultimate. The SIT-UP coaches has been teaching ultimate to their learners at twenty different schools in Soweto. These learners will go on to compete in a first of it's kind in South Africa Inter-School event that will be held and hosted by the GFDA in Soweto on the 7th of November.
Help Us Sponsor A Child 
Help us sponsor a child for the day for R200
Your contribution will help us bring Ultimate to Soweto. We love Ultimate and we want to continue growing it in Soweto. Ultimate teaches boys and girls that they can play sports together safely and fairly. And it teaches children the value of Spirit Of The Game and to have respect for each other and the rules of the game helping them form necessary life skills. 
By contributing to our project you are also helping us to empower 20 unemployed youths from Soweto to gain experience as sports coaches and use that experience to graduate into the Sports industry at the end of their training.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this with everyone you know
  • We need discs for our intern coaches!!

story:
We want to thank everyone who donated to our previous campaign. Now we start again on the next push to finish the first dome of the New Alexandrian Library.

 

About The New Alexandrian Library Project and The Assembly of the Sacred Wheel

The New Alexandrian Library (NAL) will be a resource for those that believe in true freedom and equality for religious studies - a resource that includes all of the esoteric and non-mainstream (but growing!) religions - not just the the usual 3 or 4.  The NAL will make as much content (literature, periodicals, art...) available via the web the greates extent allowed by copyright law, etc.  - so it can be a true resource for ALL of those that can benefit from such a resource!

We are the Assembly of the Sacred Wheel, a legally recognized Wiccan non-profit religious organization based in the Mid-Atlantic region. The form of Wicca that the Assembly practices is syncretic and draws inspiration from Astrology, Qabala, the Western Magickal Tradition and the folk religions of Europe. Keepers of the Holly Chalice, the founding coven of the Assembly began its life in February of 1984. The Assembly was incorporated in the state of Delaware in 1993 and was granted 501(c)(3) status by the IRS in 1995.

We are a responsible and respected esoteric religion with a history of taking on and succedding with large projects.  Check us out at www.sacredwheel.org

Donations Are Tax Deductible!

What We Need & How We Would Like To Thank You For Your Support

The total project construction cost is around $175,000 for the first phase.  To date, the Assembly of the Sacred Wheel (ASW) has raised $46,687 in direct donations (80% of that from ASW members.  We put our own money where our mouth is!) and $96,000 from fundraisers over the last 10 years. The land was donated by ASW members and is not counted in these figures.

Urgent Help Needed Now

We need a total of an additional $50,000 in the next 5 months, BUT RIGHT NOW, we are asking for immediate funds to cover the next construction payment of $10,000 by January 1st, 2013. That means a deadline for this campaign of December 8, 2012 to let the funds clear.

And while we know you know this project is worthy of support all on its own, we have produced several products over the years to help fundraising and we would like to send you a selection fo them to say 'Thank You!" for your support.  See the Perks!

The Impact

The NAL will serve to support and advance serious academic study for new, non-mainstream, esoteric, 'living' religions that are most likely to be the guiding forces in guiding the Earth and Humans back to health and evolution of Spirit in the coming century. 

Like the original Great Library of Alexandria, the schools of Qabala in medieval Spain, and the flourishing of magick that occurred in renaissance Italy, the diverse confluence of minds and resources would result in great leaps forward in theory and practice. The NAL will be one of the cornerstones (of many created by various groups across the globe we hope!) of a new magickal renaissance. The benefits of this growing network for future generations will be incalculable.

The content of the library will also be made available via internet to the greatest extent possible (respecting copyrights, etc.) to be a resource for the entire esoteric community.  The facility will evolve to meet accreditation criteria and serve as the library of record for formal esoteric religion studies at a variety of institutes of higher education.

The NAL will be located on 100 acres of Sacred Land at Seelie Court  - a third of which has been donated to the NAL project - in Georgetown, DE.  The facility will be accessible to visiting scholars and is serviced by Philadelphia and Washington, D.C. airports - while maintaining a wonderfully secluded atmosphere for serious study.

PLEASE CONSIDER SUPPORTING THIS IMPORTANT PROJECT!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate right now, PLEASE help by posting links to this campaign and the New Alexandrian Library Project in as many places as possible!  This is a much needed project for our troubled times - intending to provide real resource for spiritual development and evoution over the next hundred years to come!

http://www.sacredwheel.org/new-alexandrian-library.html

https://www.facebook.com/pages/The-New-Alexandrian-Library/140491612409
