We've also validated the structural design using simulation software, and worked with our component supplier for feasibility analysis. Here are some images of the model design work we've been doing. 
The next step is to build a prototype with the enclosure and the sliding mechanism. We can't use the Moto MDK since we can't add moving parts. We're in discussions with Motorola to get the key documents and components required -- such as the metal connectors and magnetic parts -- in order to build a real working sample. We're planning to be finished prototyping later this month (March), and we'll share results and progress here on a regular basis! (Update: We have build our first prototype! Pictures are shown below)
Then comes the tooling stage. We need your support to fund the best molds and tooling for the enclosure, keyboard, and sliding frame. A sliding keyboard has many more moving parts and is far more complicated than an ordinary "one piece" device. We need your financial support to make sure that the product is not compromised.
Update July 2017:
- The tooling is set to be finished by mid-July
- DVT samples estimated to be made in the week of 17th July
- MP and shipping will start at August
When the tooling is finished, we will build testing samples to verify that everything works as it should, and we'll apply for various certifications -- such as FCC, CE, RoHS, and UL -- to provide a safe device that's legal to sell. This also requires your financial support.
Finally we'll use the funds to reserve the essential material and components needed to build quality devices, and get them assembled in one of Foxconn's factories. We will also need your support to pay for the production line and labour, as well as quality control.
We'll do our absolute best to deliver the Keyboard Mod in the July/August timeframe! 
Here is some pictures of the very first engineering prototype. Please note that merely an engineering sample and improvements will continue to be made, such as a better finish.






 
Cost Summary
Building a physical sliding keyboard involves a lot of engineering and slightly higher upfront cost, since it requires more moving parts and uses a more complex design than other products. To sum things up, funds will be used:

To buy the best molds and tooling for the enclosure, slider frame, and keyboard.
To passing various certifications and safety tests.
To buy materials and components for the device.
To rent the assembly line and pay for labour and quality control.
For a few other items, such as taxes, material handling and transportation, etc...

story:
Since the discovery of fire and the invention of light bulb, mankind has utilised lighting mainly to meet their single basic need: to see their surroundings. Flint has been created to change it and surpass beyond this.

Over the past years, we have discovered that illumination is a vital element that alters peoples' reality, where human psychology is directly affected by light, shapes created by shadows and color itself. In this respect, we have equipped Flint with features that improve individual's life quality and make their life more interactive...

Flint is far beyond a simple lighting tool. It can take your couch into the middle of the Amazon forest. It wakes you up in such a way that you've never woken before and its powerful app reflects your notifications all over the room.

Flint is not just limited to this. Theatre mode synchronises Flint with your screen. The games you play and the movies you watch will now have an additional dimension, closer to reality.

Safe mode enables Flint to emit an artificial TV light. Thus, even when you're away, Flint creates the impression of life at home which improves your home security. You can activate the safe mode through the app with the remote access feature. Remote access is not only used for activating Safe Mode. You can control Flint and prepare a warm welcome for yourself before arriving home.

Flint is waterproof and offers a long-lasting battery. This makes Flint an indispensable tool for your outdoor activities. You don’t need internet connection to control Flint. Back-up Bluetooth connection lets you control Flint over Bluetooth when there is no internet connection. Another great way to interact is "Flint Knob". It is a remote control to function basic features of Flint with a revolutionary design. You will feel the "Color Wheel" on your palm physically...

Communication technologies are getting more advanced every day, smart phone usage rate is increasing day by day, social media is shaping our future, and access to information is no longer a matter of time… Unfortunately all of these technological advances do not change the fact that human relationships are becoming superficial. We do not construct such strong relationships with our families and friends, as we have established a strong bond with our smartphone. This phenomena inspired us to create a new medium; “Get Social”. This feature is designed to allow you to have more emotional interaction through the universe of colors. From the app, other users can be easily added to your friend-list. You can send emotions and notifications to your friends, so you can inform them you are at the door.

With its revolutionary design and software features, Flint blends innovative functionality and compact design without leaving artistic grounds. Let the vibrant chapter of your life begin.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SCHEDULED ACTIONS

Scheduled commands allow certain functions to repeat on a regular basis.￼You can schedule your commands to repeat weekly, daily or hourly, such as activating night lamp feature at 11 pm on every weekday.

GROUP CONTROL

Group Control feature provides an easy access and control over multiple Flints. By grouping your Flints with the app you can run multiple Flints in sync and update your settings in bulk. You can also name your groups.

DEVICE PREVIEW

You can remotely preview your friends’ Flint from the app or Flint-web. You can also checkout which effect or mode they are using.

SHARE PERMISSIONS

Users can be temporarily or permanently assigned to control your Flint. Let your friends control the colors of the party.

SNEAK PEEK

Our app also offers many features to users who are not flint owners. These features (eg: wake up alarm, colorwheel, equalizer) can be used with smartphone's built-in hardware. You can get a sneak peak of Flint experience and get an idea about our vision.

LOCATION ACTIONS

This allows you to create location-based commands which are triggered by entering or leaving a specified location, such as deactivating the color notifications when you are away. Similar commands can also be created for your friends’ locations as well.

API SUPPORT

If you are a developer, you can customise Flint according to your requirements and share it with the Flint community.

 

REMOTE ACCESS

Flint can be accessed via the app or Flint-web. You can activate or deactivate the features when you are away. You can also configure the settings of your Flint remotely.
IFTTT RECIPES

IFTTT stands for “if this then that”. It is an internet-based service that allows users to create conditional preposition chains, called “recipes”. IFTTT compatibility allows you to create endless “recipes” with the features of Flint, such as changing Flint’s color at each status-update from your favorite sports team or a new video upload to a YouTube channel you subscribed to.

 

 

 

WATERPROOF DESIGN

Flint has a fully enclosed, isolated design which does not contain any buttons or sockets. This compact design allows Flint to be waterproof. No worries if there is a liquid around, Flint can be used anywhere.

BUILT-IN BATTERY

Flint's latest technology and high capacity li-ion battery allows you to use it up to 80 hours* without charging. Flint is a reliable companion for all outdoor activities.

NO HUB, NO CABLES

Unlike other smart-lighting systems, you don’t need an extra hub or modem to setup or use Flint. Without interrupting your internet connection, pair your Flint with bluetooth and start using it via the app or the knob.

SOUND NOTIFICATIONS

Flint’s micro speaker notifies you about device status such as “charging” or “low battery” warnings. You can turn sound notifications off.

EASY TO MOVE

Flint’s wireless and lightweight body allows you to take it wherever you want. As soon as Flint is removed from the charging pad, it is ready-to-use anywhere you wish.

ROTATABLE DESIGN

Flint’s adaptive design allows different ways of usage. You can create the desired lighting effect by changing the diffused-part’s direction.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

BACKGROUND

As light and color are naturally simple, Flint has been created with a simple and minimalist design in direct proportion to this concept. Despite its simplicity, we have created a smart lighting device with many smart features without compromising ease of use and simplicity.

The human eye can detect millions of colors. Instead of highlighting a color out of millions of colors in the design, black and white contrast is used to form a simplistic and flawless product. While Flint was being designed, the two biggest inspirations were American minimalist sculptor “Tony Smith”, and “Dan Flavin” who uses light as basic tool in his art.

In short, Flint enters into our lives with the philosophy of evolving minimalism from the '60s, blended with today's technology and design concept.

TECHNICAL SPECS

Dimensions: 26x26x34.5cm 10.2x10.2x13.6in

Weight: 3.5 kg | 7.5 lbs

Energy Used: 90 Watts While Charging

Voltage Range: 100 - 260 Volts
(Universal voltage)

Battery Capacity: 30.000mAh
*see stretch goals

Battery Life: Up to 80 Hours

Color Temperature: Warm to Cool Whites (2500K - 9000K)

Brightness: 3600 Lumens

Lighting Angle: 360° Lighting

Material: White Diffuser & Piano Black Body TPU Charging Pad

Operating System: iOS 7+ | Android 4.0+

Connectivity: Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n
& Bluetooth LE

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Rather than being just co-workers, our team consists of very close friends who are experts in their fields. Flint family; who is passionate to work about lighting, design and innovative technologies, blends years of experience with creative vision.

 

 

www.projectflint.com

 

info@projectflint.com | press@projectflint.com | legal@projectflint.com

story:
GPS tracker,Bluetooth 4.0 driven device locating alarm

Small size, but strong functions. Locate your valuables with smart phone.

Keep utilizes the latest Bluetooth wireless connection with low power consumption, integrates both Anti-Lost and Remote-Control into a small unit. 


Once keep is connected with Bluetooth 4.0 enabled smart phone, if Keep is from the smart phone farther than the setup distance of 30 - 50 mtrs, smart phone will vibrate and alarm; and Keep will flash and alarm to remind the users, and enable users to find the location. 


Never lose your valuables, keys, mobile phones, luggage..


Keep Your Kids Near

When you go out with your kids, and you are enjoy the time. But do you worry about that your kids would go far way? Are there any consequent problems?
If you have this Keep with your kids, once they go farther from the Distance of Alarm, both Keep and your smart phone will alarm to remind you, and enable you keep your kids within your eyesight.



Keep Close Your Pets

Free your hands, and give your pets a safe and free space, so that they can enjoy the natural breath. What you need to do is just put this Keep on your pets, when your pets go farther from the Distance of Alarm, your smart phone will alert, so that you can call your pets back to safe distance.


Tag your luggage with keep and feel free

Travelling with keep device gives peace of mind, your smart phone alerts when your luggage is arriving at airport arrival belts, identify and pick them up without any hassle. 



REMOTE CONTROL FUNCTIONS



TRACK YOUR CAR




Colours to choose: Mention your preferred colour while ordering




PROJECT TIMELINE


We currently have fully working pre-production units with finalized hardware and App approved for iOS and Android. 

Several test devices were made and sold to few customers, received positive feedbacks. Your funding will help us place order for mass production and provide you with one of these efficient devices and research further on product betterment.

November 2013:

  • Indiegogo campaign starts.

December 2013:

  • Plans Production preparation based on the campaign and your contribution.
  • Packaging: Retail Packaging will be finalized.
  • Final discussions with manufacturing partner.

January 2014:

  • Starts First batch production (production divided to two batches)
  • Completes first batch production and start distribution to first batch backers.

February 2014:

  • Second batch production starts
  • Completes second batch production and start distribution to second batch backers.

Use of Funds

Prototypes and test run already completed by the design company. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to order Keep device into mass production. Our aim is to provide you this premium product ahead of everyone else and encourage the guys behind design.

We pledge; once the funding is successful 10% of your contributions go the a number of disabled children around the world via Unicef, Lets share a part of our success and bring smile to few innocent faces, and do more whenever we can.

story:
Introducing Q-ube 

From the creator of Podi-m Modern iPhone Dock, successfully funded on Kickstarter last year, comes Q-ube Sound Enhancing Dock for iPhone- a steel iPhone charging dock made with a beautiful resonant block of recycled hardwood that amplifies and enhances the sound and tone of your iPhone's speakers.  

Q-ube makes your iPhone's speakers sound even better

The wave shape and the natural resonance of the wood in Q-Ube's base acoustically amplify your iPhone's speakers, so the sound coming from your phone when docked in Q-ube is warm and noticeably louder. Perfect for Facetime calls or listening to music at your desk or in your hotel room. 
 

Charges any iPhone or iPod 

Q-ube uses your existing charging cable, and comes with 2 adapters, one 30 pin connector for iPhone 4 and iPod Touch and one Lightning adapter for iPhone 5, so you can upgrade or change your device at anytime.

 

Undocking is Easy 

Q-ube is made from heavy steel and a solid block of hardwood and weighs 1.5 pounds- so your iPhone is secure and undocking is easy!

 

Eco-Industrial Design

Q-ube has a modern, raw industrial design aesthetic- so it looks cool in any room. Q-ube comes in Black, White and Raw Steel. 

 

 

Help me bring this product to the masses!

Q-ube is a substantial, heavy, beautiful, functional iPhone dock that looks great and enhances sound. I am seeking funding for tooling and production materials so I can make this dock locally in Canoga Park CA to put into retail. With your pledge, you will get your very own Q-ube Sound Enhancing Dock for iPhone to cherish and proudly display among your coolest things. 

There are other ways you can help!

Please spread the word among your gadget loving friends!

Discuss this project here:  http://crowdfundingforum.com/showthread.php/617...

Indiegogo has great Share Tools to make it easy to spread the word on social media sites!

You can also check out www.worldofsimpledesign.com for more information. 

Thank You! :)
